201072.text: What? Are you afraid... Or just cautious?

201073.text: I won't hurt you. I am Fellagood from the Holy Church, a preacher who serves the merciful God.

201074.text: Oh, I heard that some wicked ones are searching for the Sacred Relic here.

201075.text: They intend to awaken the demon in slumber, which will bring untold suffering to this world.

201076.text: As a follower of the merciful God, I'm so worried and eager to smash the scheme of the wicked ones as soon as possible.

201077.text: Oh, so you must have met those sneaky fiends. They're good at worming their way into people's trust to their own nefarious ends.

201078.text: Their target is to grab the Sacred Relic in the tower to revive the demon.

201081.text: It's carved with an oracle, a trial given to us by the merciful God.

201082.text: Only by passing the trial can we find the Sacred Relic and foil the fiends' plot once and for all.

201083.text: If you see one of these steles, please keep me informed.

201084.text: Your good deeds will be favored by God.

201085.text: Uh, I have to find the other steles before those treacherous ones get ahead of me.

201086.text: You should be cautious too. Don't be fooled by them.

201087.text: Here we meet again. You look worried.

201088.text: So, there are differing accounts from the preacher and the noble.

201089.text: There's no absolute right and wrong.

201090.text: Within kindness there's evil, and within evil there's kindness. Darkness may hide deep inside light, and in the heart of darkness lies light.

201091.text: Life, life, life, life; life is death. Death, death, death, death; death is life.

201092.text: Meow, it's up to how you comprehend it. All behaviors and words embed purposes.

201093.text: Meow? Even you believe that is the treasure?

201094.text: So troublesome. I'm going back to sleep...

201095.text: The Hall of Reversal is right above us. That's where the Endpoint of the Intangible Radius is.

201096.text: Meow, I saw some other humans passing through. You should be careful. Don't trust others too easily.

201097.text: I'm going back to sleep. Goodbye...

201098.text: Heretic, you wish to renew the Demon Force?

201099.text: That's very dangerous. As the preacher of the Holy Church, I cannot allow that to happen!

201100.text: Humph, the Holy Church also gets involved? You just want to keep the Dark Magic for yourselves, don't you!

201101.text: We are the followers of the merciful God. Anything we do is instructed by the revelation of God.

201102.text: Stupid fool, don't get in the way of my research.

201103.text: Urgh, that wicked magic is so powerful!

201104.text: It's you. You are still here?

201105.text: You ignorant fool, how dare you lecture me?!

201106.text: Huh? How naive. You think those chaps from the Holy Church are well-intentioned?

201107.text: Don't expect me to thank you. I never asked you to save me.

201108.text: Ignorance is also a sin. You can die here along with this hypocritical preacher!

201110.text: I have already mastered the Dark Magic! How come I...

201112.text: My research is not enough. It seems like I'll have to...

201113.text: I failed this time. Wicked preacher, you are lucky to keep your life for now.

201114.text: As a talented alchemist, I shall keep this humiliation in mind and get my revenge later.

201115.text: Lord Fellagood, you've been severely hurt. You need to be treated right away.

201116.text: Ah, be careful out there... Cough...

201117.text: Don't go too far, and once you have more information, do notify me!

201118.text: May the merciful God bless you.

201119.text: So, as you have seen, Snegurochka is collapsing, not far away from its destruction.

201120.text: Yes, all the choices finally lead to the collapse of Snegurochka.

201121.text: Don't blame yourself, because you know little about this world.

201122.text: The destruction of Snegurochka is the inevitable end of the Intangible.

201123.text: Fate will not change even if you fail to defeat Cersivey.

201124.text: But since your ability of Intangible Shifting has awoken, it may be possible for you to rewrite fate.

201125.text: I can help you to channel your Time Shifting magic, which will allow you to go back to a point in the past.

201126.text: That way, you can understand Snegurochka better, and maybe find a way to save it.

201128.text: You can resonate with me by using the power hidden inside, and gain a little insight into what's going to happen on that day.

201129.text: Although, on how to interpret the patterns that appear, you may just listen to your heart.

201130.text: To restore your memory, go find all the Shards.

201131.text: Master, have you forgotten who you are?

201132.text: They also cooperate with those corrupted nobles to seize the secular power.

201133.text: Have you found a way out of this tower?

201134.text: My employer is in the tower and stuck too. Both of us are looking for a way out of this tower.

201135.text: Unlike me, she's noble and civilized. You two will surely become good friends if you ever get a chance to meet with each other.

201136.text: Anyway, be careful of those from the Holy Church. More than likely, they are also here for the treasure.

201137.text: Anyway, be careful of those from the Holy Church. More than likely, they are also here for the treasure.

201139.text: You still carry the great responsibility of bringing back your family's glory days. Do you want to die here?

201140.text: Don't worry. I won't die before I've learned the lost magic.

201141.text: After I get out of this, I'll find you at the bottom of the tower.

201144.text: Young lady, you are impressive. Bit by bit, I'll let you be my captive.

201145.text: Uh... That aura, and that power...

201147.text: It seems like you crave to dive into the abyss of the forbidden magic just as I do.

201148.text: You will join us one day. Before that, just keep struggling...

201151.text: This is Snegurochka, but not the same chronospace that you were in before.

201152.text: After the Intangible Shifting, you have returned to a time in the past.

201153.text: Can you see the magic boundary over there?

201154.text: That was set by Cersivey to stop others from entering. You are inside the boundary because of the disturbance of chronospace.

201155.text: The mystery of this world is hidden right here, which is the answer you are looking for.

201158.text: You should believe what I've said by now. After the Intangible Shifting, you have returned to a time in the past.

201159.text: But no one can predict what's going to happen next since the chronospace itself has changed.

201160.text: I don't know it, either. But I hope you can find the answers to all your questions this time.

201161.text: I have said too much. I'm tired and I'm going back to sleep now.

201162.text: The geothermal surge is really troublesome.

201163.text: Her Saintess asked me to seal all the cracks, but it's so hard!

201164.text: Geothermal activities have become increasingly frequent. Uh, so much trouble. I'm so tired.

201165.text: Hervoraltar, are you slacking off again?

201166.text: Oh, Your Saintess, when have I ever slacked off?

201167.text: You must know what a laborious job it is to seal all these cracks one by one.

201169.text: Please don't be unhappy, Your Saintess.

201170.text: I will stop whining. The cracks here are all sealed. Let's head to the next spot now!

201171.text: Hervoraltar, the Geothermal activity is getting more and more active.

201172.text: I can sense that it will bring great disasters to my beloved Snegurochka.

201173.text: It has been over two hundred years since the last time geothermal activity was this frequent.

201174.text: My honorable Saintess, don't worry. You have not only me, but also your followers from the Chivalric Order to share your burden.

201175.text: Let's head to the next spot.

201176.text: Oh, how did you know me?

201177.text: I know everyone from the village, and you don't look familiar at all. You are an outsider, right?

201178.text: Walking in this blizzard alone is way too dangerous.

201179.text: I can take you to the village by the foothills. People would love to help you even if you're not a villager.

201180.text: The White Bear? How did you know about that beast?

201181.text: Investigating? I don't know what you want to know, but you should give up this unrealistic idea!

201182.text: It attacks whoever enters the woods for no reason. Several of my men have already met with misfortune.

201184.text: It's very dangerous ahead. Let's head back to the village now.

201185.text: We are almost running out of food. What should we do...

201187.text: How strange this is! This place seems to have been set up with magic. There must be something hidden inside.

201188.text: Maybe I can find the secret of the blizzard.

201189.text: But how can I get in?

201190.text: Stop there. You don't appear to be someone from the village.

201191.text: Are you a henchman of the Fallen God?

201194.text: Stop there! Don't get any closer!

201195.text: One step closer and I shall shoot my arrow!

201196.text: I said stop there! Tell me, do you work for the Fallen God?

201197.text: We will never yield to the Fallen God!

201200.text: Human brat! How dare you try to pass through the boundary!

201202.text: Is this the bear that the elders in the village talked about...

201204.text: Are you the pet of the Fallen God?

201205.text: The terrible one that attacks everyone climbing up the mountain!

201206.text: How brazen, and how dare you insult the prestigious Her Saintess!

201207.text: I'll let you have a taste of what fear really is!

201208.text: I'm repeating that those trying to pass through the boundary will be slain. Get ready to die!

201209.text: You arrogant humans are only good at bragging!

201211.text: How did you know my name?

201212.text: You are seemingly not from the Chivalric Order. Tell me, who are you?

201213.text: Whoever you are, anyone who crosses the boundary shall die!

201214.text: Ugh, I've used too much strength before.

201215.text: You... You... How did you know...

201216.text: How could you walk into the boundary?

201217.text: Hervoraltar will never answer questions from a human.

201218.text: It looks like you know quite a lot. But no one can disobey the will of Her Saintess.

201219.text: For this world, Her Saintess has...

201220.text: Human, go to the boundary on the hillside.

201221.text: Her Saintess is over there. If you have questions, just ask Her Saintess yourself.

201222.text: You have reminded me of someone familiar.

201223.text: The one that was full of doubts about her own choices.

201224.text: Never mind, I've said too much.

201225.text: Human, go find Her Saintess, if you have the nerve.

201226.text: Thank you for saving me. I'm sorry to have misunderstood you.

201227.text: My father is the leader of the hunters in the village. Everyone calls him Silverbow.

201229.text: My father has been leading the villagers to survive in this frozen world.

201230.text: Like the others in the village, he just takes it for granted that this blizzard is a natural disaster and has accepted it as a fact of life.

201231.text: He and the villagers have been fighting against the old hunters as well as the beasts in the mountain, but never thought about changing this harsh environment to address the issue once and for all.

201233.text: Yes, I disagree with my father. I've been doubting the authenticity of these legends.

201234.text: If the legends are true, then it's the Fallen God that has created the blizzard.

201235.text: And if there's a way to defeat the Fallen God, maybe the blizzard will stop.

201236.text: I could faintly sense magic since I was young. Recently I can feel the magic here has been growing stronger.

201237.text: Then I started my investigation and found the boundary here.

201238.text: Should I tell her about the greater disaster if the blizzard stops?

201239.text: What's wrong? You seem to know something. Is it the way to stop the blizzard?

201240.text: From what the giant bear said, you seemed to know something. The Fallen God is the cause of everything, right?

201241.text: Oh, you know how to pass through the boundary?

201242.text: The hunting ground in the foothills is right across the tundra. I can feel the magic is the strongest over there. Maybe that is where the entrance lies.

201244.text: Just as the giant bear mentioned before, it's the Fallen God that is the cause of everything!

201245.text: That looks like an ancient magic device. It can launch spherical magic bullets after being imbued with magic.

201246.text: But I don't know what to aim at. Maybe something nearby?

201247.text: Oh, is this the entrance? Great! We finally found it!

201249.text: What are you waiting for, come!

201250.text: It's a fork road. What now? Which way should we go?

201251.text: That's what I thought. Let's split up.

201252.text: Let's meet here again after the investigation!

201253.text: Well, I'll go that way then. See you later!

201254.text: Darn it. Where did these guys come from? I've never seen them before...

201256.text: They are really nasty to deal with. Haha, my friend, you have helped me once again.

201257.text: What are you holding in your hand? Did those monsters drop it?

201258.text: I'm not sure. I've been following this path since we separated.

201259.text: I didn't expect to encounter those monsters. They directly attacked me without saying a word.

201260.text: Thank goodness that you showed up just in time!

201262.text: From what I can remember, this mountain has been covered in snow and ice forever. There's nothing but coldness.

201263.text: How did the hot steam appear here?

201264.text: I'm wondering where the hot steam comes from. If only the villagers could use them to keep warm!

201265.text: There's nothing else to be investigated nearby. Our investigation seems not too fruitful.

201266.text: What's wrong? What are you thinking about?

201267.text: Let's get out of the boundary now. We may encounter those dangerous creatures again!

201268.text: Whew, we are finally out of there. Even though we didn't find out much, I still will report everything we've seen to my father.

201269.text: Why don't you go back to the village with me to have a rest?

201270.text: It's about what that giant bear said, right? Alright, see you then.

201271.text: The blizzard on the mountain is getting heavier. Be careful out there!

201272.text: Little thing, how dare you to mess with the traps we set up carefully. You cannot get away with this.

201274.text: This is what we shall do. Let's break one of its legs so that it can no longer...

201275.text: Who are you? How dare you tell the Chivalric Order what to do?

201276.text: Mind your own business. Kids should just stay away from adults' affairs!

201278.text: Looks like you are no ordinary human. Since you have drawn your staff towards the Chivalric Order, you have shown great disrespect to Her Saintess!

201279.text: (The wolf cub is staring at me suspiciously)

201281.text: It's you, that little nosy chump again! Why are you always in my way!

201282.text: Forget it. I'm no match for you.

201283.text: Remember to go to the boundary on the hillside. Her Saintess is over there...

201284.text: Thank you for saving me. I can't believe that beast is afraid of you!

201287.text: Urgh, I can't waste more time here. I still need to set up traps in the tundra outside the village.

201288.text: I'll definitely teach those old geezers a lesson this time.

201289.text: I've still got things to do. See you around.

201290.text: You are not going to stop him?

201291.text: You are completely different this time, meow.

201292.text: Seems you have also realized that some things are inevitable.

201294.text: Since you have decided to end the chaos in this world, then you should further dig out the truth about this world.

201296.text: Where have you been before? We were all worried about you.

201297.text: Thank you for your kindness. You are really different from the other humans.

201298.text: There is indeed a magic trap of some sort nearby.

201299.text: Just walk across this place and you'll see a strange ice sculpture at the end of the tundra.

201300.text: There seems to be an invisible wall by the sculpture, blocking everyone out. Maybe that's where you want to take a look.

201301.text: I never thought a human would thank me one day. Actually I should be the one feeling grateful.

201302.text: The blizzard is getting heavier on the tundra. Please be careful!

201305.text: We really don't have a choice. I came here in search of the food I buried here before.

201306.text: If I can find the food, we don't have to take the risk to steal from the village anymore.

201307.text: Yes, this is a place where we used to live. We had plenty of food so we hid some under the snow.

201308.text: It's just that the wolf pack will attack us on sight. I... I dare not to go searching.

201309.text: The food shall suffice for us to migrate again to another place.

201310.text: I will promise not to steal from the villagers again.

201311.text: Yes! this is the food we have stored before!

201312.text: *Sob*... Thank you! This will suffice for us to migrate again.

201315.text: Cersivey inspects the Witch up and down.

201316.text: Her face suddenly turns clouded as if something has struck her...

201317.text: Despicable! Sneaked up on me when I was working on the magic circle...

201318.text: Never will I allow you to put this world into chaos again!

201319.text: Leave your revenge unfinished with an undelivered fatal blow? How pathetic!

201321.text: Lady Cersivey, you have misunderstood her intention.

201322.text: And where do you come from?

201323.text: We have met during the War of Protectors.

201324.text: You have the wrong person. Please look closer. She's not Lady Ereshkigal.

201325.text: Those eyes... Yes, I will never forget the arrogance in her eyes.

201326.text: Well then, you must have broken into the boundary with a certain purpose. You may name your business now.

201327.text: (Sigh) Aren't you the one who's truly arrogant...

201328.text: (With a surprised expression) What's with that question?

201329.text: So, you have also witnessed the end of this world?

201330.text: Do you truly believe your effort in saving this world will make for your atonement?

201331.text: You would be beyond a lunatic to speak of all these without a sight of the final days of this world.

201332.text: As for the Time Shifting ability, I've seen it before.

201333.text: It just never occurred to me that someone else also possesses that ability.

201334.text: The Geothermy here will only be escalating. I can predict that the burst of lava will eventually consume this world.

201335.text: Only by summoning a blizzard to cover this land with ice and snow can the geothermal surge be suppressed.

201336.text: (Sigh) I've also done some investigation, hoping to find the source of it. And each time I returned empty-handed.

201337.text: Geothermal activities have been more active recently, which demand heavier blizzards to be summoned.

201338.text: Meow, that must be the boundary set by Lady Cersivey... and the memory of all seems to have been erased as well.

201339.text: Meow, after all, a Protector has her pride.

201340.text: Huh, what do I need a scrounger like you for?

201341.text: I would rather see my world meet its own demise than seeking guidance from an outsider!

201342.text: Leave the boundary and be gone, now!

201343.text: Arrogant as always... Meow, all this talking has made me tired.

201344.text: With the crackling sound of sticks, fire spreads across them instantly.

201345.text: What are you talking about? There's a hidden boundary on the mountain top?

201346.text: Then the rumors seem to be true. Someone is brewing a plot.

201347.text: Father, you also heard of that?

201348.text: I just have a faint hunch that it's more than a simple conflict between us and the old hunters.

201349.text: Even though my young wards have been going on about taking revenge on the old hunters, those men are really not that despicable.

201350.text: I've always had this feeling that there might be someone hiding behind inciting all of these.

201351.text: If there's a boundary, maybe troublemakers are hiding right inside.

201352.text: Oh, the one I met outside the village...

201354.text: I met her outside the village, where I suggested she not linger in the snow.

201355.text: Just as I suspected... someone has been plotting against us in secret this whole time. Those despicable guys are unforgivable!

201356.text: I assume they follow that Fallen God's guidance?

201357.text: Darn it. I'm going back to round up some young men and head to the mountain top together!

201358.text: No one's stopping me. I will make them pay!

201359.text: Father! Let her finish what she's saying.

201362.text: The blizzard was created to protect us?

201363.text: Father, I will trust her words...

201364.text: Just because she has saved you?

201365.text: That's not the only reason. I saw the steaming crevices with my own eyes too.

201366.text: Alright, then you've earned my trust. Anything you need? Just say the word.

201367.text: Oh... So this poor child has lost her family...

201369.text: Don't be afraid. Come home with us, and we'll be introducing you to your new family.

201370.text: Don't worry. I'll take her back to the village.

201371.text: I do hope the blizzard could stop, but if at the expense of destroying this world...

201372.text: Then I have only your words to trust.

201373.text: What's that? We are friends, aren't we?

201374.text: We are going back to the village. Do be careful!

201375.text: Oh right. I grabbed some warm clothes from the old hunters. Should keep you warm. You can take them.

201377.text: Ugh, what kind of monsters are these?!

201378.text: Her Saintess's order is the law!

201379.text: We gotta seal the cracks in all places at all costs.

201380.text: I know, but where did these monsters come from?

201382.text: Your Great Saintess, I have failed you...

201384.text: How dare you ask us, Her Saintess's guards, to retreat!

201385.text: You are going to help us?

201386.text: We will never retreat. This is a perfect time to teach you what determination is about!

201390.text: We are here to seal the cracks by the order of Her Saintess.

201391.text: Yet we found ourselves besieged by those monsters as soon as we had finished sealing a few.

201392.text: It was like they were trying to stop us.

201393.text: No, we have set up our camps not far from here.

201394.text: This place is full of cracks, so our captain ordered us to station here.

201396.text: If our captain is also on the duty, he will encounter those monsters too for sure!

201397.text: You're right! We'd better hurry back to the campsite to help them!

201398.text: Sorry, we have to rush back now. See you around!

201400.text: No need to worry about me. I can still fight. Those monsters though...

201401.text: We encountered some of those just now. It seems like they are trying to stop us from sealing the cracks.

201403.text: Her Saintess has entrusted me with this quest of glory, and I shall see it through at all cost.

201405.text: Captain, you should find a way out of here first. We'll take over here.

201409.text: No wonder Lord Hervoraltar has lost to you. Your power is beyond imagination.

201410.text: Young witch, thank you for your help.

201412.text: You have all suffered a great sacrifice. Take the injured to the castle where they can rest and recover.

201414.text: The Ice Crust? Could it be...

201415.text: That was a long time ago. A world free from the threat of Geothermy. Things were all vibrant here.

201416.text: As the Protector, I run this world.

201417.text: Until the day of flames intruding this world.

201418.text: You heard me right. Those monsters wield Flame Magic. The abundance of them ruined this world recklessly with fire.

201419.text: Their eyes are blind to all but to destruction. There's no way to communicate with them.

201420.text: The ancestors of the wolves and the humans here fought them bravely alongside my warriors. Blood was shed, of course.

201421.text: In the end, I sealed the rest of them with my Freezing Magic and buried them underground.

201422.text: After I summoned the blizzard, I erased everyone's memory. And so those battles against the monsters are buried as secrets as well.

201423.text: The Ice Crust you saw on the monsters is most likely the work of my Freezing Magic.

201424.text: They should have lain under the earth, though, since they have been sealed by my Freezing Magic...

201425.text: Those monsters cannot think for themselves. All they have is the instinct to ruin everything with flames.

201426.text: If they ever woke up again, they would show themselves in no time, which would mean a total destruction for this world.

201427.text: That's impossible. Geothermy has been going on for hundreds of years. If the Geothermy was their doing, they would have long rushed out trying to tear this world apart.

201428.text: I'll get to the very bottom of this. This world is mine to protect.

201429.text: I'll see it through no matter what.

201430.text: Young witch, you've finished your part of the work. Go back to where you belong.

201431.text: Every time I lay my eyes on you, though, I just recall that abomination.

201432.text: Maybe the answer to the mystery lies where those monsters appeared.

201433.text: When did those monsters start to show up?

201435.text: So, where can I find those monsters?

201436.text: No, that shouldn't be what they aim at.

201438.text: Let's think about it more carefully.

201439.text: That can't be right. There have never been monsters in that place, and they have no reason to go there.

201440.text: Wait, maybe the monsters can be found in places full of cracks.

201441.text: But the cracks nearby have all been sealed already. Where can I find another place like this?

201442.text: Right, I remember there were huge cracks in the Saintess Square, where lava erupted. Maybe I can solve the mystery there.

201443.text: That's strange. Those guys from the Glorious Silverbow stopped their provocations!

201444.text: Hey! Don't come any closer. Go back to your village!

201445.text: I won't buy that just because you said so.

201446.text: Our grudge with the Silverbow is too deep to be solved merely by words alone.

201447.text: This... This was stolen by those brats.

201448.text: Did Silverbow send you here to trick me? Are you trying to clear my suspicion with this?

201449.text: I don't trust the words of others. I only believe my eyes.

201450.text: Go back. I'll go to seek the truth with them.

201452.text: I grabbed it from that young fellow.

201453.text: I met him on the Frozen Lake Surface just now.

201454.text: He didn't strike back. How strange.

201456.text: I have heard about what's happened from Lord Silverbow. He asked me to dismantle the traps here. These were prepared for the old guys.

201457.text: Oh! My precious bow! That old geezer grabbed it from me. Did you help me retrieve it?

201459.text: Erm... It's too complicated a story for me.

201460.text: Since both Lord Silverbow and you say there's a misunderstanding, I'll trust you.

201461.text: People who resort to fists and bows for settling disputes as I will only make the conflict more complicated.

201462.text: So I said nothing and let him take my bow.

201463.text: Haha. Don't worry. Even without the bow, I can still hunt with my fists.

201464.text: Ah, you are the witch from earlier.

201466.text: Well, there are huge cracks in the Saintess Square, but everyone's so busy tending the injured that none of us has the time to seal them.

201467.text: That would be wonderful! The square is located deep in the castle.

201469.text: The captain at the gate has already briefed us on everything.

201470.text: Will the world be devoured by the Geothermal Surge?

201471.text: Nonsense. I'll not believe it without seeing it.

201473.text: Fear not, child. I will never let go!

201474.text: You old geezer, why are you...

201475.text: My body just moved on its own! Oh hell, I can't hold on any longer!

201478.text: I told you that I didn't mean to help. My body just moved on its own.

201484.text: Did she just come out of nowhere and assault us? What a dangerous one!

201486.text: Oh hell! Get ready for it!

201488.text: This is Cetess, the vice-captain of the Chivalric Order.

201489.text: A few months ago, I sent her to scout the cracks that recently appeared in the foothills, but she never returned.

201490.text: She is not the true perpetrator of the Geothermy. Seems like someone else is manipulating her.

201491.text: Yes. Someone who can wield powerful mind magic is holding sway over her.

201494.text: Cetess, my loyal chevalier. Seems like you have restored your consciousness.

201497.text: All I can remember is the ground cracked open, and then I fell into the abyss.

201498.text: Down there, a bunch of Lava Monsters attacked me. Then... then...

201500.text: Don't push yourself so hard. You are quite weak right now. Go back to the Chivalric Order and get some rest.

201501.text: It seems the real culprit is lurking underground.

201502.text: This feeling... The source of the Geothermy should be down there.

201504.text: Do you feel that too? Magic power has been accumulating ahead, which must be the real cause behind Snegurochka's demolition.

201505.text: We've returned, and this time... things will be different.

201506.text: It seems, this time, we can change the fate of Snegurochka.

201507.text: Go on. Save it. Fix it.

201509.text: Looks like my children have taken good care of you.

201510.text: I am Sinmara the Inferno, serving the great Lady Ereshkigal.

201511.text: Just as I expected, a jackal of that abhorrent witch.

201512.text: Cersivey, all you've left to offer is your empty talk.

201513.text: My master suffered from enough humiliations in the War of Protectors. And here I am to take revenge for her. I will destroy all of you completely.

201514.text: Are those disgusting monsters your henchmen?

201515.text: Watch your tongue. These adorable kids are my gifts to you all.

201517.text: Yup. They can only live in a world of magma and fire.

201518.text: Therefore, they will destroy everything in their sight with fire, making an environment suitable for their reproduction. Just like what you see right now.

201519.text: So you also created the Geothermy?

201520.text: You once sealed them with Freezing Magic. But that also pointed the way for me to find the Geothermy here.

201521.text: You must have also felt it, this splendid temperature...

201523.text: You Protectors are indeed powerful. It costs an enormous amount of magic and took me quite some time to gradually unseal them.

201524.text: It's impossible to defeat the Protector of this world just on my own. Therefore, I need these kids. I need them all to be awakened.

201525.text: Also, to curb the surging Geothermy, you have set a gigantic magic circle to bring the blizzard, which has consumed most of your magic, hasn't it?

201526.text: Now, my children have all awoken. Soon, very soon, this world will burn in hell's flames.

201528.text: It seems we have another guest here.

201530.text: Ah, I've done all of these only to honor your name.

201531.text: My heart was ripped apart since you were sealed.

201532.text: But now you are finally back...

201533.text: Ah! Do you know how anxiously I've been waiting for this day?

201534.text: Alas, looks like it's just an empty puppet.

201535.text: Indeed. How stupid I am. You are still being tortured in the darkness of Abyss.

201536.text: It must be those ignominious Protectors behind this farce!

201537.text: This is a humiliation to your nobleness and beauty. I shall let this puppet pay for this crime.

201538.text: Ah, the cursed Protectors. Not only did they seal you, but they also humiliated you with such an abomination.

201540.text: How stupid you are. Do you think you can defeat me so easily?

201541.text: This is my true form, slumbering in the magic core. You can't defeat me by just shattering the vessel!

201542.text: There is no way you can stop me now.

201545.text: No, the Geothermy is going into an eruption. If this goes on like this, my world will...

201547.text: My master, you were in great danger and triggered the ability to use Shifting.

201548.text: It can take a tremendous toll on your body, so please don't push yourself too hard.

201549.text: That was a close one. Were it not for the Intangible Shifting, you would have surely died in the magma burst.

201550.text: You have returned to a time in the past... This is Snegurochka before its devastation.

201551.text: The Snegurochka before the Intangible Shifting has been destroyed. Lava devoured the entire world.

201552.text: Maybe the Frost of Absolute Zero can neutralize that explosion.

201553.text: This delicate magical item is made of ice and never melts. It's said that it can suppress any flame or explosion.

201554.text: It can help you see the hidden flowing of magic so that you can recognize the true nature of things.

201555.text: Ah! You mean the barrier made of ice!

201556.text: That's a masterpiece of Lady La Crima.

201557.text: So you have obtained the Eternal Ice from the Saintess?

201558.text: Luckily, I happen to have an Ice Cryolite.

201559.text: Please allow me to take you to Lady La Crima.

201560.text: Only she owns such rare item as Tear of Magic.

201561.text: She lives in the front part of the castle. But she doesn't like to be bothered by others and has blocked the way with her Gem Magic.

201562.text: It is necessary to collect the materials for the Invisible Mirror. It's impossible to stop Sinmara without it.

201563.text: Search in the castle again but be more careful this time.

201568.text: Why? Why do you come to me?

201569.text: Why are you looking at me?

201570.text: Despicable Witch... A filthy being like you should not exist in this world!

201571.text: Welcome to the Shop. Please enjoy your shopping here.

201572.text: Please feel free to shop here.

201573.text: Are there monsters on both the east and west sides?

201574.text: Don't worry. I'll protect the village. Go hide yourselves.

201575.text: It seems that only by eliminating all the monsters in the tower can safety and peace be brought back to the village.

201576.text: I'll repel the monsters in the west. As for the east, I'll leave it to you.

201577.text: Even your world is under threat because of Irminsul's chaos?

201578.text: All of these are merely speculations. If only we could find more evidence.

201579.text: There are heavy burdens on our shoulders. Best of luck.

201581.text: Why did you know the secret of the Chronospace?

201582.text: Nevertheless, what you have done is nothing but an act of pure selfishness. You persecuted my people in favor of your world.

201583.text: Though their ending remains inevitable, my people should sacrifice for me. All is to prevent Irminsul from falling apart.

201584.text: Croak... croak. Thanks for your help. I shall go on fulfilling my mission.

201585.text: Until our paths cross again. And may your soul be redeemed too!

201586.text: That's why you entered the tower? To exterminate those monsters?

201587.text: Did you find the village in your memory around the tower? There are only woods around here.

201588.text: Only a few monsters have escaped from the tower so far. The chaos of other worlds just started to erode this world.

201589.text: Perhaps your deep slumber has affected your memory.

201591.text: Monsters that have escaped from the tower are gathering at both the west and east sides of the village again!

201592.text: Hey, you have returned. Thanks for your help last time. It seems the legend of the treasure has attracted more people to come here.

201593.text: Yes. My fellows and I saw some suspicious people while exploring the tower.

201594.text: Seems to be an alchemist. Very suspicious.

201595.text: Keep your eyes peeled. And hopefully, you can tell me more information about the treasure the next time we meet.

201601.text: Finally... finally I have completely sealed the Geothermy.

201602.text: That's no longer needed anymore. It's all over.

201603.text: The long cold night has passed...

201607.text: Young witch, it's clear now that you are a completely different person from that woe-bringer. You have truly saved this world.

201608.text: It seems that other missions are waiting for you.

201609.text: Let's part from here. My world is in ruins. I need to restore it to its former glory.

201610.text: Oh... You are here for a Frost of Absolute Zero...

201612.text: I need Eternal Ice and Tear of Magic. Do you have them?

201613.text: Ah, Tear of Magic. I can manage with that.

201614.text: Give me the rest materials, please.

201615.text: Hmm, I still need more drops of Tear of Magic. Turn around and wait a second.

201617.text: Remember, don't turn back before I say so.

201619.text: (Murmuring) Hmm, Tear of Magic. Not really anything sad happened recently...

201620.text: Should I fetch some onions from the castle?

201623.text: Your Frost of Absolute Zero is done.

201624.text: Please... please, don't come back to me ever again!

201625.text: You can make souls collected from different worlds tangible and have them fight for you in combat.

201627.text: It seems you have forgotten everything.

201628.text: You were born with this ability.

201629.text: This place used to be sheltered by the Protector. But now it is totally deserted, even occupied by all sorts of monsters.

201632.text: The mirror in the front seems to be rotateable. I can adjust the light's direction with that...

201633.text: This is the way we came. Let's go take a look up ahead...

201641.text: It seems the chest over there contains something...

201644.text: I just felt power flowing into my body.

201645.text: The thought of saving others has charged me with extra power.

201650.text: I am collecting the shards of the Mirror.

201652.text: So... I just need to collect the shards?

201656.text: I am not interested in treasures, though.

201668.text: I will keep an eye out for it.

201675.text: But there are only woods here?

201676.text: Something's over there. Let's go over and take a look.

201678.text: I heard this place used to be prosperous?

201680.text: What does this have to do with me...

201682.text: Merchant, I can help you with that.

201684.text: Reminiscing... What feeling would that be...

201685.text: I am helping Sir Phrygia search for a wand.

201687.text: Are you searching for the cause of the Abnormality?

201688.text: Do you know the source of the magic?

201689.text: OK, and I'll tell your brother what has happened to you.

201691.text: This place is surrounded by water on all three sides... but it's not...

201692.text: There are no lantern flowers here...

201695.text: Is his brother searching for the cause of the Abnormality...

201696.text: The source of the magic is the Giant Tree.

201701.text: I want to help people recover...

201703.text: (Display the Soul of Dimension Overseer in the bottle)

201704.text: Why does it have to be like this?

201706.text: Yet you have brought them endless pain.

201710.text: Phrygia wants to help you recover.

201711.text: It seems that the magic is leaking from under the Giant Tree.

201716.text: I am here looking for Phrygia's wand.

201717.text: The curse has not been lifted...

201718.text: Maybe the cure can be found in other worlds.

201719.text: The hunter in the village asked me to...

201720.text: The chaos in this world has an impact on my homeland...

201728.text: (Tell her what the Priestess of Time said)

201729.text: What? You know that as well?

201730.text: Why can't you tell me what you know?

201731.text: Well, one more question... Who am I?

201738.text: I am looking for a way to enter parallel worlds...

201739.text: Erina told me to go to the Snegurochka Mountain...

201740.text: I wanna know who I am...

201741.text: Even you are not going to talk about that?

201743.text: Return the food to the villagers.

201746.text: But stealing is wrong no matter what...

201747.text: Well, I can let you go...

201750.text: Alright, I can let you go.

201751.text: Tell her about the little fox.

201752.text: I'm not sure if I did the right thing...

201754.text: Only by helping each other can we survive the cold.

201757.text: I am going to the mountain top.

201759.text: Why do you keep hurting each other?

201760.text: Why can't you settle your disputes peacefully?

201762.text: But they just came here for some food...

201763.text: There seems to be some misunderstanding...

201764.text: Could you please tell me where the leader of the wolf pack is?

201766.text: Don't worry. I mean you no harm...

201769.text: Don't worry about me. I will take you there.

201770.text: Why can't you just cooperate with the Old Hunter?

201771.text: But working together will get you through this difficult situation...

201773.text: No problem. What was that white bear though?

201775.text: Tell it about the idea of settling the disputes.

201776.text: I heard that your territory used to be elsewhere.

201777.text: These were the hunters' hunting grounds though...

201778.text: What can I do to get you to agree to reconcile with the humans?

201779.text: Then, I just need to ask her to stop the blizzard...

201782.text: No one shall deny my existence...

201783.text: Please bring the girl to the village by the foothills.

201785.text: I should go to the mountain top. There may be some way to stop the blizzard from there.

201787.text: Hand over the items in the chest.

201790.text: Don't worry, I'll help you look for them.

201800.text: Did these people have to die like this?

201802.text: Does everyone have to follow the destiny she arranged?

201803.text: I will stop this endless blizzard once and for all.

201804.text: If I want to know who I am?

201807.text: I want to see her so I can stop the blizzard.

201809.text: So you are the ones secretly sowing discord?

201810.text: After that, your wolf pack can go back to your former territory.

201811.text: They set up traps at the water source.

201813.text: (Tell him about the wolf stealing luggage)

201815.text: Stop hunting humans in the forest...

201816.text: What do you know about Saintess Cersivey?

201818.text: They want to drive you off to the foothills.

201819.text: I'm investigating the origin of the blizzard. May I have an audience with Saintess Cersivey?

201820.text: I just want to stop the blizzard and soothe everybody from such pain.

201821.text: It is the blizzard that will devastate this world.

201822.text: I saved this child. Please take care of her.

201823.text: How can the blizzard be stopped?

201824.text: (Tell it what happened in front of the castle)

201825.text: The only way to relieve everyone's suffering is to defeat her...

201831.text: Tell her the reason for entering the tower and wiping out the monsters.

201836.text: You are no match for the monster, you'd only...

201838.text: I remember that I entered the tower to eradicate monsters...

201840.text: Is there any way to stop the chaos from entering the tower?

201841.text: So the only way is to eliminate the source of the monsters...

201842.text: I see. And what about the chaos of this world?

201843.text: Eliminating the chaos of this world...

201845.text: Don't you think this unending blizzard is abnormal?

201846.text: I'm going to take a look at the mountain top.

201847.text: You need to help each other to survive the cold.

201848.text: I want to confirm it with my own eyes.

201849.text: If the Leader of the wolf pack consents...

201850.text: Tell him about searching for the wolf pack.

201851.text: Are you willing to reconcile with the Old Hunter?

201852.text: I'll climb to the mountain top and find a way to stop the blizzard.

201853.text: I will come up with an idea to drive the White Bear out of Frozen Lake.

201854.text: I still want to give it a try.

201855.text: Any idea where the bear was running to?

201857.text: You are the one who summoned the blizzard?

201858.text: The world is in chaos because of your blizzard.

201859.text: It's my mission to eliminate the chaos of this world.

201860.text: I remembered of something, something of great sorrow.

201862.text: But my memory is almost blank...

201867.text: I will find her for you.

201870.text: She was cold to me, yet she did help me.

201871.text: To save her companion, she distracted the monsters on her own.

201879.text: Which means... I can save Dejase this time?

201880.text: We need to act quickly to prevent the tragedy from happening.

201882.text: Stop talking... You need to rest...

201888.text: Can you tell me more about the Protector?

201889.text: What do you know about the treasure in the tower?

201890.text: Such complicated things are beyond my comprehension.

201891.text: But I was told there are ancient treasures hidden here.

201892.text: Some others are also studying the stele...

201893.text: (Tell the black cat about what the preacher said)

201894.text: I don't know who I should trust.

201895.text: Do you mean that I shouldn't trust anyone?

201896.text: Well, what about the Sacred Relic in the tower?

201898.text: I will not let you harm the innocent.

201899.text: Please look after the preacher, and I will go after Dejase.

201902.text: It's my fault... It's all my fault...

201907.text: I am not interested in treasures.

201909.text: Is the shapeshifted woman over there?

201911.text: Is this the Snegurochka that I once visited?

201914.text: It seems they are trying to suppress the Geothermal Activity here.

201916.text: Have you seen a huge White Bear?

201922.text: What are those cracks inside the boundary?

201923.text: Why did Cersivey have you fill the cracks?

201924.text: You are answering a question with a question...

201925.text: What does this have to do with driving the wolves out of their territory?

201926.text: Why are you telling me this?

201927.text: You are going into the boundary?

201928.text: So that's why you're going into the boundary?

201930.text: I want to get inside the boundary and make a thorough investigation.

201931.text: I think this is not the entrance.

201933.text: We can talk later. Deal with them first.

201936.text: It's dangerous here. We better be careful.

201937.text: There doesn't seem to be anything unusual about this place...

201938.text: I still need to go to the boundary on the hillside.

201941.text: Don't worry. I mean you no harm...

201943.text: Don't worry. I will take you back to your home.

201944.text: Because you are always hurting others.

201946.text: Even I did, he wouldn't believe it anyway.

201947.text: Just like he was destined to be attacked by the White Bear?

201949.text: (Tell it that you are looking for the boundary)

201951.text: Don't be afraid. I won't hurt you.

201952.text: You are starving, so you come here looking for food?

201953.text: You come back to your habitat for food?

201954.text: If you can't find any, you are gonna steal some from the village, right?

201957.text: If I help you find it...

201958.text: It seems the stored food is around here...

201961.text: That's not what I'm going to do.

201962.text: I just want to know the truth about this world...

201963.text: Why did you create this endless blizzard?

201964.text: (Tell her what happened after the blizzard calms down)

201966.text: Is it true that you summoned the blizzard to save the world?

201968.text: Why do others know nothing about it?

201970.text: I can offer my help, that way...

201971.text: (Tell them what the Frost Chivalric Order did)

201976.text: I can't just watch you die.

201978.text: Are you the only team around here?

201980.text: Are you protecting the geothermal cracks?

201984.text: Maybe they are connected to the Geothermal Surge...

201985.text: Please tell me what you know.

201987.text: What will happen if they awaken?

201988.text: If it was them who caused the Geothermy outbreak...

201990.text: To seize control of the Geothermal resources.

201993.text: (Tell him about the truth behind their dispute)

201994.text: (Give the warm clothes back to him)

201995.text: He said that he doesn't believe you are a despicable man.

201999.text: Excuse me, are there any cracks around here?

202006.text: So this is where all those monsters were coming from?

202008.text: Is this... the entrance to the castle?

202013.text: (Ask for clues about the Frost of Absolute Zero)

202014.text: This must be the place that the captain told me.

202018.text: The chaos will influence other worlds...

202019.text: All I can remember is that monsters were attacking the village...

202020.text: What about the magic circle that beckons the blizzard?

202022.text: I still need to find some Tear of Magic...

202024.text: What should I do to recover my memory?

202026.text: Shards of the Mirror of Irminsul?

202028.text: I just don't quite understand such a feeling...

202030.text: That is the reason I am willing to help.

202033.text: But the crops are vital to the villagers...

202034.text: ... Maybe I should ask Cersivey about that?

202035.text: Wolves have been living here for generations.

202036.text: I just recalled some of my old memories.

202037.text: Can it also save the world I lived in?

202038.text: You took away so many lives.

202039.text: But I only have those sorrowful memories.

202043.text: I'll bring you to the bottom of the tower for a rest.

202044.text: I don't know who I should help.

202047.text: Looks like a pattern of fire?

202048.text: When someone was trying to amend the cracks...

202049.text: Stop others from preventing the Geothermal Surge.

202053.text: Monsters attacked the villagers who had adopted me.

202054.text: The monsters from inside the tower?

202061.text: A forest filled with magic? I see... \n Master, please take some rest.

202063.text: I will bring you back in critical moments.

202065.text: It's an impenetrable barrier made of gems. Check other places first.

202068.text: Ah! This is the food I stored before. It was right around here the whole time!

202069.text: The snow in previous years was never this thick... Thank you! We can migrate to another place with this food.

202071.text: I trust you will make the right choice this time.

202072.text: Go. Put an end to the chaos in Snegurochka.

202073.text: Strength, only strength can save this deteriorating world!

202074.text: Have you found the food? It should be around here...

202076.text: I am not who I was before.

202077.text: Incomparable Dark Magic, born from Despair of the Abyss, grant me the power!

202078.text: I am the only chosen one!

202079.text: This is... Ah! Lord Fellagood, you are hurt.

202080.text: As I expected, you practiced the forbidden magic.

202081.text: Heretic, face the Sanction of Justice!

202083.text: You want to prevent your world from doom. That is your mission.

202084.text: But now is the time for me to stay true to my faith, and fulfill my duty as a chevalier.

202085.text: I have sworn to protect the world in the name of the chevalier. Now I shall honor my oath and put an end to this disorder.

202092.text: I'm sorry to have kept you waiting, master.

202093.text: There are some old magical facilities left in the courtyard. Do forgive me for taking the liberty of keeping them there. I trust they will prove helpful in your adventures.

202095.text: ... It's probably the curse of the wraith.

202097.text: Erm, you surely are an outsider. "The Clock Chiming at Midnight" —It's a story well known in Irminsul.

202098.text: Every night, the clock tower of Irminsul looms with drifting figures, and then come chimes, but no one goes in or goes out.

202099.text: What is in the clock tower? No one can tell.

202101.text: When did the Abnormality start? We don't have any clue. We only tried to do our best to stop it...

202102.text: At the beginning of the Abnormality, we sought help from guards, ovates, and even chevaliers, but they were all indifferent to our plight.

202103.text: Residents became more panicked. Some even suspected that the belfry might be cursed.

202104.text: Brave young men tore down the belfry but found nothing inside...

202105.text: Things got worse afterward, as though it was seeking revenge...

202107.text: Stop right there, the Sentry Camp is up ahead. The warriors were turned into insects and are fiercer than those you met earlier.

202109.text: Me? Hehehe... Frankly speaking, I was the master of this forest.

202111.text: Hahahaha. Are you joking? Guess I am right. You are not from this world!

202112.text: I was the Hunter of Irminsul, Inheritor of Lady Asherah, and Queen of the Forest.

202115.text: Are you not affected by the Abnormality?

202116.text: ... I Thought you were a witch from the other world. It turns out you are just a reckless wayfarer.

202117.text: I no longer linger in this Chronospace. What you see is my soul.

202119.text: You can see me and even communicate with me, which means the barriers of the Chronospace can't bind you.

202121.text: Some have indeed mentioned this to me.

202122.text: Forget about that now. Correct me if I'm wrong, but you are heading to the Throne of the Giant Tree, aren't you?

202123.text: The roads are perilous ahead. I will guide you.

202125.text: Are you looking for Asherah as well?

202126.text: Outsider, I will not stand in your way. I have my own reasons.

202127.text: Even with my eyes closed, I can find my way through the forest.

202129.text: We were beneficiaries of Lady Asherah, but now she becomes the source of pain...

202131.text: Although I am now in a spiritual form, I can see things more clearly. After that war, Lady Asherah has never left the throne. No one knows what happened.

202132.text: Now, we need to right the world from the chaos.

202136.text: Are you a spirit as well?

202138.text: I sensed a familiar smell, and couldn't help but walk out... I didn't smear your clothes, did I?

202140.text: My name? I... No one has ever asked about my name before.

202141.text: Croche... I almost forgot it. Sorry...

202142.text: I have never left this clock tower, or even this staircase since I can remember. I've been wandering here, God knows for how long...

202143.text: Your aura is different from before. You aren't from around here, are you?

202144.text: Please take me away from here. I am not familiar with this place anymore.

202147.text: ... Don't worry. I won't be your burden.

202148.text: If someone's wounded, I can heal...

202157.text: That's impressive, my Master, but please don't push yourself too hard.

202158.text: Having that said, I know you'll still lend a hand whenever someone needs help.

202159.text: Ah, you are the one who saved me before... Good to see you again.

202160.text: Any news on Dejase? I haven't seen her since we last parted and I'm really worried.

202161.text: She's tough, but her competitiveness may get her into trouble.

202162.text: (Tell her about Dejase assaulting the preacher)

202164.text: She is a gifted and extraordinary alchemist who just wants to learn powerful magic.

202165.text: Remember the scroll I gave you?

202167.text: It was found in the Church's library, recording clues to the lost magic.

202168.text: And all the clues are pointing directly to the Tower. That's why Dejase entered here.

202169.text: To restore my family to its glory days, I also need the help of this magic.

202170.text: The two of us share the same goal but Dejase is more obsessed with this mysterious power.

202173.text: Yes. She is really simple. All she wants is to learn more magic. Her motives are absolutely simpler than anyone else's.

202174.text: Trust me. She is not a bad person.

202175.text: But she assaulted the preacher of the Holy Church...

202177.text: I'm sorry for what happened but please... believe me.

202179.text: The Holy Church is not trustworthy. I have a hunch they are hiding something.

202180.text: I can't pin it down but I just don't believe them.

202181.text: Dejase would never be a demon's crony as the Church described. If you meet her again, please tell her I am here waiting for her. We will figure a way out together.

202186.text: I saw you around when I was injured, then you disappeared. Where were you?

202188.text: Don't wander around. There are heretics lurking nearby.

202191.text: It seems you can master some rare magic. Could you please tell me what it is?

202194.text: Never mind. One day you will also feel the love of God.

202195.text: You see these steles engraved with numbers?

202196.text: They are the clues left by God, guiding us to paradise.

202197.text: If you see one of these, please let me know as soon as possible. Your good deeds will win you the favor of God.

202199.text: Are you a human? It's dangerous here.

202202.text: Yes. A demon controller wanders around here, reaping human souls. Please leave here as soon as you can.

202204.text: What? You... you have defeated her...

202205.text: I'm Kyphon, Deliverer of the Underworld. My job is to guide the dead to their next life. Delivers are, in no way, allowed to hurt the living.

202206.text: Goorveig, however, signed a contract with demons. She neglected the duties of a Deliverer and reaped souls of the living.

202207.text: Troublesome as it may be, I will seize her no matter what.

202209.text: She manipulates Wraithscythe to reap the souls of the livings.

202210.text: Should you have any clue about her, please let me know as soon as possible.

202211.text: The sword impaled the body... Erm, as I expected, this stele records the information about the Holy Sword.

202212.text: The sword impaled the body of the Protector in ancient times, thus being named the Holy Sword.

202213.text: Yet, the words on the stele end here. Does that mean the Holy Sword is in this tower?

202218.text: The stele records clues on an ancient sword from many years past. That should be the Holy Sword I am looking for.

202220.text: He said the stele provided the clue on paradise?

202222.text: It says nothing but an ancient sword.

202223.text: There should be other steles within the tower. If you happen to see any of them, don't forget to tell me. I shall return the favor in one way or another.

202224.text: Ah, please spare me. I was just following orders...

202226.text: Yes. After our chieftain went missing, a summoner came, who could summon a powerful demon.

202227.text: She was shrouded in the aura of Darkness, way more powerful than the chieftain.

202228.text: It's you that are reaping souls, right?

202230.text: She threw souls into the magic circle and summoned a powerful demon.

202231.text: Ah, that aura of Darkness is so powerful...

202232.text: Tell me where she is. Otherwise...

202233.text: Threatening is useless. We only obey the strong. It's not you who defeated me!

202235.text: Can you tell me her whereabouts?

202236.text: Since you defeated me, I will tell you all I know.

202237.text: She is now at the magic circle, preparing for another summoning.

202238.text: To make sure that no one disturbs her, she has blocked the way with a statue.

202239.text: I knew it! She must have planned to summon Gordia, the Ancient Demongod.

202240.text: Blocked the way with a statue? Hmph, she cannot hide from me. I must stop her before it's too late!

202243.text: I should be the one asking.

202244.text: Don't you want to restore your family's glory? The Dark Magic has accepted me, and I shall master it in no time.

202245.text: With this power, your long-cherished wish will soon be fulfilled.

202246.text: Dejase, you are seemingly different now. You might be a bit too passionate about studying magic, but you will never ever harm others. I know that...

202247.text: You have been an extraordinary alchemist already. How about stopping these forbidden studies? As long as we...

202248.text: So naive! That's why you always rest on what you have owned.

202249.text: I'm nothing like you. I'll learn more powerful magic. Ah, I can feel the magic surging...

202250.text: Finally. I can feel it... My body is full of power now.

202252.text: You've changed. All you desired back then was to learn more about magic, and everything was quite simple at that time.

202253.text: That's why I lost to her... I won't be naive anymore!

202254.text: I will be stronger. Ah... this magic...

202258.text: Ah, have you seen all of that?

202261.text: I'm scared. Dejase has become totally different. She is not who she was...

202262.text: She used to be a pure-hearted scholar, studying all kinds of knowledge about magic.

202263.text: Now, it's like... she is being possessed...

202265.text: Please, only you can stop her and bring her back to normal.

202266.text: I'll try to find a way.

202268.text: Many thanks... Please be extra careful.

202269.text: I've dealt with the Holy Church. They are cunning, all of them.

202270.text: Don't trust a word they say. Be careful!

202271.text: As I expected, you practiced the forbidden magic.

202272.text: Forbidden magic? Is that what the Church is searching for?

202273.text: You are just being envious and only want to take it from me for yourself.

202275.text: You heretic, stay buried with the Dark Magic!

202276.text: How come? My elemental magic doesn't work?!

202281.text: I'll take care of you first, you feeble human.

202284.text: I was wondering who it could be. You again.

202285.text: I've changed. This time I won't lose!

202292.text: Dejase, I beg you. Come to your senses!

202293.text: I am Bluen. Do you remember?

202294.text: You took an oath to become one of the best alchemists.

202295.text: How can you be engulfed by mere darkness?

202296.text: Even the cleansing tool failed to purge you. It seems that the Dark Magic in you has fully grown.

202303.text: You have proven that the forbidden Dark Magic is way more powerful than the magic of the Church. It is paramount!

202307.text: It's a trial from God, and they played the role of handing God's magic to me.

202308.text: You are no threat to me.

202309.text: Thanks to you, the Dark Magic awakens as you fought with it.

202310.text: Ah, this voice... Is this the instruction of God?

202311.text: Ah, really? So this is the entrance to the other worlds?

202312.text: Bring other worlds into greater chaos? Well then, I shall complete your trial.

202313.text: Stop! You are not supposed to be here!

202314.text: I'm not supposed to be here? Haha, I am the chosen one!

202315.text: Those who stand in my way must die!

202316.text: Gone are the obstacles. None shall stop me!

202317.text: I'm all right. My magic is depleted, that's all. I just need some rest.

202319.text: She just passed out. Should be fine.

202320.text: Sorry. It's all because of me...

202321.text: Say no more. You need some rest...

202322.text: The other worlds he mentioned... Do they really exist?

202325.text: I have studied the runes on the wall. They record a way to reach other worlds.

202326.text: If possible... I would like to see them myself...

202327.text: But... the most important thing right now is to stop that preacher...

202328.text: The Dark Magic can control your mind. There once was a voice whispering in my head, gradually taking away my sanity...

202329.text: That power is highly dangerous. I have no idea what the preacher is planning to do with it, but he's definitely plotting something.

202331.text: Leave me here. Do what you must.

202334.text: No worries. I will look after them. Catch up and stop him!

202341.text: Who are you? Thanks for helping me.

202342.text: Those monsters flew here from the ground surface under us. Don't you know that?

202345.text: That's strange. Residents here should all know that. Are you an outsider then? Anyway, thanks for helping me.

202346.text: I live in the Celestial Palace in the Upper Domain. As a noble who can practice the magic more or less, I came to the Lower Domain to eliminate monsters with my fellows. However, we were ambushed by a mass of monsters and got separated. Now my magic is nearly exhausted...

202347.text: I can give you a hand.

202348.text: I can escort you to your fellows.

202349.text: Fantastic, thank you. Please send me to the checkpoint of the Upper Domain. My name is Lyne, by the way. Nice to meet you.

202350.text: Do you know how to get to the Upper Domain?

202354.text: It's not a place that I can visit. You know, a resident from the Lower Domain is not allowed to go to the Upper Domain.

202357.text: Believe me. I will never trespass on the Upper Domain. You must believe me.

202358.text: It seems this man doesn't know where the Upper Domain is. Let's go ask someone else.

202363.text: I see. The dark power is a fatal lure to humans. Some tried to dabble in the forbidden magic before and ended up being devoured by darkness. Human bodies simply cannot withstand such powerful magic.

202365.text: His life should be being devoured by the darkness as we talk. Perhaps soon enough...

202366.text: I need to find him as soon as possible.

202367.text: Such a hurry? Aren't you gonna stop her? Or have you given up after failing too many times?

202369.text: Where exactly is that colossus from?

202371.text: What a rush... Well, there must be some way after all...

202372.text: Ahhhh! Don't eat me! I beg you! Please don't eat me!

202374.text: Leave here. I will take care of these monsters.

202377.text: I am only carrying out my duties. It seems more monsters are flying up from the ground. You'd better get out of here.

202380.text: Ah, she is not from Cassiel, so she knows nothing about the invasion of monsters.

202381.text: No one knows when it all started. Suddenly, monsters began to spawn on the ground, madly attacking anyone in sight.

202382.text: In order to protect us, the Protector depleted her magic to lift the isles from the ground. There have been more and more of them lately, but I firmly believe that the Protector will save us again!

202384.text: Easy-peasy. It's not much of a warm-up.

202385.text: How? They have evolved with wings!

202386.text: Ugh... It is unbelievable! They can even evolve! No wonder they can keep showing up, despite the non-stop ascension of the Floating Isles...

202389.text: Are you all right? Ah, you are wounded? Don't worry. I'm Tuonel, from the village around here.

202390.text: The cut is so deep! I need to stop the bleeding first. Ah, no white flower left. It's the key to the styptic.

202391.text: No time for that. I need to send the message to...

202392.text: Hold still. I'll take you back to the village first to stop the bleeding.

202393.text: Yikes! The place where the white flowers grow has been occupied by monsters lately. What should I do?

202396.text: Don't worry. I mean you no harm...

202397.text: Is there anything I can help you with?

202398.text: Erm, you don't look like a bad person.

202399.text: I need a white flower to make a styptic to stop her bleeding, but this kind of flower grows in the northern Wilderness. And that place has been occupied by the monsters. I daren't go there. All I can do is to carry her to the village first.

202400.text: Don't worry, I'll get them for you.

202402.text: Really? But there are many monsters there! It's dangerous!

202405.text: You look confident. But still, be careful. I'll wait for you in the Tote Village at the end of the Wilderness. Run if it gets too dangerous. Don't push yourself too hard, please.

202406.text: White flowers could be found in the northern part. Their color makes them quite easy to spot.

202408.text: Hey, little girls there, go back home. This place is teeming with monsters.

202409.text: Tell him why you need white flowers.

202410.text: I am looking for white flowers...

202411.text: I'll help you pick white flowers and send them to the village. You'd better leave now. It's dangerous here.

202412.text: This is the place. White flowers should be around here. Let's go find some.

202413.text: Great! This is the white flower we need to stop the bleeding.

202420.text: It's dangerous here, flooded with monsters. Just leave quickly.

202423.text: What? You defeated the Magical Servants?

202424.text: Sorry. I should apologize first. I'm Datheios, the Balance Enforcer.

202425.text: The swarming monsters around have scared everyone away. Thus I arranged the Magical Servants here to deal with the monsters, but I didn't expect this would put you in danger.

202426.text: I almost committed a crime. I'm terribly sorry. Please forgive me.

202428.text: Don't do such a dangerous thing again.

202429.text: Thanks for your understanding. However, monsters' presence is getting frequent in this place. Don't linger around. It's unwise.

202430.text: Go through the eastern Wilderness, then cross a stone bridge, and you shall arrive at the Tote Village.

202434.text: You look like a noble sorcerer from the Upper Domain. Don't worry. I'm too old to give you any trouble.

202436.text: I am not a noble from the Upper Domain...

202437.text: Am I too old to catch your words? You must be joking. Rest assured. I always obey the order from the Upper Domain. I won't have conflicts with you.

202438.text: Are you lost? Can't find your way home?

202439.text: Do you need me to walk you home?

202440.text: ... Ah, the way home... If only I had a home to go back to.

202443.text: See the cliffs there...? Three days ago I still lived there!

202444.text: On that day, my son was playing with my grandson in the backyard, and my daughter-in-law was preparing lunch while I was taking a wooden basin full of laundry to the creek.

202445.text: Suddenly, the earth started trembling and the houses shook with it. It didn't take long before the earth just... cracked.

202446.text: God, it was a hellish scene! It felt like the end of the world.

202449.text: Although earthquakes have occurred in the Lower Domain a couple of times, no one expected such a thing would happen here!

202450.text: (Crying) My poor family... The entire village fell off!

202451.text: Good gracious... My home... Where is my home?

202453.text: That's terrible. They just fell off?

202454.text: Do you know anything about it?

202456.text: Meow? How would I know about that? But since Cassiel has been lifted, how can earthquakes strike it? And where could the hypocenter be?

202457.text: Maybe it has something to do with the monsters.

202458.text: Perhaps... A lot of strange things have happened since the preacher came here.

202459.text: Have you seen the monsters here before?

202461.text: I can't remember. Unlike the dark power that manipulates souls, these monsters have no thoughts. All they have is the impulse to destroy everything in sight. Keep your eyes wide open. They can be more than dangerous.

202462.text: What took them so long? Are they in trouble?

202463.text: Ah... Finally, you are back. It's nice to see you in one piece.

202466.text: Oh, thank you. The village is up ahead. I'll lead the way. Catch up!

202467.text: My home locates in the southeast of the village. Come quickly.

202468.text: I saw beautiful wildflowers in the fields outside the village. I wanna pick some. Let's regroup over there!

202471.text: Of course, I will be fine.

202473.text: Sorcerer of the Upper Domain, stop! Don't get closer!

202476.text: You are not welcome here. You have robbed us of everything valuable. What else do you want?

202477.text: Spare me! I have handed over all my crops. There's nothing more I can offer to the Protector.

202478.text: I have no food left. Nothing! Please!

202479.text: There's nothing we can offer. Please spare us.

202481.text: I have never done such things...

202482.text: Liar! The neighboring village was destroyed by sorcerers from the Upper Domain. All of the villagers were slain...

202484.text: True! My little sister lived there. Her family was all killed by your kind. Three lives!

202486.text: I'll take care of the styptic.

202487.text: It's done. I'll paste it on you, and bandage your wounds. It will hurt a little.

202489.text: Okay. The wound has stopped bleeding. You'd better lie down and rest for a few days. Feel free to recover at my home.

202490.text: Thank you... I'm Nemesi, a resident of the Lower Domain.

202491.text: You are welcome. Take a good rest. I'll go fetch some water.

202493.text: Please spare us. The drought is getting worse, and our crops are doomed. We don't have any left.

202494.text: Right. The farmland in the north is occupied by monsters. No one dares to farm there anymore.

202495.text: There is less and less space to farm, and we don't have any provisions left.

202496.text: Should it not be the nobles of the Upper Domain, you were all killed by monsters. Don't you feel obliged to hand over some crops as tributes?

202497.text: We thank you for killing the monsters, but the crops are running short, far from enough...

202498.text: Not handing out your crops will be treated as disobeying the Protector.

202499.text: (To his men) Hey, listen up. By order of the Protector, we shall confiscate all of their crops.

202500.text: Move. Stay out of our way!

202502.text: Ah, you must be the assassin who frequently assaults sorcerers in the Lower Domain! This morning you also attacked the guards who were escorting the crops in the neighboring village.

202503.text: You people know nothing other than robbing our crops. It's time to make you pay.

202504.text: You may know how to fight, but that doesn't change the fact that you're just a commoner incapable of magic. Time for you fool to witness the true might of magic.

202506.text: Well, well. Barking dogs don't bite.

202510.text: Reprehensible! As a sorcerer, you dare to help these rioters! You will pay for that!

202512.text: Thank you for your assistance. I am Nemesi, working with the Alliance of the Rebellions. I will never forget your kindness.

202513.text: Ah. The Alliance of the Rebellions... That secret group fighting against the Upper Domain tyranny?

202514.text: Yes. We all had enough of their slavery and exploitation. We had kept silent only because we couldn't use magic.

202515.text: But our silence will only encourage them. We will meet our ends in their hands long before the monsters finish us.

202516.text: Therefore, we founded the Alliance of the Rebellions. United, we will topple their tyranny. I took my orders to stop those who lord it over the Lower Domain.

202517.text: But we're no match for them...

202518.text: Right, they can wield magic after all...

202519.text: I am an apothecary. I can offer my help if you don't mind.

202521.text: Although you can wield magic, you are a kind-hearted person, unlike other sorcerers. Will you join us?

202524.text: Good. We have a new companion. I just fought too hard, and now the wound hurts...

202525.text: Can I ask you a favor?

202528.text: I was going to meet our leader under the tree at the end of the Flower Fields outside the village, but now I can't make it. Can you go there to tell him I am recovering here and the residents are willing to join the Alliance?

202531.text: Thank you. Set a pile of leaves on fire under the tree at the entrance to the Flower Fields. It's our signal.

202532.text: Here's my dagger. Show it to him and he will trust you.

202533.text: I'm sorry for mistaking you as one of the bastards of the Upper Domain. They never labor but just loot all our crops!

202534.text: Our ancestors used to live on the ground. Later, the monsters swarmed in, and the Protector used magic to lift Cassiel to the sky and protect us against them.

202535.text: Decades ago, though, the monsters started to have wings, but only for a small number. The sorcerers from the Upper Domain eliminated them quickly.

202536.text: But now, more and more monsters appear. As we depend on the Upper Domain sorcerers to fend off the monsters, we have remained silent to their tyranny.

202537.text: The Floating Isles keep rising, which is harming the crop's output. If it keeps up like this, all of us will starve to death.

202538.text: In the air, Cassiel was split into different floating isles. Sorcerers control the Upper Domain. With abundant resources, they have built prosperous cities there.

202539.text: Those who can't cast spells are not allowed to enter the Upper Domain. This land under our feet is called the Lower Domain. We've been working on this land for generations. We hand over most of our crops in exchange for the sorcerers' protection.

202541.text: Yes. Only sorcerers can defeat those monsters. But as the harvests of these past years are getting worse to a point where we don't even have enough for our own, they still force us to hand over the crops. We cannot bear it anymore.

202542.text: As if things weren't hard enough, earthquakes are striking the margin of the Floating Isles. Rumor has it that an entire village has fallen off. People are panicking.

202543.text: Do you know what causes those earthquakes?

202544.text: They have occurred several times just around here. We're scared. Some say they saw sorcerers around a few days before the earthquakes.

202545.text: Others believe it's the sorcerer's revenge on those villagers' noncompliance. That's why we were frightened when you came to the village.

202546.text: Ah, I am sorry for mistaking you for the spiteful sorcerers.

202547.text: Why do you hate the sorcerers so much?

202548.text: (Sigh) The neighboring village fell off the Floating Isles a few days ago. None survived. My poor sister... All of her family...

202549.text: Before the accident, some saw sorcerers in the village. It must be their deeds.

202552.text: Oh, I don't have any proof yet, but the noble sorcerers came here last week and took all the crops.

202553.text: Now, we hide our crops in other places. I hid mine by the Flower Fields. There's a secret passage. Few know it.

202554.text: But I am still worried. Can you take a look for me when you pass by? Just to make sure the crops are safe.

202555.text: Also, I have left some savings in the Flower Fields. If you find the crops, consider that money as my thanks.

202557.text: You are... the girl who gathered flowers before. What are you doing here?

202559.text: Don't linger around. This place is infested with monsters. It's quite dangerous.

202563.text: This is... Why do you have Nemesi's dagger?

202565.text: I see. The wounded one you mentioned before turned out to be Nemesi. Thank you for taking care of her. I'm Garditis.

202566.text: But I am still confused... You are not a resident of Cassiel? Then why did you come here?

202569.text: A preacher? Ah, I did notice a strange man appearing in the Lower Domain recently. He has been murmuring about something like forbidden magic. No one has a clue about what he says.

202571.text: My companion has seen him at the checkpoint. You may find clues there. I am going to pay a visit to Nemesi. Will you come with me?

202572.text: No, I need to go after the preacher.

202573.text: Monsters are running rampant here. Keep your eyes peeled. Goodbye then.

202574.text: I've found my way home. Thank you. Keep this flower.

202577.text: Don't worry. I can also wield magic to eliminate the monsters. I'll be off then. Bye.

202578.text: Welcome, my master. Who was that girl?
