202580.text: You are always helping others. So kind...

202581.text: Ah, my apology. I'm here to inform you that the wounded alchemist and elementalist have been properly treated. They shall recover soon as long as they rest well, so please don't worry about them.

202585.text: I feel something is staring at us but it could just be my illusion.

202586.text: Master, please have a good rest. Don't push yourself too hard. I'll be waiting for you at the Hall of Origin.

202587.text: She is with that human this time...

202588.text: What a disaster! The transport team was ambushed by monsters. All those crops... We worked so hard to collect them!

202589.text: I escaped alone but I'm afraid the rest of us didn't make it... Nothing went smooth in the Lower Domain this time.

202592.text: You are... the one who stood in my way! Were it not for you, we could have finished collecting the crops long ago.

202593.text: It's all your fault! We had to harvest the crops in the foothills by ourselves. We didn't expect to be ambushed by monsters. My dear fellows...

202596.text: We are just following the orders from the great Protector. If we don't collect enough food here, everyone in the Upper Domain will starve.

202597.text: We bleed or even die to fight the monsters in the Lower Domain. Is there any problem asking those villagers to provide us with some crops?

202598.text: But people in the Lower Domain also need to feed themselves.

202599.text: They know nothing about magic. Are you going to count on them to fight against monsters? That's ridiculous!

202600.text: No. I can't go back like this. I have to save my fellows!

202602.text: Ribbit. The locals work hard just like my kind, but why are the crops so stunted...

202603.text: Is that because of the scorching sunlight? Ribbit. If the situation goes on, the villagers here will have to starve again.

202604.text: Evil monster, face Phrygia, the Glorious Chevalier of Irminsul!

202607.text: Ah, good to see you again. The catch-up can wait. Let me deal with this big guy first.

202608.text: Fear not. I have slain the monster.

202609.text: Thank you for avenging my fellows. I don't see the point in staying here then...

202610.text: Croak. It's good to see you in one piece.

202612.text: How did you end up here?

202613.text: Ribbit. I am not so sure. I've been traveling around, seeking a way to lift the curse. But still, nothing substantial.

202614.text: I saw that monster attacking him. As a chevalier, I'm obliged to step forward and protect those in need.

202616.text: Didn't expect that the people in this world are also in great danger. I can't just sit by and watch. Ribbit. I've decided to help the residents of the Lower Domain.

202617.text: I will help the Tote Village get rid of monsters first. May the blessings be with you too.

202618.text: Terrified of the powerful while bullying the weak... This land is full of injustice. The rebels only wish to survive. There's nothing wrong with that.

202619.text: Maybe Garditis is right. This world needs a revolution. The Protector's three magic items are indeed necessary... They are the keys to changing everything.

202620.text: Ah, you are... You'd better not linger around. Monsters are becoming more active these days. It's dangerous here.

202621.text: (Tell him you're looking for the preacher)

202622.text: Have you seen a strange preacher?

202623.text: Yes, I have seen one. The magic he used is so sickening that it's still fresh in my mind.

202624.text: I've warned the Magical Guards many times that he cannot be trusted, but the guards believe his magic can help eliminate monsters. They've fully cooperated with him.

202627.text: The Magical Guards, composed of sorcerers of the Upper Domain, are loyal to the Protector. Usually, they safeguard the stability of Cassiel. When the monsters show up to wreak havoc, they are also responsible for eliminating them.

202628.text: The Upper Domain has asked the Lower Domain to turn in crops. It's the Magical Guards who are in charge of collecting crops from the Lower Domain. Due to the decreasing yields, conflicts often break out between the Magical Guards and the villagers.

202629.text: If you want to find that hateful man, search around the ruins of the Pelenier Village.

202630.text: That village has been razed and occupied by monsters. The Magical Guards and that man are planning on how to repel the monsters there.

202634.text: Thanks to Tuonel, I feel much better. Also, thank you.

202635.text: Lord Garditis has asked me to get in touch with other villages in the hope of uniting all of them to fight against the merciless sorcerers.

202638.text: We are seeking companions who are willing to overthrow the tyranny together. However, as monsters frequent everywhere, our communication is at the risk of being interrupted.

202639.text: I can help you eliminate the monsters.

202640.text: Lord Garditis and I both trust your magic, but please take care of yourself, for there is no perfectly safe combat. I'm going to complete my quest. See you.

202641.text: Ribbit. Good to see you again.

202644.text: I've met the leader of the rebels, whose courage is more than admirable. I hear sorcerers are forcing villagers to hand out their crops. Phrygia, the Chevalier of Irminsul, swears to help those in need.

202645.text: May the light shine upon your path forward.

202646.text: This cunning man tricked us all!

202649.text: The Magical Guards just got a new sorcerer whose magic can weaken monsters. Other members were sent here to assist him with eliminating the monsters nearby.

202650.text: It turned out that guy could manipulate those monsters!

202653.text: His magic is something that we've never seen before. The monsters he controlled attacked us crazily. I'm the only one that managed to escape.

202654.text: I need to report this to the superior as soon as possible. I cannot let my fellows die in vain.

202657.text: I was wondering who that could be. Just a useless little girl. You see, this is the evidence of my power. I have been endowed with God's power.

202658.text: The die is cast. You don't stand a chance!

202660.text: I just want to restore order...

202661.text: With this power, it's easy to either bring order or destruction to a world. Look, even these inferior creatures can sense the power of my magic, and fully heed my orders.

202663.text: Haha. I am chosen to inherit God's power. With the help of these monsters, I can snatch the Sacred Relic at the top of the tower and become the new God.

202664.text: It seems you also know some peculiar magic. Sooner or later, you will stand in my way. C'mon, hand over your magic now and let it be part of my strength!

202665.text: Why? Why can you possess such power?

202666.text: Impossible. I'm supposed to be the new God. This power can only be mine!

202667.text: I will get the Sacred Relic, the symbol of God.

202670.text: Better check on your friends first. Hahahaha!

202672.text: Is that the voice of the gigantic monster under the Floating Isles? Has it awoken? I'll send someone to check. Are you alright?

202675.text: We met the escaping noble from the Upper Domain. He told us you were after that monster manipulator alone. We were worried about you, so here we are.

202678.text: Monsters are piling up. If this keeps up, more people will get killed.

202679.text: People here are scared of monsters and can only rely on sorcerers to deal with them. That's why they have to put up with their exploitation

202680.text: If we manage to slay the monsters nearby, people shall be more confident that they don't need to seek help from the Upper Domain. Then more will be willing to be united to overthrow the tyranny.

202681.text: Phrygia, the Chevalier of Irminsul, will come to help. Are you coming?

202682.text: Hang on. Can I take a look at that ring?

202685.text: I'm not so sure, but I think I once saw this ring in the Sanctuary. Why is it in your hands?

202687.text: In this case, he probably stole it from the Sanctuary. It must be crucial, but I'm not sure about its abilities.

202688.text: Keep it well. You may need it someday.

202689.text: Good to see you. You look on edge.

202691.text: Exactly as I expected, humans may be driven by their ambition to taste the forbidden magic, which will eventually get them devoured. Those who have been allured by this magic won't give it up easily.

202692.text: Oh no, the others in the tower...

202693.text: Calm down. Don't you still have a mission to fulfill here? Plus, the preacher is injured and needs time to recover.

202695.text: Relax. No one can control that power except you. Others who dabble in it will only result in self-destruction. Rest assured and go fulfill your mission.

202701.text: (Yawning) What is this place? Who are you? I only remember I was chasing after a butterfly...

202703.text: I see. I was too tired and fell asleep here. (Weeping) I don't know this place. Is this what people called 'the Lower Domain'?

202704.text: I didn't expect I would come here, just for a butterfly. What should I do now? I can't find my way back...

202705.text: Ask her where her home is.

202707.text: I live in the Sanctuary. I know the Upper Domain very well. If you can take me to the Upper Domain, I can easily find my way home.

202709.text: Are you worried that I may be attacked by the monsters? Thank you. I'm Afallen. Nice to meet you.

202711.text: Ah, there's someone I know. Garditis!

202712.text: Afallen, you are supposed to guard the entrance to the Sanctuary. Why are you here?

202713.text: I saw a beautiful butterfly and wanted to play with it, so I kept chasing. The next thing I knew, I am here already.

202714.text: This kind missy is willing to escort me to the Upper Domain.

202715.text: So it is. Afallen is a sweet but naive child. She might fall prey to monsters. Please, escort her back to the Upper Domain safe and sound.

202716.text: I have other matters to attend to, see you.

202717.text: Why is Garditis leaving in such a hurry?

202719.text: He seems to have something urgent.

202720.text: Garditis was the gatekeeper of the Sanctuary but resigned in pursuit of a free life. Then, the Protector asked me to guard the Sanctuary instead.

202721.text: I didn't expect that he has come to the Lower Domain.

202726.text: The Lower Domain has been quite dangerous recently with a mass of monsters hanging out. I'm on my way back to the Sanctuary. Afallen, are you coming with me?

202728.text: Afallen, wait for me at the junction ahead. I need to have a word with this miss.

202729.text: I've heard many things about you, helping the residents of the Lower Domain, eliminating monsters, and even defeating that monster manipulator. Thanks to you, the villagers have regained their confidence.

202730.text: You made the impossible possible. Truly marvelous.

202731.text: Now that Garditis has a friend like you, maybe he can truly bring a revolution to this world...

202734.text: Once he is determined, he will work hard for what he wants. I do admire his perseverance.

202735.text: He used to guard the Sanctuary. Having witnessed the atrocities committed in the Lower Domain, he decided to unite the suppressed villagers to overthrow the tyranny. He has been showing up nearby, trying to contact his companions from different villages.

202736.text: Of course, the nobles of the Upper Domain have noticed that. Even the Sanctuary has sent its assassins. When you see him, please remind him to take care of himself.

202737.text: Who sent you? The Upper Domain? Or the Protector in the Sanctuary?

202739.text: You are the target of Inn & Lou. That's all you need to know.

202740.text: Ah, it's you. Why are you here?

202742.text: So the Sanctuary sent them, I see...

202743.text: You over there. Since you are helping our target, you shall be put on the wanted list as well.

202744.text: Mission failed. Need to find another opportunity.

202745.text: Thank you for saving me. These two kids should be the Twin Executors from the Sanctuary. Top-class assassins.

202746.text: I'm contacting my allies in this area and we shall make a strike against the gigantic monster.

202748.text: You haven't seen it? There's a gigantic monster perching under the clouds. On this giant lives numerous monsters that take it as a springboard to invade the Lower Domain.

202749.text: It's always believed that the constant ascending of Floating Isles is the only way to keep Cassiel safe, for the monsters from the ground are too many to be all eradicated.

202750.text: If the gigantic monster can be defeated, the residents of the Lower Domain and even the sorcerers of the Upper Domain will probably change their minds.

202751.text: As long as we are united, we can defeat that gigantic monster. Once this giant is defeated, there's no need to keep the Floating Isles ascending.

202752.text: My friend, I need to contact my fellows. We'll team up to repel that gigantic monster.

202753.text: Our strength may not be enough, but with your help, we shall defeat the gigantic monster. Please help us.

202756.text: Great! I will lead the villagers to the shelters first. Nemesi will lure that big one to the Spiral Perch. Dear friend, let's regroup there and kill the monster!

202760.text: Ah! Nice to see you again. What a surprise! I heard the Alliance of the Rebellions is uniting a team to repel that gigantic monster.

202761.text: I am not a warrior, but I wanna offer my help. Here is the healing potion made for Nemesi, but I couldn't find her anywhere.

202762.text: I will hand it to her.

202763.text: Thank you. The villagers all tried to persuade me not to come here because of the monsters. Since you can help me with this, I feel relieved now.

202765.text: Finally, the luring potion that I hid before can be put to good use. This time, we shall kill that gigantic monster. Who is there? Show yourself.

202768.text: Thank you. I need to lure the big one to the Spiral Perch. We will destroy it this time. I'll see you there.

202771.text: Cassiel didn't have such a tremendous monster before, at least not in my memory, although I could be wrong.

202772.text: It's impossible to defeat it with just a single blow. Fighting against it can be quite dangerous. Meow. Take care.

202773.text: Here you come. This place should be far enough in case of hurting the innocent during the combat.

202774.text: Let me deal with this big one...

202775.text: Rest assured. We will handle those smaller ones!

202779.text: There will be no more earthquakes!

202780.text: I extend my greatest gratitude to you. Without you, we couldn't have united, let alone defeated this gigantic monster.

202781.text: Now everyone has regained their confidence, eager to get back down to the ground and start a new life.

202782.text: The only obstacle that lies now is the ruling of the Upper Domain. We will negotiate with the Protector to lower the Floating Isles down to the ground.

202785.text: What? Why? The gigantic monster is not the cause of the earthquakes?

202787.text: I guess we'll have to go up to find the answer.

202788.text: Seems that it's not yet the time to celebrate. See you in the Upper Domain.

202791.text: Dejase, how dare you practice the forbidden magic? It's not too late to give up now! Otherwise, the Church will have you executed...

202792.text: Anemone, even you try to hinder my studies? It's just long-lost magic. If I can master it, I'll never lose to you again...

202793.text: Huh? Anemone never lose! Anemone will strike you down and bring you back to the Church!

202795.text: See? As long as I am able to master more magic, no one will be able to stand against the great alchemist!

202796.text: Why... the gifted alchemist... is defeated by Anemone...

202797.text: Hahahaha... I admire your courage to challenge Anemone!

202798.text: It's not over yet! You who seek the dark have will earn your last slumber in darkness!

202808.text: You are?... I see. That's why you are following her?

202809.text: Are you still sitting on the sidelines?

202810.text: I have no reason to help you.

202812.text: But I'm in no position to judge as well.

202814.text: The error will merely keep repeating itself pointlessly...

202815.text: Silverbow is our enemy. As long as he is here, the fight will never end!

202816.text: I want to clear this misunderstanding...

202817.text: There's no need for a dispute.

202819.text: Stay away from the mountain top!

202822.text: It's of no use. Even if you defeated the Protector at the mountain top, this world would still face its destruction.

202824.text: I'll find the source of the blizzard.

202825.text: So stubborn... You leave me no choice but to stop you with my own hands!

202826.text: So, I'm not able to stop you after all...

202827.text: Whatever, you will soon know it's pointless!

202828.text: Maybe the grudge between you and the Old Hunter...

202829.text: My friend... Maybe you are right, but we need proof. Otherwise, the young men at my command won't believe it.

202830.text: One day, you will join us.

202831.text: You will become... the great Protector...

202832.text: Recently, soldiers started patrolling around the villages, and even the delicate flowers sense the unease... If the war can end sooner, more people will return to the garden.

202834.text: Is this the soul-reaping monster that the villagers talked about? This is my garden, though. You are not welcome here.

202835.text: Naughty ones, you will learn your lesson. Hehe.

202838.text: Ah, the wound on my belly... I can't just wither here...

202839.text: It's bleeding. I can't fight like this...

202840.text: (Panting)... I should be safe here... My garden...

202843.text: Didn't expect a human would notice me in the darkness. Ah, the smell of blood... Human, are you injured?

202844.text: Not a step closer... You stink of an inhuman smell... Are you manipulating monsters in secret? I won't... let you ruin the flowers...

202845.text: Ah... fainted... Hello? Human, wake up.

202846.text: Agh, blood everywhere. Why is it like this? I came here for fun!

202847.text: A wound on the belly? Let me see... Ah, a deep cut. Just wrap it up...

202848.text: There we go. Sorry. I had to rip off your clothes a bit... It feels even smaller than mine... No, this is...

202849.text: Sorry for lifting your skirt. This is...

202851.text: Human, you are awake. Don't move. I just stopped the bleeding.

202853.text: Yes. You fainted. I dressed your wound. You should be grateful. I'm not this kind-hearted to a human usually.

202855.text: I'm Nocturna. Ella promised me to hang out together in Lunia, but she didn't show up! I waited quite a while, and when I was about to leave, I saw you. Human, what are you looking for?

202856.text: There are no tooth marks here...

202858.text: That's rude! I am a noble vampire, not some inferior minion. I don't feed on blood! Humans are always impudent like this!

202859.text: Sorry... Everyone says vampires are evil bloodsucking creatures, so I took you as the monster manipulator.

202860.text: I shall accept your apology. But it's odd for you to dress like this. Is it a hobby of yours?

202862.text: Yes. I saw it when I was dressing your wound.

202864.text: Don't worry. I won't force you to spit it out. You must have your reasons. I have mine as well. Even Ella, my best friend, doesn't know it.

202866.text: Erm, so, Mortimer, where are you going next?

202868.text: Naughty creatures. How dare you interrupt our conversation!

202869.text: Mortimer, do you want me to walk you home?

202870.text: I don't have a home... My garden is occupied by monsters. I can't get rid of them on my own. I want to go to the castle. I need to tell the Grand Duke that monsters attacked here, hoping he will send troops to eliminate them.

202871.text: The castle where the Grand Duke of Lunia lives? Erm, I've never been there. Seems Ella won't show up anyway. I'll go with you to the castle.

202873.text: Foul beings. In the name of God, Eulalia will purge you.

202874.text: That's Princess Eulalia! Let's help her out!

202875.text: Slow down. Your wound hasn't recovered yet...

202877.text: Don't worry. Even vampires will not be discriminated against on this land.

202878.text: Monsters invaded the garden as well as the villages nearby. Princess, could you please ask the Grand Duke to send the troops and kill these monsters?

202879.text: Sorry. I have left the castle. My father doesn't heed my words anymore... But I will not turn a blind eye to these monsters.

202880.text: My guards are fighting them in the wilds. I came here for recon but got attacked. I am worried about the guards. Will you join me and go to the wilds?

202881.text: Your highness... This is my... This is my honor. We will escort you there!

202882.text: Hey! Don't make decisions for me!

202884.text: Your highness... Pull yourself together. Monsters are coming.

202888.text: Your highness. I can't make it... The monsters... are being manipulated... by that strange woman. She is reaping our souls...

202890.text: She headed to... the forest there...

202892.text: No need for that. He has fulfilled his mission. God has claimed his soul...

202894.text: The one behind all this should be in the forest. For the people of this land, I request your help...

202895.text: Ah! Human, why do you kneel?

202896.text: Your highness... Please get up. We will try our best.

202897.text: Thank you... That villain won't be far. Let us catch up.

202899.text: Have you just made another decision for me... Human, wait up!

202901.text: Exactly. How dare a human question me like that... I am Goorveig, the very one leading this world into chaos...

202902.text: Enough of your nonsense. Why are you summoning monsters here?

202904.text: Huhu. What an impatient human. When monsters appear, humans will ally and fight. But what about a country already in a civil war?

202905.text: People in this country have been torn by war. There's no way for them to spare any effort for an army against the monsters... How despicable...

202906.text: Hehe... Such short-sighted beings like humans will bring destruction upon themselves. Leaving these souls to the Underworld is such a waste. I am merely making good use of them...

202907.text: Is that the reason why you ruined my garden? Unforgivable...

202908.text: This aura... Hehe. No wonder of your impudence. You're also a... Even dressing up like this...

202910.text: Waaaaagh... Your highness, don't listen to her nonsense. For the safety of this land, we must take her down!

202911.text: Hehe, how insolent. Bit by bit, I'll make you my captive.

202912.text: Curse you. Not enough souls. The contract has not been fulfilled...

202913.text: I can't fall here. For the ritual of resurrection, I need more souls...

202914.text: It's a fascinating adventure. Human, you have sated my curiosity. I'm going back to Ella. Are you coming with me to Muntenia?

202915.text: My garden was ruined by monsters. I'm not in the mood for that...

202916.text: Mortimer, can you stay with Eulalia?

202918.text: People of this country have suffered the rough of war. Your magic shall heal this land as blossom. My power is far from enough, but I will help bring the peace back to this land with all my forces.

202919.text: Eulalia dreams of a country where everyone is equal. Will you join Eulalia?

202920.text: Your highness... my humble work is nothing more than tending flowers. Unlike your... noble deeds...

202921.text: What are you talking about? I believe you will be the fragrant rose of this country.

202922.text: Your highness, I shall follow you to the end of this world...

202923.text: Erm, are these the so-called lovers among humans?

202925.text: Waaaaagh... Vampire, stop! Aren't you leaving? Hurry up...

202926.text: Thanks for your help. You are not from Lunia, I suppose?

202927.text: Looks like my mission ends here.

202928.text: But... my master... It's not over for you yet.

202929.text: Silver-haired human, you are bound to become a great inheritor...

202930.text: Catch up. The power is yours to claim.

202931.text: You are... the inheritor... of the great... Lady Ereshkigal...

202932.text: For thousands of years, we lost our faith, lurking in the dark...

202933.text: You are the only light... that shines through us...

202934.text: Take back the power that belongs to you, please...

202939.text: What a huge monster. This will be a hard fight.

202940.text: Watch out. It has noticed us.

202941.text: Even without the order of the Protector, I will not look on with folded arms when seeing evil deeds.

202942.text: Phrygia, the Chevalier of Irminsul, will not allow you to harm the innocent.

202943.text: That ability of Ereshkigal, once again...

202944.text: Ah, great Gordia, I, your faithful follower, am here to offer souls to you. The humiliation that the sword maiden Akasha gave you will soon be cleansed.

202947.text: You are giving off the same aura of darkness. You should follow the great Demongod just like me.

202949.text: I can't fall here. No one can stop Gordia's great revival.

202953.text: It's too dangerous ahead. If you keep going and step into the maelstrom of miseries, you shall lose your life.

202955.text: Leave her alone... She cannot be saved...

202957.text: Well then, please forgive my manners!

202958.text: It seems that after all, I cannot stop you.

202959.text: My master, perhaps this time, things will be different...

202960.text: The possibility of the existence of a 'future'...

202961.text: A new gigantic monster appears... It must be because of the crazy deeds of that preacher...

202962.text: No. I can't leave the master in danger...

202965.text: ... Huh? The elemental magic is nothing near the simple trick you just said. I would argue that alchemy is the lowest form of magic of all.

202966.text: Excuse me? Are you talking about the magic that alters the very existence of substance?!

202968.text: Where have you been the other day anyway? Pretended to be sick and practiced your tricks alone?

202969.text: Haven't we promised to learn together and see who's the smarter one when we grow up?

202970.text: Hahaha. You can't learn without me? Dejase the weeper.

202972.text: I just nodded off a little while, and there was a dream. Slacked too much these days...

202973.text: ... The investigation has lasted three days. Still nothing. How can I get into that tower?

202974.text: Damn... So close, yet so far away.

202975.text: Fidgeting doesn't help. I need to change my mood.

202976.text: It's been days since I practiced combat spells. Sorry little bats, consider it as biological research.

202977.text: Glad I'm not returning empty-handed. I can bring this back for analysis.

202979.text: Was... that alchemy? Are you an alchemist? May I know your name?

202980.text: I am an alchemist. How can I help you?

202981.text: Sorry, I should have introduced myself first. Bluen Agilolfing, at your service. I am gathering a party to enter the Chrono Tower.

202982.text: Chrono Tower? Have you found the way to open that door?

202983.text: Not yet. Besides, I don't have any companions yet... But with the help from a reliable ally like you, we will soon get ourselves in the tower.

202984.text: I'm sorry. This may be abrupt... but would you like to join me? If it is the payment you seek, I will offer my best.

202985.text: Hehe, payment? You sound like a noble lady. Your words always sound so nice and easy.

202986.text: In the name of House Agilolfing, I swear I will honor my words...

202987.text: You swear? An agreement is not a spell. Why would you believe in such childish things?

202988.text: I'm not interested in your noble affairs. I'm leaving if there's nothing else you need me for. Bye.

202989.text: You also seek to enter the Chrono Tower, don't you? If you would change your mind, do come to me anytime!

202991.text: (I didn't realize that so many people had fixed their eyes on this place.)

202992.text: I've collected enough samples. Time to go back to analyze.

202994.text: Miss... I... I'm a bad guy!

202995.text: Huh? Where did you come from? With that strange head-wear of yours?

202996.text: Did you have too much fun here and get lost? Where are you going?

202998.text: Where am I going? Erm... The Chrono Tower!

202999.text: What's wrong with me today? I'm like a magnet for strange people, all targeting at the Chrono Tower.

203000.text: Listen. Don't waste your time joking with me. Get back to where you've come from. You can find your way home, right?

203002.text: I have been delayed for too long. I need to head back home now.

203004.text: Forget it. I need to focus on my own business.

203006.text: Damn, my bottle! All the samples...

203008.text: Not you again. Am I cursed today?

203009.text: I told you to go back home! Don't you know it's dangerous here at night?

203010.text: But I'm lost for real. I wanna go to the Chrono Tower.

203011.text: Horrific miss, could you please take me there?

203012.text: The Chrono Tower, right? I just met a kind girl who wishes to go there.

203014.text: I'll bring you there. What's your name?

203016.text: (Hope these two can get along and have fun for themselves. Just leave me be.)

203018.text: Still can't do this on my own? I've been working so hard. Why...

203019.text: I need to get up. I can still fight. Ha...

203022.text: Ah, I've had enough. It's really a tough journey!

203023.text: Thanks for your help... Ah, you're the one I met earlier...

203024.text: Your wound doesn't look too serious. I have some spare potions. Take them.

203025.text: You have returned to me. Have you changed your mind?

203028.text: Mister, you have had enough materials already. Why do we still need to look for monsters?

203030.text: Hold on. Did you just cast magic? You didn't wield a wand or chant spells. Who on earth are you?

203031.text: Seems like that your brain doesn't work better than mine. Got lost as usual and couldn't count well either. Haha!

203034.text: Get up. Are you wounded? Ah, this is...

203036.text: I'm Ella. Miss. This lady told me to go to the Chrono Tower with you!

203041.text: You can't fool me. How can an ordinary person wield such powerful magic?

203043.text: (Sob)... I am not from here. I come from Muntenia...

203044.text: My tail... I am a Dragonoid. I'll be laughed at if I reveal my tail here.

203045.text: The kid's magic... the first year?

203046.text: I came here to play, not for mischief...(Sob)...

203047.text: Enough! You might find delight in mocking us, but we don't consider your jokes interesting!

203048.text: Huh? It's just a common magic, an introductive spell for kids.

203049.text: A Muntenian can't fail in mastering such a spell, unless being sick.

203050.text: I've learned from books that humans can only live for decades...

203052.text: That's enough. Just enjoy your privilege of being born a strong one but never meddle in my affairs.

203053.text: Sure! Then, we learn the summoning magic in the second year. In the third year...

203054.text: Anyway, you've come back to join me, right? We indeed share the same target.

203055.text: Sorry... I didn't know you would be mad about this...

203056.text: It's splendid to have you on board. I believe we can find a way to the Tower very soon.

203057.text: Apologies for not catching your name sooner. How may I address you?

203058.text: (Well, my mind will not be at ease if I leave them like this.)

203060.text: I've been investigating this place for days. The clue is likely on the monster that attacked you.

203061.text: The powder left by the monster. May I take a look?

203063.text: I'm a preacher of the Holy Church, in charge of the safety of the Chrono Tower. Can I take a look at the thing in your hand?

203064.text: The Holy Church? When did it become so responsible for everything?

203065.text: We do have what you want. Be honest with me and I'll show it to you.

203066.text: Ah, sorry. My name is Fellagood, a serving preacher of the Holy Church.

203067.text: The Church is also investigating the Chrono Tower and has disenchanted the spell that sealed it.

203068.text: Ah, we may be on the same path. Why don't we cooperate?

203069.text: Although the spell has been disenchanted, we still need a "key". To make it, we need the extraction from the thing in your hand.

203070.text: Compared with magic, we prefer something more interesting! Don't you agree, miss?

203072.text: Dejase, we don't have any clues now. Why don't we collect the things he needs first? We will see what he's up to afterward.

203073.text: All right. But I'll only give it to you when you're about to open the door.

203074.text: Hahaha, sure. It's fair you don't trust me.

203075.text: The Holy Church won't take your effort for naught. We share the same goal.

203076.text: Let's work this out together, then.

203077.text: With all due respect, why is the Holy Church suddenly investigating the Chrono Tower?

203078.text: Rumors are everywhere, saying an ancient power in the tower is awakening.

203079.text: Ah, you mean the Chrono Tower? Commoners treat it as an ancient ruin that has always been there.

203080.text: The heretics of the Neo Church even doubt its divinity.

203081.text: But only the Holy Church understands it: God and God's power, they have always been there, since the very beginning.

203082.text: As the children of God, shouldn't we awaken God from the slumber and embrace its advent?

203083.text: Aren't you here for their value as well?

203085.text: We can make the "key" very soon.

203086.text: It's getting late. We should head back to the camp.

203087.text: Don't follow us all the time, you.

203088.text: Sure. Have a good night. I shall take my leave.

203092.text: Are you all right? What happened?

203094.text: You've changed a lot. You're no longer the Anemone I knew!

203098.text: You came so early. What's the rush?

203099.text: Ah, I came here just to tell you that I found a place infested with active monsters...

203100.text: The girl over there, could you join me in the investigation?

203102.text: What are you up to? I'm coming with you as well since there are monsters.

203103.text: Hahaha. Good. Please allow me to take the lead then.

203104.text: Are you sure we are heading in the right direction?

203105.text: You still don't trust me, it seems.

203106.text: Look, the monsters there are all that we haven't met before.

203107.text: ... Let's head back right after finishing the collecting. The magic here is way more concentrated than before.

203109.text: There's another one. Take it down as well.

203110.text: Watch your tongue. That's not how you should speak.

203111.text: Damn. We've attracted too many monsters.

203113.text: Alchemist, we are heading back to the camp first. Could you please drive them away?

203115.text: The lady is amazing and kind!

203116.text: Hehe. Little girl... Perhaps I shouldn't call you like this?

203117.text: Your magic is no ordinary one. A Dragonoid from Muntenia?

203118.text: I don't remember there being such a race.

203119.text: Yeeees. We'll go to the Chrono Tower!

203121.text: Why the Chrono Tower? The Holy Church won't tolerate any act of blasphemy.

203123.text: I'm here to awaken... erm... the power of the Protector!

203125.text: Are you talking about the Protector of Chilora? The one who...

203126.text: Wait. The road is different from that we came.

203130.text: Uhmm. Actually, I am the guardian dragon of the Chrono Tower.

203131.text: Right. She likes, ermm... making Dolls!

203135.text: Mr. Preacher doesn't have a good sense of direction. We seem to have been going the opposite way.

203136.text: Is that so? Fine, as long as you are in one piece, it doesn't matter.

203137.text: Let's go back. The monsters are gone.

203138.text: Miss, you are not horrific as you look. You're nice!

203139.text: You give others your trust so easily. This might ruin you.

203140.text: I'm so happy that I have made new friends. When I go back home, I'll tell others about this.

203141.text: Did I acknowledge you as my friend, suspicious little girl?

203142.text: Only children believe in so-called friends.

203143.text: Friendship is based on mutual interests, otherwise, it's just empty talk.

203144.text: "... She has become ill-tempered, but still my only friend."

203145.text: "I made this year's birthday cake with alchemy. What will be her reaction..."

203147.text: "... It's been three years. How can a person vanish into air?"

203149.text: "... Five years have passed. I guess I understand why she did it."

203150.text: "In this world, nobody would listen to the words of the weak..."

203152.text: Alas, the gate of the Chrono Tower will finally be opened.

203154.text: My sincere appreciation for your effort. Now it's time to bid farewell.

203156.text: I should have revealed your scheme sooner, hypocrite.

203158.text: ... How unwise of you. You could've been killed by monsters and saved me the effort...

203159.text: I don't want to waste my tool's energy on you, should it be possible...

203165.text: Your alchemy has proved its worth. Join me in obedience to God. Astray no longer.

203168.text: Oh, it seems she doesn't remember you anymore.

203169.text: Or should I say she's a stranger to you already?

203170.text: The unknown power and the secrets that lie behind the overlapping Chronospaces... don't they arouse your curiosity?

203176.text: What the hell is this? Protect me, now!

203181.text: I've been around all the time. Nocturna sent me.

203182.text: Why didn't you show up earlier?

203183.text: Because each night before, you had slept early, so I couldn't talk to you.

203185.text: But, I just made friends with them...

203186.text: Sorry. Feelings and memories are intertwined. If the memories are removed, so are the feelings.

203188.text: Hey... Don't be sad. Here's your birthday present.

203190.text: Humans in this area have abundant emotions, which can form into beautiful gems.

203192.text: Hmm... Intended to find yourself a gift in Chrono Tower. It's typical of you.

203193.text: Ah... My head hurts... Did I sleep for a long time?

203194.text: I don't know either. All I can remember is we opened the door somehow.

203196.text: The door's open. Let's get in then.

203197.text: That is... a creature we've never seen. Looks like a work of magic.

203198.text: Maybe we can find clues about the Chrono Tower from the monsters nearby.

203199.text: You've all got a few tricks up your sleeves.

203201.text: Ah... This is not my voice. This is...

203202.text: Sometimes, knowing the answer is more disturbing than don't.

203204.text: Have you found the statue that Wraithscythe talked about?

203206.text: I must be blind for missing it so many times.

203207.text: Terrific. Hope I can stop Goorveig in time.

203210.text: Time's running out. If Gordia is revived, he'll put the whole world in disaster!

203212.text: Unbelievable... You stopped the rite of the Demongod's resurrection.

203213.text: I didn't expect... you had such power.

203216.text: That's normal. We deliverers can be intangible by transforming ourselves into the form of spirits, which means common magic can't trap us.

203217.text: Goorveig won't give up that easily. I bet she's still planning on reviving Gordia.

203218.text: What can we do to get her?

203220.text: Don't worry. I have a plan. This is a Spirit Catcher, an item made by Acheronte for catching spirits.

203221.text: Should you see Goorveig again, cast it out.

203222.text: Once Goorveig is trapped in the Catcher, I can feel it and I'll come to you without any delay.

203223.text: Remember, we can't let her go again.

203224.text: Sometimes, knowing the answer is more disturbing than don't.

203225.text: Why do so many believe in the Protectors?

203226.text: If you believe it is worth following, you will reaffirm your faith. Faith will become the strength that supports you. Humans are like this. So are the Protectors.

203227.text: What could be the cause of Geothermy?

203228.text: There's a better chance to seek the source of the Geothermy underground.

203229.text: The closer you get to the darkness, the stronger its attraction is. You might even submit to it.

203230.text: Does great power always come with great risk?

203231.text: Why are monsters on the roam in Cassiel?

203232.text: Cassiel's monsters can't just be appearing out of thin air. Maybe someone's controlling them.

203233.text: Why are the nobles hurting innocent folk?

203234.text: Conflicts and people are inseparable. Hierarchy only makes things worse.

203235.text: Ah... misses... sorry... Ella will remember you...

203236.text: Monsters will pile up if left untended. Slay them, and avoid being surrounded.

203237.text: It seems there's an assassination skill that bounds the target. Once targeted, you'll receive a fatal strike.

203238.text: Pay attention to Giant Monster's different forms when fighting against it.

203239.text: Some monsters burst out magic beams from their eyes. Try to disrupt it with Control Magic. It works even better than you think.

203240.text: Some monsters have immense bodies that can make the ground tremble. Avoid being hit directly.

203241.text: Let's clean out the bats, and put myself together.

203242.text: That little girl... I can't leave the monsters be...

203243.text: To get into the Chrono Tower, it's necessary to collect materials.

203246.text: Damn! It's one of Acheronte's magic items. Who gave it to you?

203249.text: Goorveig, you broke the Deliverer's oath. I will bring you back to Acheronte.

203250.text: Haha... You think catching me can prevent Gordia's revival?

203251.text: We will get what we want and revive Gordia. No one can stand in our way, let alone you two. Haha...

203252.text: Unwilling to give up, huh? I will stop you no matter what. Even if Gordia should walk into this world again, we would still have Akasha on our side. We will put him down as many times as needed.

203253.text: Hehe... Fool. You can't stop us...

203254.text: Thanks for your help. I'll bring her back to the River of the Underworld. See you.

203256.text: It may be destiny or coincidence. Metamorphoses' power led to some unexpected results.

203257.text: Dejase's mutual memory and obsession with her only friend are now accidentally sealed in the depths of her mind.

203258.text: Maybe there'll be a day when her feelings are re-aroused. Maybe never.

203259.text: What's left is just a sigh lingering across the Chronospace.

203261.text: The concentration of magic is surprisingly high as well. The people here will...

203262.text: No, I must not let the people here get hurt...

203264.text: A chevalier without magic, huh? What are you doing here?

203265.text: Flare, I know this is your hometown, so I thought I might be able to meet you here...

203266.text: So you hid and spied on me?

203267.text: No, I didn't... I just wanted to ask about Lady Asherah.

203269.text: Yes, as you know, this land has suffered from Magical Abnormality. Only Lady Asherah can save this land, but why won't she see me...

203270.text: Apparently, the Protector isn't interested in talking to people like you, and neither am I.

203271.text: But we used to talk about everything! Back then, we swore to guard Lady Asherah, escorting her on her rounds and receiving her people...

203272.text: It's all in the past, do you really think you can talk with the Protector with you like this?!

203274.text: Be clear about your place here, chevalier! The Protector won't see you!

203275.text: Flare, you were not like this before. In the past, we followed Lady Asherah together and helped those in need...

203276.text: What's the point in talking about the past?!

203277.text: It can't be... Lady Asherah sheltered the people of this land, and you, like me, swore to protect Lady Asherah. At that time, Irminsul was...

203278.text: I just can't believe the tender Lady Asherah would choose to turn away from her people, from this land...

203279.text: And you say that you are still loyal to the Protector. Pfft, chevalier without magic, I knew you were not trustworthy and now you even doubt the Protector. How dare you!

203280.text: Flare, please, help me. Come with me to persuade Lady Asherah!

203281.text: You have betrayed your oath. So you are no longer qualified to see the Protector! Don't come to me again, or I will show you the power of magic.

203282.text: Flare, this will not solve any problems... As a Chevalier of Irminsul, I will not give up and will guard this land no matter what.

203283.text: Why is this happening? Is there no other way out...

203285.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

203286.text: Exploring nearby will naturally pay off.

203287.text: It's extremely important to collect magic.

203289.text: Magic? A swordswoman will not retreat in the face of any danger. If you are afraid, you'd better go home quickly.

203290.text:
How anxious of you, huh... The Witch will feel at ease like I do with such a reliable swordswoman by our side. 
However, this is a strange place, and it is dangerous to lose your way. Be careful!

203291.text: How can a Witch's soul servant manage to leave her master and run away? Don't waste your time here!

203292.text: That super-strong girl was right, entrusting her to build better equipment will definitely be of great help to the adventure.

203293.text: Strange... I can't feel the magic of that big guy...

203294.text: What a strange facility... It should be further investigated.

203296.text: Isn't it just an ordinary shard?

203297.text: What's in the shard is no ordinary magic power, and there should be more than one of these shards. We might be able to figure out its secret if we can put all the pieces together.

203298.text: Is it a spell? The door is locked tightly.

203302.text: Croche, don't act like you're the one who deserves sympathy here! You are all to blame for our current situation!

203303.text: That's right, you're the one who defected to the devil and brought us all this.

203307.text: (Whispering) Why bother with those stupid humans. Just use my power, in one simple move...

203308.text: I don't need your power! Don't... don't come out again...

203309.text: (Whispering) How ungrateful. Without my power, you'd be just as ugly as they are! Shouldn't you do as I say?

203310.text: I don't want to hurt people, nor do I want to use your power...

203311.text: (Whispering) If you don't release the magic power as I tell you, your body will suffer unbearable pain. Haha...

203312.text: (Whispering) Think about it carefully, the pain shall be... unbearable.

203313.text: I won't do what you want, so don't come out again.

203314.text: Wow, what a nasty feeling! Why do the plants around give off this kind of magic?

203315.text: Is it true that these plants are responsible for this concentration of magic?

203318.text: It must have been a crowded street in the past. I can't believe it has now fallen so far into this state.

203319.text: Is this the feeling of sorrow?

203320.text: Please don't... The demon, the demon is coming out...

203321.text: (Whispering) Little girl, I am running out of patience to persuade you into casting magic. Soon it won't be up to you. It's not easy for me to possess a human, so I shall not let this chance pass by.

203322.text: (Whispering) So close, soon I'll be unleashed! Haha!

203323.text:
(Whispering) How is it possible? A human stopped me? No, I will not be sealed!
I'm not leaving this world. Ah...

203325.text: The evil aura has gone, and she seems to be back to normal.

203326.text: Thank you, if it wasn't for you, I would have been consumed by this ominous magic.

203327.text: What was the magic just now?

203328.text: Are you back to normal now?

203329.text: I almost lost control of my body to that demon a moment ago, but I'm now back to normal. Since you saved my life, I'll tell you everything.

203330.text: The magical energy emanates from the demon inside me. He held the delusion that he could unleash himself by using the seal atop the bell tower and then rule the world.

203331.text: Before, when the Magical Abnormality occurred, I was ringing the bell at the top of the bell tower and was also cursed by the calamitous magic. My desire to live made me unable to resist the temptation of the demon, and so he possessed me.

203332.text: The demon's magic is far more powerful than the magic curse. This allowed me to not be harmed by the curse.

203334.text: Yes, he has been trying to take control of my body and lift his seal. Without you, I couldn't even imagine what would have happened.

203335.text: But the demon is not going to give up so easily. I'd better stay away from people.

203337.text: Don't worry. We use this bandage to seal heretics in the abbey. It's powerful enough to suppress the demon's magic. I can maintain the seal as long as I wrap it tightly around my body. I won't give the demon any chance to escape and commit evil.

203338.text: Thank you for saving me. Farewell, I doubt we'll meet again.

203339.text: Although it has fallen into dilapidation, you can still feel the prosperity of its past. There must be prosperous towns in your homeland too.

203341.text:
My bad, I forgot you lost all your memories. But don't worry, you're not alone. We're all friends. 
Don't dwell on the sad things. Let's keep moving.

203343.text: How did Irminsul become so full of ominous magical aura... What really happened here?

203344.text: Maybe Flare knows what's going on. Let's quickly go and confirm everything with her.

203345.text: It's been a long time, Ms. Flare!

203346.text: Oh, Yui! Didn't you go back to Fomoire Island already?

203347.text: Earlier, an unknown magical force hit the barrier of Fomoire Island and almost destroyed it. But the Six Ovates worked together to repair the barrier, allowing everyone in Fomoire Island to be kept safe.

203348.text: Master Norn asked me to come here first to check this place, and it turned out that the place was occupied by magical creatures.

203349.text: Magical creatures? Did you hurt them, then?

203350.text: Those monsters attacked me, so I had to dispel them!

203351.text: How dare you hurt the people here!

203352.text: The people here? What are you talking about? Those are the monsters that attacked me.

203353.text: You might have also noticed the concentration of magic around here. This abnormal...

203354.text: No need for you to meddle. You'd better go back to Fomoire Island, don't return here to hurt my people again!

203355.text: What exactly are you talking about... Ms. Flare, are those... tentacles on your head?

203357.text: It's none of your business! Go back to Fomoire Island quickly, and if I see you hurting anyone here again, I won't show you any mercy!

203358.text: How very strange... Why would Ms. Flare...

203359.text: Maybe I have to look around and see what's going on with Irminsul.

203361.text: There are two roads here, which way should we go?

203362.text: Just rely on your intuition at times like this.

203363.text: What? That's unhelpful. which one do you think we should take?

203365.text: You're a witch, so use your crystal orb to find the right one.

203366.text: I don't think that's what witches really do...

203367.text: Irminsul was so prosperous. Why is it completely empty now? Where did everyone go...

203369.text: Great, we've finally met a person...

203372.text: Ah, I'm sorry, that must have sounded strange. I'm Yui of the Six Ovates from Fomoire Island. Could you please tell me what's going on here?

203373.text: The people of Irminsul have been turned into magical creatures... No wonder Ms. Flare turned the way she did. It really must be hard for her to accept this.

203374.text: Thank you for giving me so many clues. But unfortunately, I lack the knowledge to decipher the conjuring... not to mention that not even Ms. Flare can break it.

203375.text: Wait. Master Norn has lived for a real long time. Maybe she knows the way to undo the curse and turn everyone back to normal.

203377.text: A way to undo the curse?

203378.text: Yes, Master Norn is the head of the Six Ovates. She has mastered all kinds of conjurings, so she might be able to undo this one if she's here. We must report what happened here to her as soon as possible without any further delay.

203379.text: There's a crazy aura coming from around here. Have they lost their minds from being controlled by magic?

203381.text: Never mind, Yothaya is just passing by.

203382.text: Oh, Yothaya... Could it be that you're one of the Six Ovates of Fomoire Island?...

203383.text: Huh? How do you know my name?

203384.text: I had the pleasure of going to a concert on Fomoire Island, and I had heard of the names of the Six Ovates there.

203385.text: I see... Yothaya just escaped from the Sacrificial Altar, but there seems to be nothing interesting around here. The magic in your body has returned to normal. You should get some rest.

203386.text: It hurts. My head hurts... Please, help me...

203389.text: Why are all the plants here abnormal? Ah, even the flowers are wilted!

203390.text: This ominous aura... It seems that what happened to Irminsul has something to do with the magic that attacked Fomoire Island before.

203391.text: I must hurry back to Fomoire Island and tell Master Norn what happened here.

203392.text: There seems to be an island to the south.

203393.text: Where? Ah, over there. Let's go check it out.

203395.text: Master Norn, something's wrong. Magical Abnormalities occurred in Irminsul.

203396.text: Ah, it's you, Yui. Take your time, I'm listening.

203398.text: Master Norn, we've got a problem!

203399.text: (Sigh) Here comes someone even more hurried...

203400.text: Yothaya, what's the matter? I'm listening. Slow down...

203402.text: Magic curse...? However, without seeing it closely, it is difficult for me to determine what it is exactly. It would be good to get more detailed information.

203406.text: The magic that leaked from the depths of the forest turned everyone into magical creatures... But there was never a forest in Irminsul.

203407.text: It seems that things are more serious than I expected. Yui, go and inform the other Ovates and tell them to keep vigilant around Fomoire Island. I'm going to Irminsul myself to see what's going on.

203408.text: The plants around here absorb strange magic, making them grow like crazy. As long as we explore the source of this magic, we can find the cause of the mutation.

203409.text: Magic is leaking from the depths of the forest. If we follow the trail of magic leakage, we will be able to find the root cause of the calamity. The people here are still suffering. I can't waste any more time here.

203410.text: This unusual magic... It feels so familiar.

203412.text: Right! It's like that butterfly before!

203413.text: Butterfly? I don't think I remember seeing one...

203415.text: Yes, the one who became a butterfly!

203416.text: There seems to be a small island in front. There's got to be a way to get to it.

203417.text: But there is no road nearby...

203418.text: Trust me, I have great eyesight. The island is to the south. Go check it now.

203419.text: It's you. Are you also tracking the source of the magic?

203421.text: Tell her about the Ruin of the Giant Tree.

203422.text: So, the root of everything is the Protector?

203423.text: I was also tracing the source of the magic. And all clues pointed to the ruin deep in the forest. The concentration of magic is too high, and the spell of the curse is so complex that even I cannot lift the curse from anyone in a short time.

203424.text: But, as an Ovate, I will do my best and work with the other Ovates to turn everyone back to normal.

203425.text: The concentration of magic around here is getting much higher, be sure to be careful.

203427.text: Wait a minute, I used to be a Glorious Chevalier loyal to the Protector. I'm not evil. I just became like this from the magic curse.

203428.text: So... what do you want from us?

203429.text: I'm sure you know that there was a calamity in Irminsul, and everyone turned into strange creatures, but then how about you?

203430.text: I... well... sorry, no, I know nothing!

203431.text: I'm investigating the cause of the calamity as a Glorious Chevalier, so...

203434.text: Girl, are you okay? Have you been possessed?

203435.text: Don't be afraid, let me help you!

203436.text: Such strong magic, does it have anything to do with the magical calamity?...

203437.text: I have to find out. I have to catch up quickly... Quack.

203438.text: There is still a road here, huh?

203439.text: The last time I passed here, I didn't even notice it...

203440.text: It seems that there are still many secrets hidden in this tower. How very exciting!

203441.text: That person we just saw seemed to have a deep faith.

203442.text: Laksha seems to have stayed in the tower all the time.

203444.text: Everywhere is in shambles. What a bummer.

203445.text: Is there really an elixir that can keep me young forever? I can't believe I have to suffer so much in order to maintain my beauty!

203446.text: Ah, is being beautiful a sin?

203447.text: It seems someone has been staring at me...

203448.text: Huh? But there's no one around. It must be an illusion, right?

203449.text: An illusion? But I felt such a strong stare in my direction...

203450.text: What's that noise? I can even hear it from here.

203451.text: Are people arguing up ahead? It seems like they are talking about some evil person or something.

203453.text: Don't say such things. if you're not careful, something might really happen, and you'll regret saying that.

203454.text: Listen, there seem to be people arguing up ahead.

203455.text: That voice is... the voice from that girl before!

203457.text: Hey, girl over there! I have something to ask you.

203458.text: Huh? Girl? Anemone is not a child!

203459.text: What's with the attitude? You should feel honored to speak to me, Ruda, the Starlight Collector.

203460.text: You stinker, what are you talking about!

203461.text: Such a rude girl, didn't you ever learn manners?

203462.text: All mortals should kneel before me and answer my questions.

203463.text: I heard that there is an elixir of eternal youth in this tower. Girl, have you heard about it at all?

203464.text: Not only are you ignoring Anemone's words, but you're also treating Anemone like a fool...

203465.text: I've had enough! I won't tell you anything! Even if I do know!

203466.text: Have I really been deceived by those mercenaries?

203467.text: The tower is so lofty that it is too impractical to search floor by floor. Ah, do I really have to accept this kind of trial to keep my beauty?

203469.text: Ah, I can't stand it anymore, only plebs would come to such a hellhole... What am I doing here?...

203470.text: Eww... My new shoes and clothes are all dirty.

203471.text: Well... I did not expect that after entering the tower, there's no way to leave.

203472.text: Hey, you there. Do you know the way out?

203474.text: Hey, do you know the way out?

203477.text: Such an uncouth fellow. Looks like I'll have to do it myself then. What are you still doing here? Go find a way to get out of the tower!

203480.text: Quickly, go back! $heroine$'s lips are all blue...

203481.text: I didn't expect it to be so cold, but luckily I've got a leather coat.

203482.text: Can we please just go back...

203483.text: Stop complaining. We have to get to the top of the mountain...

203484.text: The man in the front seems to be digging something. Should we go and take a look?

203485.text: Little girl, don't go any further! There's an avalanche ahead. It's dangerous.

203487.text: You're actually fluttering in the air! You've got... wings behind your back!

203488.text: Who on earth are you? Are you one of those chevaliers?

203489.text: I am merely being silent. It is you who is speaking impertinently.

203490.text: There is a price to pay for belittling me!

203491.text: Hmph, do not try to provoke me. The greatest mage always comes with horror.

203493.text: The two turned into ice sculptures in an instant. That's truly terrible frost magic.

203494.text: Could this endless blizzard have anything to do with her?

203495.text: Can anyone really cast magic on that scale?

203496.text: We'd better catch up. She probably has some clue.

203497.text: You've been following me. What do you want?

203498.text: Tell me now, or I will show thee the horror of magic.

203499.text: Ask her whether she is the one who summoned the blizzard.

203500.text: Suspect her of manipulating the blizzard.

203501.text: Well, are you also aware of my magic's greatness?

203502.text: I am the Frost Witch Pakane. With my magic, I can plunge the world into the Ice Age with a mere flick of the wrist.

203503.text: Ah, it's too late. Lilia is still waiting for me.

203504.text: Get out of my way right now.

203530.text: Under an illusory starry sky, a girl lies before a strange mirror–

203533.text: The girl looks at the mirror, and walks toward it as if she was hypnotized.

203534.text: Yes, that's it. Let me have a good look!

203535.text: Two figures appear in the mirror. The one in purple is tied to a stone pillar, and the other one in white is climbing to the pillar, trying to rescue her.

203537.text: The image becomes clearer as the girl is losing her focus. Hundreds of monsters crawl towards the figure in purple and the one in white opens her arms to stop them from advancing.

203539.text: The mirror is penetrated and half the monsters on the pillar perish, but new monsters immediately fill the gap. Seeing that, the girl steps into the mirror with resolution.

203541.text: (Something... is calling to me... in the mirror?)

203542.text: The girl has to spare some energy to resist the temptation from the depth of the mirror.

203544.text: When the girl is distracted, the monsters attack the girl in white even more fiercely.

203547.text: The girl summons the Chronospace Gate which sucks in many of the monsters.

203548.text: The girl holds the figure in white.

203552.text: You are finally awake, what exactly happened here?

203554.text: The figure in white slightly opens her mouth and points at the stone pillar.

203555.text: As the girl looks towards the stone pillar and is about to get up, a puff of black smoke suddenly encircles the figure in her arms. After the smoke disperses, an eery hole appears at the center of her body.

203556.text: (A hole sending out black smoke? It seems it was caused by monsters. Could it be...)

203557.text: Before the girl can look more closely, the figure in white transforms into a load of black smoke.

203558.text: Get away from the black smoke!

203559.text: An anxious voice appears in the girl's mind. The next moment, lots of smoke surges towards the girl. At the base of the pillar, monsters are gathering again.

203561.text: The voice in the girl's head becomes suddenly clearer.

203562.text: Who's speaking? I have to rescue her, I won't let the tragedy of Irminsul repeat.

203563.text: Having said that, the girl rushes to fight the monsters.

203564.text: A flash of blinding white light bounces the girl out of the mirror, and a second mirror emerges in the starry sky.

203566.text: Before the second mirror, the girl is communicating with the voice in her head–

203568.text: Who are you? Where is this?

203569.text: I am... The black smoke has entered your body, the only way... suppress...

203570.text: However, the voice gets distorted each time it comes to the point.

203571.text: (I can't hear clearly... Entered my body?)

203572.text: It seems that's the only way...

203573.text: The voice in her head gets silent. After a while, a yellow subject falls from the sky.

203575.text: After the girl picks up the "Star" in front of her, the black smoke keeps gushing out from her behind, and the Star starts to absorb the smoke till losing all its radiance.

203576.text: I see. You want to tell me the Star can absorb black smoke?

203578.text: (Looks like I need to collect more Stars.)

203579.text: When the girl is deep in thought, an image suddenly appears on the mirror–

203580.text: In a black swamp, a white figure is sinking slowly, with only the head still above the swamp.

203581.text: It's dangerous, don't go! Wait for me... summon... Stars...

203583.text: The girl grips the staff in her hand and enters the mirror resolutely.

203584.text: (Ah, I have to summon Stars quickly during her absence!)

203585.text: Suddenly, the unlimited energy from the depth of the mirror pours into the girl's body.

203587.text: The blow of the enormous energy staggers the girl. Hit by the sharp pain all over her body, the girl can only use her staff to support herself and trudge into the swamp.

203588.text: (The closer I get, the faster the energy is pouring, in that case...)

203589.text: The girl waves her staff, and the turbulent energy is released alongside the magic.

203591.text: Finally, the girl ends up in front of the white figure. Just as she is about to stretch her staff, the white figure disappears. Then, a large number of masks emerge, attacking the girl with bloody grimaces.

203592.text: Luckily the energy is endless here.

203593.text: The swamp fades away, and the white figure reappears. The girl runs toward her excitedly.

203594.text: These are... dragon's horns and tail?

203596.text: Before the girl opens her mouth, the swamp reappears and changes into black smoke pouring into the girl's body like crazy. Such a big influx of energy knocks down the girl in pain.

203598.text: The figure in white turns into a cloud of light and disappears even before finishing her talk. However, the girl's troubles haven't ended.

203600.text: You can't even withstand a little energy? Didn't you manage to absorb a lot before?

203602.text: The girl passes out before finishing the sentence. Then the sound of the mirror breaking comes, and countless Stars fall on the girl, absorbing the black smoke.

203604.text: Ahh... I made it in time... What a headstrong girl, I need to take her away with the least delay.

203605.text: The Stars wrap the girl and take her out of the second mirror.

203607.text: Before the third mirror, the girl encircled by stars sits beside a figure in white–

203609.text: It turns out that her name is Ella, from Muntenia. She has made plans with her friends Metamorphoses and Nocturna to play near the Chrono Tower. Upon hearing the name of the Chrono Tower, the girl is in some surprise.

203610.text: Yes, the Chrono Tower! But, I got lost near it... Many things happened, but finally I met Metamorphoses.

203611.text: Speaking of Metamorphoses, Ella suddenly bursts into tears.

203613.text: The girl gently touches Ella's head and lets her go on.

203614.text: Although I met Metamorphoses, I still haven't seen Nocturna. We waited for her for a long time near the Chrono Tower, but she never showed up.

203615.text: So I searched for her around the Chrono Tower, but couldn't find her even after many days... And then, I heard a disjointed voice in my head. Before I realized what had happened, I was already here.

203616.text: I was transported here suddenly as well.

203617.text: But when I and Metamorphoses first arrived, there were no such mirrors here.

203619.text: Yes! There was nothing but the platform under our feet. After a while, suddenly a load of black monsters appeared out of thin air and surrounded us.

203620.text: Those monsters couldn't stop you, could they?

203621.text: Yes, Ella can turn into a dragon!

203622.text: But you didn't turn into a dragon at that time?

203623.text: I tried to use my power immediately, but... there was a force that limited my power. As a result, I could only release some very basic magic.

203624.text: Unable to use my power, coupled with too many monsters, Metamorphoses and I were overwhelmed. To protect me, Metamorphoses... she... (Sobbing)

203627.text: In a third mirror not far away, countless marionettes surround a girl in purple who is controlled by strings. She is luring a young boy toward a mass of black smoke behind her.

203629.text: As Ella rushes into the mirror, the voice in the girl's mind speaks again.

203630.text: Wait! Take... with you, or you will be eroded!

203631.text: However, the girl has already followed Ella into the third mirror.

203633.text: Ella just disappears. The marionettes let out painful wails when they see the girl.

203634.text: Help us! I don't want to dance anymore! Please! Cut the strings behind us. We can no more feel our hands or feet!

203635.text: (These are... souls of living people? This world...)

203636.text: The girl waves her staff in a frenzy, and countless Soul Arrows shoot at the strings controlling the marionettes. However, she doesn't notice that the cut stings are stealthily entwining her body. Then, a familiar voice comes.

203637.text: My child, you have worked very hard and can stop now. No one will blame you.

203638.text: Upon hearing the voice, the girl stops her moves unconsciously and can't help indulging herself in it.

203639.text: The echo of the voice makes the girl shed a tear.

203641.text: When the girl's body has almost been fully tied up by the strings, a dragon's roar suddenly resounds in this world, waking the girl up.

203642.text: The seductive voice as well as the strings around her body all disappear immediately.

203643.text: No, this is not the end!

203645.text: As the strings disperse, a glamorous monster appears.

203646.text: The girl waves her staff, a glowing Soul Arrow shooting toward the monster.

203647.text: Through her efforts, the monster is finally dispelled, and the marionettes stop their endless dance. A short distance away, the figure in purple and the young boy show up again.

203649.text: As the girl approaches the figure in purple and cuts the strings on her, the black smoke once again emerges from behind the figure in purple and forms a huge net trying to engulf the girl.

203650.text: I thought all I had to do was cut the string, isn't it?

203653.text: The illusion before your eyes will dissipate in the end...

203654.text: The sound of the mirror breaking comes once again.

203655.text: (But... is this sound different from before?)

203656.text: The girl looks toward the direction of the sound.

203658.text: A giant Star is flying toward the girl, and Ella is right at its center.

203659.text: The sparkling starlight dispels the black smoke accompanied by the similar sound of the mirror crushing...

203660.text: Miss, I have come to help you!

203661.text: When the starlight shines upon the boy, his body undergoes a drastic change into the appearance of the figure in purple, and then disappears.

203662.text: When the blackness clears, the dawn is sure to come.

203664.text: Before the fourth mirror appears the spirit of a girl in black–

203665.text: It's great to see you all made it out in one piece!

203667.text: The girl looks at her in surprise while the one in black puffs her cheeks in anger.

203668.text: Really? You still don't know who I am after listening to my voice so many times. And I warned you not to get close but you just didn't listen.

203669.text: It was an emergency after all. You... you don't have a body?

203670.text: For the time being. But thanks to you breaking of the mirror world, the seal on me is loosed so I can appear in spirit form. In addition, when you entered that mirror, I managed to interfere a bit by teleporting Ella to where my real body is.

203671.text: That's right! She taught me how to use the Stars to help you!

203673.text: Those star-like objects can help you absorb the black smoke.

203675.text: However, at the current level of unsealing, I can't maintain this spirit presence much further.

203676.text: In that case, we'll just keep breaking the mirrors!

203677.text: That's true, but I don't recommend continuing with it, better wait until I summon enough Stars.

203679.text: Something wicked here wants to possess your body. If you keep being exposed to the black smoke, your body will be taken sooner or later. You should be able to feel a change in your body already.

203682.text: The spirit of the girl in black starts to disperse and her voice becomes fragmentary once again.

203683.text: What did you say? I didn't catch it.

203684.text: It seems time is up. Let's go to the next mirror, that's the only way to save your friend.

203687.text: That said, the girl's left arm is already shaking.

203688.text: In the fourth mirror, a girl wearing a purple mask stands in the void, seemingly awaiting them.

203691.text: Just as the two girls enter the mirror, countless masks fly towards them with the figure in purple just pointing a finger.

203693.text: Soul Arrows are shot to break the aggressive masks.

203695.text: Seeing that the attacks are futile, the figure in purple encircles herself with the masks. In the pervasive black smoke, a giant monster appears.

203696.text: Inside this monster emits the aura of countless souls.

203697.text: How dare you tamper with all those souls. It's unforgivable!

203701.text: A mask formed from the black smoke left behind by the monster covers the girl's face, giving her a splitting headache.

203702.text: How's this? This is the voice of the souls that you haven't heard before. They are roaring loudly, expressing their fury.

203703.text: The girl knows that her body has been overrun by the black smoke due to the long-time exposure.

203705.text: The emptiness is deep enough. Now let us merge into one.

203706.text: As the black smoke keeps pouring into the girl's body, her hair grows dark, her eyes glow red ferociously, and her body is surrounded by a powerful aura.

203708.text: The power is so strong, if it keeps growing we'll be flattened by it! So much soul power, if only Metamorphoses were here...

203710.text: A girl in white descends slowly.

203712.text: Don't get so excited, let's save her first. Such a raging flood of souls, it might be a little tricky to deal with...

203713.text: Currently my ability is not enough to save her. Ella, lend me some magic.

203715.text: Purple magic flows into the girl's body, dispelling the black smoke.

203716.text: Focus. I'm here to help you restore peace. Follow the flow of my magic to exert your own and then suppress the wrath of the souls.

203717.text: Haha, if you were still in your prime, I might fear your power.

203718.text: But as you are right now, you're absolutely no match!

203719.text: The turbulent torrent of souls has become even more frenzied. If only my powers haven't been weakened.

203720.text: At the same time, in the body of the girl, two figures are constantly colliding with one another. Finally, the figure of the girl is knocked off...

203721.text: Why do you still insist? You have no sense of self at all, but you're still trying to hold on to it?

203722.text: The girl just shakes her head and stands up firmly.

203724.text: Suddenly a girl's voice echoes in the world and along with it comes a great cluster of shining Stars falling down from the sky.

203726.text: Ah... The Stars! Metamorphoses, watch out!

203728.text: The Stars hit the ground around the witch, flaring in brightness.

203729.text: When meeting the light of the Star, the black smoke just melts away like snow in May.

203730.text: Ella, gather the Stars to dispel the black smoke!

203732.text: Thanks to the glow of the Stars, the black smoke around the girl gradually dissipates.

203733.text: Damn it, this is a nice body to be my vessel. I won't easily let her go. It seems I have to resort to my final plan early before they find out I'm still inside the witch...

203734.text: The girl finally comes to herself with all black smoke around her be gone.

203736.text: You're awake! Metamorphoses, what is all that black smoke, exactly?

203737.text: I don't know yet but as you have seen, it can enter other people's bodies. By the way, what are these mirrors about?

203738.text: Well... Each mirror has a different world inside and what is happening in that world is projected on the mirror.

203740.text: No time to fool around with you guys, I have to get to the final altar!

203741.text: The black smoke bursts out again and swiftly takes the girl into the fifth mirror.

203742.text: The two try to stop the monster, but any attack they have used is all to no avail. They can only watch the girl being devoured helplessly.

203743.text: What can we do now? She was... if only we had more power...

203744.text: The mirror can show what's going on inside, right? I'll go check it.

203746.text: But what shows in the mirror is not as expected...

203749.text: This is not going to work. Should we go inside to search for her?

203750.text: Wait, let me ask for some more Stars from the lady in black!

203752.text: Yes! She's the one that gave me all these Stars but I don't have much left now...

203753.text: However, the girl in black doesn't show up this time no matter how hard Ella tries to call her.

203754.text: We don't have a choice now. Let's just go inside!

203755.text: Then the two girls enter the mirror.

203756.text: There is only one path here...

203757.text: It does make the thing easier. Off we go.

203759.text: It's awful! Is there no end to this road? I don't want to go on anymore! I can't even see clearly. I'm tired and hungry...

203760.text: Even I feel the same way...

203763.text: Are you asleep already? I'm gonna sleep too... Nighty night...

203764.text: In the dream, Ella and Metamorphoses are having a feast.

203765.text: Behind the two girls, two lumps of mud squirm out.

203766.text: Look at those contented smiles! Life really should be spent like this! Now, let me feast on your power!

203767.text: But at the very last moment, a blinding ray of light pierces through Ella's pocket.

203769.text: After seeing the Star light, the mud slips away at an incredible speed.

203770.text: Soon, the two girls slowly wake up, hungry as before but the heaviness on their bodies just vanishes.

203771.text: Huh? Why is the Star glowing?

203772.text: Ella, hold the Star in hand!

203773.text: When the Star is taken out of the pocket, suddenly a path reveals itself under the radiance.

203774.text: Is it... guiding us? Should we follow this path?

203775.text: Since the Star has saved us many times, we might as well follow its guidance.

203777.text: Then the two walk along the selected path for a good while and it's getting dark.

203778.text: A lake appears in front of them and the yellowish crescent moon in the night sky gives off a charming halo.

203779.text: In the moonlight, delicious food pile up like a mountain, and a familiar figure is lying on the bench.

203781.text: Her taste shall never change no matter where she goes.

203782.text: Seeing the two girls coming, Nocturna just greets them drowsily.

203783.text: Welcome to my moonlight party. The moon is so beautiful tonight.

203784.text: You conjure the moon each time. I don't see any difference.

203785.text: Nocturna! We were supposed to hang out near the Chrono Tower. Why didn't you go there?

203786.text: Because this place is amazing! There's endless food and wine.

203787.text: Besides, time flows slowly here. Only a short time passes when I have already felt like being slack for a good while. It's a paradise!

203788.text: Ella, have you noticed something on Nocturna's back?

203789.text: A puddle of... something that looks like mud!
