203790.text: In the past, it's always you who treated us to nice meals, how about we treat you this time?

203791.text: Brilliant! What are you guys going to treat me to?

203792.text: It certainly is... Ella's specially-made Star pie! Try it!

203795.text: Ahh– there are these Stars again!

203796.text: How dare you plot against the three of us! You really have some guts!

203797.text: I can't let you off easily.

203798.text: No, don't chase it away! I can't slack off without it, ah hell!

203799.text: Huh? Didn't you ask us to supervise you and prevent you from slacking off?

203800.text: The thrown Stars shine brightly, followed by a familiar sound of breaking and shattering.

203801.text: Oh? I can summon Stars too?

203802.text: Nocturna, listen to that cracking sound.

203803.text: The mirror is about to get smashed, and your vacation is coming to an end.

203804.text: Let's go play, Nocturna! See you in the next mirror!

203806.text: The vampire girl's figure disappears in a poof of black smoke.

203810.text: Hehe, I'm afraid I can't do that. Stars... go!

203811.text: But as the mirror world starts to crumble, the mud seizes the chance to escape through the cracks.

203812.text: Ella, stop it. You've summoned too many Stars, the world can't hold on much longer.

203813.text: But I just need to hit it once more!

203814.text: Stop, safety is our priority now.

203815.text: And you said Nocturna would be in the next mirror, right?

203816.text: Yes, when we were transported here, we were turned into energy beings and then split into two, sealed in different mirrors.

203817.text: I was saved by breaking exactly two mirrors.

203818.text: Ella, do you think the situation in the mirror world has something to do with our own life experiences?

203819.text: It seems so. When I was sealed, the black smoke tried to get into my body, but luckily we got these Stars and the help of Miss.

203820.text: All right, let's just put this behind and catch up with the monster.

203821.text: At the same time – in the depths of the starry sky

203822.text: That girl with the great emptiness in her chest, she shall be my vessel.

203823.text: Once her mind and body collapse, she will be finally devoured by me.

203825.text: In the sixth mirror, endless flames are burning everywhere as the scarlet full moon shines in strange radiance in the sky.

203826.text: It runs really fast! If only I could turn into a dragon...

203827.text: Ella, who focuses on chasing the enemy, does not notice the bright scarlet full moon in the sky.

203831.text: At this time, a harsh wind speeds by.

203834.text: The blood-red full moon– No! Nocturna, she...

203836.text: The vampire is now on a rampage, attacking the two girls in a fury.

203838.text: What a pity for Nocturna. She managed to find a place to slack off and but now...

203839.text: She hadn't slacked off for long before she was caught and thrown under the full moon–

203840.text: She deserves it. All she ever wants to do is slack off.

203841.text: But we can't just leave her alone like this. It's still too much for her body to handle going into such a rampage...

203842.text: What's wrong with that? If she rampages for a good while then she'll be able to spend much longer in bed relaxing, just as she wants.

203843.text: Oh Metamorphoses, you're so sly! But it's better to let me take down the moon.

203844.text: Ella fetches out the last Star.

203846.text: The flames in the mirror world are getting intensified as soon as the last Star is out of Ella's hand. A huge figure gradually appears in the flames.

203847.text: The figure waves its huge claws towards the two girls and also smashes the Star.

203848.text: Tsk... Seems saving Nocturna won't be that easy.

203849.text: Ella, are you okay? It gives such a raging aura.

203850.text: Just a scratch, luckily I have quick reactions!

203851.text: Its aura is more violent than Nocturna's! What can we do?

203852.text: Damn it... Nocturna always makes trouble for me.

203853.text: I'm going to give her a good talking to when this is all over!

203855.text: The figure smacks Nocturna away with one claw and meanwhile, the mud monster appears with other monsters.

203856.text: Hehe, now you have nowhere to go.

203857.text: Bastard! How dare you do this to my friend– I will cut you into pieces!

203858.text: Calm down, Ella! Without the power of the Stars, our own strength is not enough to cope with these monsters.

203860.text: Damn! The injuries seem to increase its power and make it more aggressive.

203861.text: Ha... ha... I didn't think I'd hit my limit so soon.

203862.text: Metamorphoses! Get behind me now! You're too badly wounded!

203863.text: Protected by you? This is not what I've been reduced to.

203864.text: What's more, you two are my most important friends! I won't easily give up.

203865.text: You all fall back! Go, my Stars!

203866.text: Tremendous Star power flowing from the sky strikes the monster straight in the head.

203867.text: Wow! The monster has been repelled by Stars!

203868.text: A dark shadow rises into the sky, and then falls slowly with black feathers fluttering across the sky.

203869.text: The shadow holds the girl in one hand and a huge black flame in the other.

203870.text: Flames of Sin, concentrate into a sharp blade and go cut down the enemy!

203871.text: What a powerful force! Huh? The seal inside me has been lifted?

203872.text: In her hand is the Miss Witch?

203873.text: I am Acheronte, ruler of the River of the Underworld.

203874.text: The Mirror of the End has been conquered and your seals shall be lifted.

203875.text: This girl is in danger, we should unite together to defeat the mirror monster.

203876.text: After making eye contact with each other, the two girls start to summon their own power.

203877.text: Oh myriad souls, please answer my call!

203878.text: Wait, let me summon some Stars first! Go ahead, Ella's special-made Star pie!

203880.text: At this moment – in the body of the girl.

203881.text: I didn't expect that the ruler of the River of the Underworld would also be here.

203882.text: It's so dark here... Anyone there?

203883.text: But even if you save her from the mirror...

203885.text: The girl hugs herself, trying to keep warm.

203887.text: The huge burning blade cut the monster in half, and the long-lost friend finally show up again.

203889.text: Phew– We can finally get out of there and breathe some fresh air.

203890.text: Nocturna! I thought we'd never see you again...

203892.text: Why didn't you go to the Chrono Tower!

203894.text: Didn't we say that we'd go and play near the Chrono Tower?

203895.text: The girl in purple bursts out laughing after hearing this.

203897.text: Haha! I can't take it anymore. Oh, Ella, nobody can be this silly!

203899.text: Nocturna was talking about going to the forest of Lunia.

203901.text: I bet you must have heard there was tasty food near the Chrono Tower. That's why you got bewildered.

203903.text: As it turns out, Nocturna was right to let me follow you.

203904.text: We were intended to go to Lunia but you ended up around Chrono Tower. No one could be this muddled like you.

203905.text: I planned to come out earlier to remind you, but I just found your forgetfulness endearing so I didn't tell you.

203906.text: Ahhh! Metamorphoses, that's so cruel of you!

203907.text: So then Nocturna, did you have fun in Lunia?

203908.text: Sure! Something very interesting happened to me, I'll tell you about it later.

203909.text: What about after that? How did you end up here?

203910.text: I didn't see you near the forest of Lunia, so I thought you might have gotten lost on your way.

203911.text: I walked over to Muntenia to see if I could find you on the way.

203912.text: Then I ended up caught in this place, but it's really a shame that I quite enjoyed staying here.

203913.text: You're such a simpleton sometimes! If it weren't for us, you would have been possessed by the black smoke.

203914.text: Don't ever mention that! If it weren't for you, I wouldn't have suffered under a full moon. My body is still in pain!

203915.text: This must be.. the wine of victory.

203916.text: Acheronte smiles softly, and interrupts the girls' chatter a moment later.

203917.text: Stop the small talk, if you quarrel more, this girl's fire of life will extinguish.

203918.text: There's more and more black smoke on the girl.

203920.text: Ella, don't worry, she'll be fine.

203921.text: They put Stars around the girl, like the moon surrounded by the stars.

203922.text: Under the soft glow of the Stars, the black smoke gradually disappears from the girl's body and the pain on her face decreases as well.

203923.text: Ella and the others explain to Acheronte what happened to them before.

203924.text: Since we were transported here, we must have some linkage to this world. But one thing strange is that I didn't experience the constraint thing you just said.

203925.text: All of us were trapped here before and then released after the two corresponding mirrors were destroyed.

203927.text: There is no use talking about that!

203928.text: Now all seven mirrors have been destroyed. Why can't we return to the original world? And Miss Witch is still unconscious.

203929.text: In this case, it seems that she is the core of this matter.

203930.text: Speaking of which, it feels like we haven't heard from the lady in black for a long time now... Could she be the one that summoned Lady Acheronte?

203931.text: It surely stands a good chance. Summoning Lady Acheronte might have used up her power.

203932.text: Lady Acheronte, tell us what happened in the seventh mirror. Maybe we could find some hints.

203933.text: Ok then, give me your full attention.

203934.text: Acheronte starts to talk about her experiences inside the mirror–

203936.text: Going back in time. In the seventh mirror–

203937.text: This place is void of souls, nothing like the River of the Underworld. Where am I?

203938.text: A girl's scream sounds from afar.

203939.text: Ah– Don't take another step closer!

203941.text: Acheronte flies towards the voice and a huge altar unfolds before her eyes. The girl surrounded by a strong aura was bound at the center of the alter.

203944.text: A great deal of black smoke bursts forth from all sides, madly pouring into the girl's body.

203945.text: Is this black smoke the Nightmare? But there are some discrepancies... How I wish she could be here. She is knowledgeable and she may know that.

203948.text: The back? How come your body has such a huge hole? The bond in the middle...

203949.text: So that is how it is. Evil spirit of the unknown realm, show yourself to me!

203950.text: You guessed right, ruler of the River of the Underworld.

203951.text: Your presence here is purely an accident, now, could you go back?

203952.text: Watch your tone, I have never been so offended before!

203953.text: So you are determined to interfere with this affair?

203954.text: Not only will I interfere, but I also intend to "invite" an evil spirit like you to the River of the Underworld.

203955.text: I am after all the ruler of the world's darkest realm.

203956.text: I showed you the respect worthy of a ruler, but I didn't expect you to be so ungrateful.

203957.text: What? Are you afraid of me?

203958.text: Afraid of you? You are too arrogant. Let me give you a taste of my power!

203959.text: Power? As an evil spirit that steals power from others to domineer, you're not fit to talk about power.

203960.text: Hmph, no need to say more! Chronospace Gate!

203961.text: The Enormous magic causes cracks around Acheronte.

203962.text: Chronospace Magic? Who the hell is this girl?

203963.text: The girl cannot withstand it any longer, take her out of here!

203964.text: In this mirror world, you cannot beat her! I will summon Stars to cover for you!

203965.text: Who is talking in my mind? How dare you?!

203966.text: Quick! If she were devoured, the consequences would be dire!

203968.text: The whole world starts to shake. Followed by the falling Stars is the non-stop sound of mirror breaking.

203969.text: Rays of blindingly white light shoot into the mirror through the cracks.

203970.text: You again! You have stood in my way too many times! Once I am finished with these girls here, you are next!

203971.text: I have created a barrier that prevents her from leaving, you take the girl and run!

203972.text: Acheronte lifts the girl and flies away.

203973.text: No way! I summon you, my minions! Rip them apart!

203975.text: Don't be afraid! Just persist until the white light covers the whole world.

203976.text: I'll trust you once! Take that!

203977.text: Now! It's time to leave this world!

203978.text: Flames of Sin, cover for me!

203980.text: When I left that mirror world, the mirror you were in made a huge sound.

203981.text: If it weren't for the fact that you looked so pitiful, I wouldn't have helped you.

203982.text: Metamorphoses is about to argue, but Ella disrupts her.

203983.text: Oh no! Miss Witch is once again reeked with the black smoke.

203984.text: Calm down! When I fought her, I noticed the black smoke is very similar to the soul power.

203985.text: Metamorphoses, since you can control the soul power, you shall suppress the black smoke alongside me.

203987.text: I'll do the summoning of the Stars.

203988.text: Lady in black, you are finally back!

203989.text: Sorry, Ella, summoning Lady Acheronte used up more power than I expected. With that said, let's get to save the girl!

203992.text: It doesn't work! Even with the two of us working together, the power is still not enough.

203993.text: Even the Stars are blackening visibly.

203996.text: At the same time, in the heart of the girl stands a huge mirror, showing her reflection. She turns into a gruesome monster in a blink.

203997.text: By the mirror is a campfire, so dim that it seemingly could extinguish any second. The girl, sitting by the campfire, is painfully holding her head with her hands as many images flash before her eyes.

203998.text: I want to turn this world back to normal...

203999.text: The girl is talking to a lone figure.

204000.text: If I stop here, I won't be able to save anyone, and my own world will be destroyed as well.

204001.text: The girl seems to be inciting something.

204002.text: The root cause of the magic leak seems to be under the...

204004.text: The girl walks forward with determination.

204008.text: Black smoke comes out of the girl's body and forms into a great storm against the flashes of images.

204010.text: Don't you feel that... it is abnormal?

204011.text: Seeing the scene in front of her, the girl wears a surprised expression.

204012.text: ...Isn't it warm? Don't be afraid, come closer.

204013.text: I wanna go to see... Maybe I could...

204015.text: I just want to stop... and reduce...

204016.text: Please stop... Eliminating this world's... is my...

204017.text: Am I the one in those images? These fragments, are they from the future?

204018.text: Who else could it be? All these are related to you.

204020.text: Don't embellish your actions! Have you ever understood the meaning of [salvation]? You can only bring endless destructions.

204021.text: [Desire] to save everything. You only care for your own world.

204022.text: [Devour] before salvation. You devour other people's powers in the name of salvation.

204023.text: [Seduced] by smoke and mirrors. Have you ever considered if all your actions have been of your free will?

204024.text: [Intangible] with countless shadows. Every world falls under the shadow of your interference.

204025.text: [Sloth] of standing still. Each time you bring an end to a world, you never investigate the cause, but just place the hope of restoring the order on the next world.

204026.text: [Wrath] from being powerless. You keep on destroying, keep on raging against your own incompetence, but you still keep on repeating the same tragedies, whether it's past, present, or future.

204027.text: [Pride] from self-approbation. You always believe your action is the correct way to save the world.

204028.text: You are not even qualified to be my vessel, let alone hers?

204029.text: The storm encircles the girl and her eyes start to lose their shine.

204031.text: From now on, your name shall be ...la. The human world is very interesting...

204032.text: The moonlight is beautiful tonight, the perfect time to... blood~

204033.text: Are you suffering from not having emotions? How about I teach you... other people's emotions?

204035.text: Your existence is unnecessary in this world. Sacrifice yourself to me.

204036.text: Her back has been pierced through, and from the hole, boundless black smoke pours into her body. The punisher of destiny has taken shape.

204037.text: Everyone is a slave of destiny, and you are no exception.

204038.text: Like a marionette, dancing on the palm of destiny. Pathetic, lamentable.

204039.text: The girl opens her arms, gives up resistance, and braces herself for the Incarnation of Destiny who devours her power frantically and fills the large hole in her body.

204040.text: Finally, the two roll into one.

204041.text: From now on, I am you, you are me.

204042.text: Finally, I can leave this world. Haha!

204044.text: I didn't mean to reveal myself, but I cannot condone your actions.

204046.text: My name is Asherah. I am the Protector of Irminsul, the land of glory.

204048.text: If not for the energy in your second mirror, I wouldn't have awakened again.

204049.text: What? You just boasted of being the Incarnation of Fate.

204050.text: And now you panic for my presence?

204051.text: A loser devoured by me still dares to appear before me?

204053.text: I never imagined you are brazen enough to say that!

204054.text: Now, I am her, she is me.

204055.text: The shameful you only reveal human failings.

204056.text: You're nothing like that girl who always chooses to shoulder all the responsibilities.

204058.text: Asherah! Why are you ruining my plans?

204059.text: You have forgotten that she had destroyed your world?

204060.text: Insolence! Shut up! I have not forgotten and I don't need you to remind me.

204061.text: But if I let you devour her now, where would the future of Irminsul lie?

204062.text: Urgh! If I promise I would save Irminsul? Would you keep out of this?

204063.text: Someone like you could only know how to abuse people's weaknesses. You shall never have my trust.

204064.text: Witch, tainted by the forbidden magic, when will you wake up?

204066.text: Are you willing to let scum like that take over your body? Where's your willpower and confidence when you defeated me? And the conviction to save the world even if that means defeating a Protector?

204067.text: I am still waiting for the day you save your world and mine.

204068.text: If you are to abandon everything and lose yourself, then I have misjudged you. If you cannot conquer yourself, how could you save the world?

204069.text: Now, wake up and shoulder your responsibilities.

204070.text: Life energy flows out from the hole bit by bit and covers the girl's whole body.

204071.text: The black smoke gradually disappears and light reappears in the girl's world.

204072.text: Ah— Yes! I have been too lonely for long, caught in my fixation, and forgot the most important thing.

204073.text: You did bring destruction to the world, but you did it with the intention of salvation.

204074.text: Even when you were blaming yourself, you still kept trying to remedy your mistakes.

204075.text: Keeping your promises and shouldering your responsibilities, is the greatest gesture of gratitude you could show me.

204078.text: The power of the protector from the land of glory, bloom again!

204079.text: Witch of the forbidden magic, feel the essence of my life power.

204080.text: Dispel darkness, become light and find yourself!

204081.text: The girl waves her staff with great efforts, and an endless life force flows out accompanied by huge flower petals.

204082.text: A dark energy being is expelled.

204083.text: I can only get you this far. I'm leaving, and the rest is up to you.

204084.text: You shall never forget your mission no matter when.

204088.text: Good, let me finish you with my own hands!

204089.text: Take this! Today, I will face myself and conquer myself!

204091.text: Rays of light burst out with the girl in the center.

204094.text: Our efforts are not in vain.

204095.text: A dark energy being is expelled out of the girl's body, fleeing at full speed.

204096.text: At the same time, a light orb separated from that figure is absorbed by the girl.

204097.text: Damn you Asherah! I won't let you off!

204098.text: I might still have doubts in the future, but from now on I will face them directly. As long as this light is with me, I will never lose myself again.

204099.text: My selfhood is determined by myself. Farewell! You pathetic Fate!

204101.text: The girl shatters Fate with one blow. At that moment, the world seems to freeze.

204102.text: A second later, a strong wave of light sweeps the whole world.

204103.text: As the light wave spreads, the world crashes like a broken mirror and finally shows its true nature.

204105.text: It looks like we have finally left that place.

204107.text: In the center of this world, a girl lies on a huge bed, sleeping soundly, and from time to time frowns while murmuring in the dream.

204108.text: Mm-hmm... I wanna try the Star pie!

204109.text: You are hopeless, still thinking about food even in sleep.

204110.text: Oh– You have finally reached this place.

204111.text: Would you please give us an explanation?

204113.text: The cute one sleeping on the bed is Nannar, the guard of the gate to the Space of Void.

204114.text: She has the power to command the mirror world.

204115.text: I am also Nannar, her reflection in the mirror. I am another side of her, in charge of keeping her safe.

204116.text: Then why do you summon us to this place?

204117.text: Patience! The real world and the mirror world are like the two sides of the same coin.

204118.text: As a result, the mirror world tends to garner negative energy which has spawned many evil things in the past.

204119.text: To prevent them from escaping from the mirror world is our secret duty.

204120.text: But this time, the situation is quite particular. As a rule, it should be impossible to invade the place where Nannar sleeps, since she is the ruler of the mirror world.

204121.text: Maybe too much negative energy amassed... Anyway, a wave of negative energy assaulted her dreams in the form of Nightmare when she was sleeping.

204123.text: Why not escape quietly while she is sleeping?

204124.text: Because negative energy is born in this place and cannot leave this world without a body.

204125.text: It tried to possess Nannar's body by exploiting her weak defense in the dream so that it could go to the outside world.

204126.text: So you summoned us to help her fight off the Nightmare?

204127.text: Yes, she is very timid and doesn't have any friends so...

204128.text: I could only try to summon the strong ones who may be able to aid her.

204129.text: However, I underestimated the power of the Nightmare. It took full control of her dreamland in an instant.

204130.text: That's why my power was subdued!

204131.text: Yes. And after that, it noticed my summoning.

204132.text: So it interfered and changed the summoned target to the one that was easier to control.

204134.text: That's what's called human weaknesses, isn't it?

204135.text: Yeah! Everyone has some sort of weak spots.

204136.text: But I guess it picked the one that had been badly traumatized.

204137.text: The more severe the trauma they have experienced, the bigger the cracks in their hearts are, and thus it becomes easier to hijack them.

204138.text: After hearing the story behind the incident, everyone falls into silence.

204139.text: Then, what were the Stars that saved us in the nick of time?

204140.text: Ah, those were actually Star pies, a specialty dish only existing in the mirror world.

204142.text: Every time she is upset after returning from the outside world, I would make it for her.

204143.text: This time, with the Nightmare taking control of her dreams, I didn't know what to do, so I made Star pies for her as usual.

204144.text: I thought sensing her favorite food might help her regain control of her dreamland.

204145.text: She really summoned a lot of the pies.

204146.text: It seems the pies have been beneficial to you. I'm so glad about that.

204147.text: Wow– Nocturna! Metamorphoses! The Stars are really pies!

204148.text: Hoho, my instincts are right on!

204149.text: Hehe, you were able to summon Stars halfway because you found out its true nature~ The power of the Stars and the loud calls both made it easier for her to resonate with you.

204150.text: You can try the pies later before you leave~

204151.text: Ella, Nocturna, you two are drooling, stop it, it's unbecoming.

204152.text: Hmph, why not? I want to have a taste of it.

204153.text: Thank you all for helping out and preventing a disaster.

204154.text: You're welcome. I also found a part of myself through this adventure.

204155.text: I would be less lonely on the road ahead.

204157.text: Well, having talked for so long, this one here should be waking up soon.

204158.text: Mm-hmm... I feel I have slept for a long time...

204159.text: Hm? Ah– So many people! Save me!

204160.text: The girl who just woke up hides herself behind the bed. Everyone else bursts out laughing.

204199.text: It's you again... Why do you keep following me?...

204200.text: It looks like you need to suffer a little!

204201.text: You've got some skills, unlike those commoners.

204205.text: You are not coming to challenge me? Then what are you up to? Need my help?

204206.text: I'm just trying to find a way to stop the blizzard.

204207.text: Why are you bothering me? I don't know...

204208.text: But you spoke about freezing the world...

204209.text: Does the blizzard have anything to do with you?

204210.text: What nonsense are you talking about? I may have magic beyond any mortals' reach, but I'm an open-minded individual. I'm not interested in doing such boring things.

204211.text: Why don't you get out of the way? I told you, the blizzard has nothing to do with me.

204212.text: You're so annoying. Lilia is still waiting for me. We're going to attend a festival together. I'll be late if I keep dawdling with you here.

204213.text: The Protector on the mountain top should know about the blizzard. Go to her if you have any questions. And stop pestering me!

204214.text: Just as suspected, maybe we'll find out once we get to the top.

204215.text: Let's head to the mountain top.

204216.text: So naive. Is that really true?

204218.text: Don't you think that girl was suspicious?

204220.text: She seemed to be avoiding us the whole time. Could it be that the blizzard may have something to do with her, so she told us the wrong direction on purpose?

204221.text: Are we really going to find the wolf pack? Wolves are ferocious predators!

204222.text: Don't worry, I'm here with you.

204223.text: But there are so many of them, with only you...

204224.text: If anything goes wrong, we will retreat...

204225.text: Well, if there is a fight, just run away!

204226.text: That was a big one, what a fright.

204227.text: I thought this place was short of food. How can such a giant bear survive here?

204228.text: It's better not to mess with these beasts...

204229.text: But it attacked the humans first...

204231.text: The wolf pack's territory should be up ahead.

204232.text: It's freezing. The blizzard is getting heavier.

204233.text: Just hang in there for a bit longer, and we'll go light a fire up ahead.

204234.text: Let's make a run over there, my hands are all frozen red.

204235.text: So it was these guys who were behind all the trouble.

204237.text: Didn't they say why? They wanted to stir up conflicts between humans and wolves.

204238.text: Why hasn't Pakane come yet? Did she run into trouble on the way?

204239.text: Excuse me, may I ask you something?

204240.text: I am Lilia from Holmgard, I have made an appointment to go to a festival with my friend, but I have waited for a long time and still haven't seen her.

204241.text: Excuse me, have you seen a sorceress with a wand and magical wings on her back?

204244.text: Did you see her? Where is she...

204247.text: Ah, it's you... Why are you here?

204249.text: I don't know this stalker. All right then Lilia, let's go to the festival.

204252.text: There are no such festivals in my hometown so it's going to be a precious experience.

204253.text: I haven't been to such a lively place for a long time. Human villages are more interesting, let's go see the ice sculptures later.

204254.text: Ah, it's you again! I told you about the blizzard, don't bother me anymore!

204255.text: I want to know how to stop the blizzard...

204256.text: I told you, all you have to do is go to the Glacial Castle on top of the mountain. You're so annoying, such a buzzkill.

204257.text: The ice sculpture show is about to start, Lilia. let's go!

204258.text: Sorry, Pakane did not mean any harm, however, it's the first time I've seen her so flustered!

204261.text: I'm sorry that I couldn't help playing a trick on such a lovely person like Pakane...

204262.text: Sorry about that here is not my homeland, so I'm very interested in the Glacial Castle you talked about.

204263.text: Is it at the top of the mountain? I want to go see it with you after the ice sculpture show!

204264.text: There seems to be a cry of a beast ahead.

204265.text: Could it be the big bear before... I don't want to fight that monster again.

204267.text: As we got to the ice sculpture show, the show was over. Pakane seemed kind of disappointed and went back to Landnama, but I wanted to stay here for a while.

204268.text: The castle at the top of the mountain...

204269.text: Yeah, I've been to the mountain top. It's such a magnificent castle. There are castles in my country but they can't be compared with that one at all. It's actually beyond words.

204270.text: The castle is just ahead, let's go check it out.

204271.text: I didn't think that there were humans who could control monsters...

204272.text: Don't you think those monsters are disgusting? I can't believe there are people committed to the darkness...

204273.text: And that guy was saying something inexplicable.

204274.text: After all, there has been such a long time in the tower...

204275.text: In my homeland, this is called a mental disorder, and a doctor is needed.

204276.text: They seem to be sealing up those cracks.

204277.text: What's the point of wasting so much effort to do so?

204278.text: It should have something to do with the truth of this world...

204279.text: Come on, let's keep up. Maybe we'll find something.

204280.text: There's a boundary like the one from before.

204282.text: There seems to be a fight up ahead.

204283.text: That voice... it's the hunter we just met?

204285.text: Get out of here quickly or we'll be attacked by those monsters again.

204287.text: It should be the magic circle that controls the boundary.

204288.text: Such an important magic circle must be heavily guarded, be careful.

204289.text: What's all that noise? It seems like there's a fight.

204290.text: A strange sound? I didn't hear it...

204291.text: I'm pretty confident in my hearing. Someone must be commanding others.

204293.text: It's like a bunch of people fighting some monster, I think we should go over there to check it out.

204294.text: Up ahead is the camp the guards mentioned, right? Are they also attacked by monsters?

204295.text: They must need our help, let's not waste time here.

204296.text: Shall we return the bow to that scatterbrain?

204298.text: The one who dug a hole and fell into it.

204300.text: Lady La Crima, it's been so long. You...

204303.text: Don't look at me like that, I didn't do anything...

204304.text: Lady La Crima is afraid of talking with others, and we're all used to it. She may seem weird, but her magical talents are nevertheless the best.

204305.text: Never mind that, let's just get to work on those cracks.

204306.text: Ah, it's you, long time no see. Thanks to your help, I repelled those monsters at the camp.

204308.text: Those monsters have been seen everywhere recently. Our order does not have enough man to deal with them...

204309.text: I saw Lady La Crima just now, she is the heir of the Gem Magic. If you get her help, you won't have to be afraid of those monsters.

204310.text: She was here just a moment ago, but she has disappeared in a second. How strange...

204311.text: Thank you for stopping me, goodbye!

204313.text: It seems to have something written on it...

204314.text: This is a record of... ancient lost swordsmanship!

204315.text: The blood of the sword that flows in my body will ascend me to a higher place!

204317.text: Is there any secret nearby that Eulalia doesn't know?

204319.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204320.text: Is that the payment for my performance?

204321.text: Is that the answer to the riddle?

204322.text: The aroma of flowers is nearby.

204323.text: Search carefully, we should be able to find clues to the riddle.

204324.text: What a beautiful melody. Is it around here?

204325.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204326.text: What could be hidden in this chest?

204327.text: That's not gonna be a problem to Anemone, the answer's right over there.

204328.text: Is there a reward for Anemone around here?

204329.text: Is that a... riddle over there?

204330.text: Is there anything good around here?

204331.text: Search carefully, the clue is nearby.

204333.text: The answer to the riddle lies in the darkness...

204334.text: Explore carefully and your efforts won't be in vain.

204335.text: Haven't you noticed? The clue is nearby.

204337.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204338.text: Is that a... chest over there?

204339.text: What's over there? I'm very interested.

204340.text: Is that a reward for me?

204343.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204344.text: Is that... the Guidance from God over there?

204345.text: I won't be trapped by this kind of difficulty.

204346.text: I look forward to it... The pain in the chest...

204347.text: Explore carefully and your efforts won't be in vain.

204348.text: The grace from God is nearby.

204349.text: Let me guess, the answer is over there.

204350.text: My sixth sense told me the treasure is nearby.

204351.text: Don't worry, the clue is nearby.

204352.text: Hurry up, there's the reward you deserved.

204353.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204354.text: Hold on for a while, supplies are nearby.

204357.text: The clue is nearby, and I will not be trapped.

204358.text: The grace of the wind lies somewhere around here.

204359.text: The result of divination points forward.

204361.text: Pay attention to the clues around you.

204362.text: There's always something to gain only with carefulness.

204364.text: Is that a gift to you from someone else? Woo-hoo, it's over there!

204365.text: The answer is around here, it's really exciting.

204373.text: Well, the answer's right over there.

204374.text: Is it a reward for me? Bring it to me now.

204375.text: Do you think such a simple riddle would stump me?

204377.text: Want a hint from me? The answer's over there.

204378.text: Open the chest and give me the treasure inside.

204379.text: There is no doubt that the answer lies ahead.

204380.text: The fire of Und'rw'rld shall reciprocate you!

204381.text: Search carefully, the clue is nearby.

204382.text: I'm looking forward to the chest ahead!

204383.text: The answer to the riddle? Isn't it just up ahead?

204384.text: Is that the reward for practicing?

204386.text: It's a gift from the goddess, just take it.

204388.text: What's in the chest? Come on, open it!

204389.text: The answer to the riddle is over there, it's almost time for a break.

204390.text: Is that the reward for hard work?

204392.text: Explore carefully and your efforts won't be in vain.

204393.text: The clue's right over there, I'm glad I could help.

204394.text: The chest of reward, do you want me to open it for you?

204395.text: Let's solve the riddle, I'm very good at it!

204396.text: Is the shiny thing... a chest?

204400.text: That chest over there, you deserve it.

204401.text: Do you want to solve the riddle? But the answer is just over there.

204402.text: There's a chest over there, quickly open it.

204403.text: Searching for clues carefully following God's guidance.

204404.text: This is the gift of God.

204406.text: Is that... a gift over there?

204407.text: Look, the clue is right over there!

204408.text: That's... a gift from someone. Who could it be?

204409.text: Take a look over there, the clue is right there.

204411.text: Hurry up and look, Nannar is going back.

204412.text: What... could be inside of it...

204413.text: God leads us to check out there.

204414.text: Open the chest and thank God for the gift.

204415.text: I know there is a clue there, but can we just not go over there?

204416.text: Ah, is it a game of "guess what's in the chest"?

204418.text: Is it a reward for me?

204421.text: The clue is over there, go and find it.

204422.text: The new material for the experiment is nearby.

204423.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204424.text: It's a gift from the goddess.

204425.text: The clue is right over there.

204426.text: That chest over there is probably for you.

204428.text: Exploring nearby will naturally pay off.

204429.text: The clue is right over there.

204430.text: Is it a gift from someone?

204431.text: The unknown riddle is very interesting to me.

204433.text: Attention, the clue is right over there.

204435.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204436.text: Exploring nearby will naturally pay off.

204437.text: The hint to solving the riddle is right over there.

204438.text: What is inside the chest over there?

204440.text: Collecting mirror shards is your trial, and only by completing the trial can you inherit the power of the Chronospace Protector.

204441.text: Well, I look forward to your return.

204443.text: Inherit the power of the Chronospace Protector?

204444.text: Silver-haired human, only you can inherit this great power.

204445.text: This place has been plunged into chaos like the world you lived in before. Only by inheriting the power of the Chronospace Protector can the world be restored to peace.

204446.text: Master, it seems that you have managed to guess the cause of the chaos in this world.

204448.text: Yes, only by defeating her can you gain her power to reshape the world.

204450.text: Is that a chest over there?

204452.text: Is there a gift for me in the chest?

204453.text:
The concentration of magic is surprisingly high as well. The people here will...
No, I must not let anyone here get hurt...

204455.text: A chevalier without magic, huh? What are you doing here?

204456.text: Flare, I know this is your hometown, so I thought I might be able to meet you here...

204457.text: So you hid and spied on me?

204458.text: No, I didn't... I just wanted to ask about Lady Asherah.

204460.text: Yes, as you know, this land has suffered from Magical Abnormality. Only Lady Asherah can save this land, but why won't she see me...

204461.text: Apparently, the Protector isn't interested in talking to people like you, and neither am I.

204462.text: But we used to talk about everything! Back then, we swore to guard Lady Asherah, escorting her on her rounds and receiving her people...

204463.text: It's all in the past, do you really think you can talk with the Protector with you like this?!

204465.text: Be clear about your place here, chevalier! The Protector won't see you!

204466.text: Flare, why did you stop me from visiting Lady Asherah? This land has suffered from Magical Abnormality. Only she can save this land, but why she turns a blind eye!

204467.text: Phrygia, you are just a chevalier incapable of performing magic. How could Protector waste time seeing you?

204468.text: Don't stand in my way, Flare. To save Irminsul, I have to ask Lady Asherah personally. You'd better leave now. I don't want to fight you.

204469.text: You! Have you betrayed the glory granted by the Protector? Since you have forsaken your oath, I'll only punish you for the Protector.

204470.text: Humph, a chevalier who knows nothing of magic, how can I expect you to understand the Protector's aim. But Phrygia, don't you dare to forget your oath!

204471.text: Though you defeat me, the Protector still won't see you! Phrygia, hold to your oath!

204472.text: I swore by my sword to protect my beloved world and now I've decided that it's the time to live up to that oath.

204473.text: Flare, I shall never give up. Since I swore an oath to protect the world in the name of the chevalier, I shall keep my oath to end the chaos in this world.

204477.text: Stop right there! Hand over the grains!

204478.text: Everyone is looking for the stele. Does it hold some sort of secret?

204479.text: It may be a clue to the treasure spoken of in legends.

204480.text: The Wraithscythe said that the magic circle was nearby.

204483.text: Goorveig, you broke the Deliverer's oath. I will bring you back to Acheronte.

204484.text: It's been a while, Kyphon. Shouldn't you be slacking off on the River of the Underworld, now that I'm not there? Why make things harder for yourself?

204485.text: Come quietly, Goorveig. Time's a-wasting, and I have a nap to get back to.

204486.text: Haha... Fool, I'd like to see you try...

204487.text: Return to the River with me, Goorveig. Acheronte will punish you accordingly.

204488.text: You will never succeed! No matter how many times Demongods come back, they will always be vanquished!

204489.text: Fool, you can't stop us. We will reach our goal.

204490.text: Even if I should fall, Gordia's revival cannot be stopped. We will reach our goal.

204492.text: We're closing up! Come back next time~

204494.text: Finally arrived at the island. An exciting adventure is about to begin.

204495.text: It's getting dark. Need to quickly find a place to spend the night.

204496.text: After the exhausting fight, the Witch and her companions finally find a place to rest.

204497.text: Something is glowing on the ground. Tama rushes toward it, leaving the others behind.

204498.text: There is a village faintly visible in the distance. Excited, they decide to check it out.

204499.text: In a deserted forest, the two who have been secretly following the Witch are discussing their plan.

204500.text: Tama's foot injury is getting worse and needs immediate treatment.

204501.text: There might be herbs in the village that can heal Tama's foot injury. Ask the villagers about it.

204502.text: In the evening, a mysterious shadow shows up on the beach.

204503.text: The Witch and her companions decide to trade their gathered supplies for things they need with the villagers.

204504.text: It seems the Witch and her companions are not the only outsiders in the village. A cheerful girl runs up to the Witch.

204505.text: After having fun with Watermelon Smashing, they decide to take a break and ask the villagers about the Sea Elf.

204506.text: That night on the beach, a figure suspected to be the Sea Elf shows up.

204507.text: After waking up, the girls start reviewing the intel they have gathered on Sea Elf.

204508.text: The beach is strangely quiet in the evening. The real Sea Elf might show up tonight.

204509.text: The Sea Elf arranges to meet the girls again on the beach. The girls are excited.

204540.text: That black cat has also prepared various gifts for you but it takes some work before getting all of them.

204542.text: I hear there's a nameless island to the east of Sunrise Island. That's where the Sea Elf was sighted.

204543.text: Perhaps the sudden flash of the Soul Bottle has something to do with it?

204544.text: Because of what I've been through, I'm always curious about deities...

204545.text: You guys want to go there?

204546.text: I'm curious about what happened to the Soul Bottle

204547.text: Besides, it's not safe for you two to go alone. You need the protection of my sword.

204552.text: I've been to another world before but didn't stay this long.

204553.text: This actually feels like a picnic trip, which is unexpected.

204555.text: We barely arrived and they're already here to give us a warm welcome... Reminds me of when I step into a clothing store.

204556.text: It seems we have disturbed them.

204557.text: (points at the creatures strewn on the ground) These creatures look like they could be made into something delicious! Like... grilled meat?

204558.text: The octopuses that were full of life just a moment ago now lie dead. Good thing is they're still fresh.

204559.text: In my hometown, octopus can indeed be made into dishes— even without being cooked.

204560.text: Why are there so many creatures here?

204561.text: Normally beach creatures aren't so hostile to humans, are they?

204562.text: Perhaps they attack us because they've never seen outsiders before.

204563.text: Look, is that something they just dropped?

204564.text: In the moonlight, the trio looks toward where the battle happened and sees something glowing, something apparently more valuable than the creature that just dropped it.

204565.text: I remember the creatures we fought earlier didn't drop those.

204566.text: So the materials that appeared out of nowhere earlier were also dropped by them?

204567.text: Food is the only valuable thing!

204568.text: Looks like we just discovered a secret about this island.

204570.text: Probably. But it's getting dark. Let's find a place to spend the night.

204571.text: Shuffle and Yothaya cherish this moment of rest before the big battle with the monster.

204572.text: The Witch and her companions are making final preparations for the big battle on the Beachside.

204573.text: Victory! Time to enjoy the celebration party.

204574.text: Akasha is curious about Tama's obsession with God and decides to ask her about it.

204575.text: Yothaya, repulsed by beach creatures, regrets coming to the island with Shuffle.

204576.text: The overzealous Suigetsu looks out of place with the village.

204577.text: The innocent Ardisia soon fits in with the village.

204578.text: Symbriette stands alone on the beach, telling the sea about her wishes.

204579.text: Curious about the object Symbriette cherishes so much, the girls decide to ask her about it.

204580.text: Island Today: sunny, with moderate temperature.$B$Perfect for outdoor exploration.

204581.text: Nice weather. They say not getting enough rest affects your mood. Luckily I had a good night's sleep.

204582.text: (stretches and yawns, then says in a sleepy daze) Huff... hmm... I'm a little hungry.

204583.text: (takes out weapon and brandishes it) Tama, do you need me to wake you up? I could take this chance to try out my new move.

204584.text: We gotta find a place to stay quickly. Don't want to spend another night out in the wild.

204585.text: Alright, how about we go that way?

204586.text: There's something glowing on the ground over there. I'll go check.

204587.text: Before the other two set off, Tama is already dashing toward there.

204589.text: The other two hurry over and see Tama sitting on the beach covering her swollen right ankle with her hand, face screwed up in pain.

204593.text: Phew, that was a close call. What was that about anyway? Why did those beach creatures attack us on sight?

204595.text: Don't worry. I can still walk.

204596.text: We should stay away from the beach. Let's cut through the forest.

204597.text: Some of the taller trees block the sunlight, making it difficult to see the path ahead.

204598.text: Are you sure this is a good idea?

204599.text: There's nothing out here but the sea and beach. This forest is the only path to the inner part of the island. Don’t worry, I won't let anyone hurt you.

204600.text: The three cross the forest and see, to their surprise, a building not far ahead along with barely visible people. They decide to check it out.

204601.text: ...Who are you? What's your business here?

204602.text: I heard the Sea Elf was sighted on this island.

204603.text: We want to explore this island.

204604.text: (looks the trio up and down and closes his grip around the farm implement in hand) Outsiders, if you want something from us, you gotta earn it.

204605.text: Looks like those people are not very easy to talk to...

204606.text: Since we're new here, let's just do what they say. Besides, we need to collect some supplies for the night anyway.

204607.text: Island Today: sunny, temperature up.$B$People who go outside need to watch out for the heat.

204608.text: At this moment, somewhere deep in the forest where few people have been, two girls conversing.

204609.text: I wonder what kind of enemies I will encounter in this forest. Oh, the fun of fighting, I so look forward to it...

204610.text: Shuffle, what are you talking about? When people fight, they get hurt. And when they get hurt, they need treatment. I don't want us getting hurt...

204611.text: I've been tailing $heroine$ and working so hard to stay hidden. Now that we're finally here, I think I deserve a chance to satisfy my curiosity. Weren't you the one pestering me to come here and play?

204612.text: Um... That's only because I heard this is a beautiful little island with lots of cute little animals. Hehe, I can't wait to play with them.

204613.text: Something's coming this way. It seems we're not quite welcome here. Let's take care of these guys first, then we collect supplies in the area and build our own secret base!

204614.text: Secret base sounds fun! But still, I prefer not to fight...

204615.text: It's okay, leave it to me, hehe...

204616.text: My ankle is getting worse. I have to slow down...

204617.text: We should go collect more supplies to trade for some herbs with the villagers. You stay here and rest. We'll go look around.

204618.text: It's okay. I can still walk.

204619.text: Just then, there is a rustle from nearby, and a couple of menacing-looking enemies leap out of the grass.

204620.text: Saves me the trouble of looking for you! Let's clean them out.

204621.text: Check these out. Are they good enough for barter?

204622.text: Rare stuff. What do you want to trade them for?

204623.text: One of us got injured and is in urgent need of healing herbs.

204624.text: We also need info on the Sea Elf, and, if possible, a place to stay.

204625.text: (leaves after finishing speaking) Herbs, no problem, but if you want info and a place to stay, these are not enough. Come back tomorrow when you have more.

204626.text: Looks like we've got more collecting to do. The upside is he's become less wary of us. That's one step closer to getting a decent place to stay.

204627.text: We should get back to Tama. She's not safe alone.

204628.text: You're not scared of being out here on the beach at this hour? I mean... it's pitch dark...

204629.text: An open space like this is perfect for enjoying the night view.

204630.text: But... I'm still a little scared. You sure it's a good idea to stick around here? The sea is giving me the creeps. I think it's best if we stay away from it...

204631.text: Look, is that someone over there?

204633.text: Seriously, I'm not kidding. I think it's a girl... collecting conches on the beach?

204634.text: Collecting conches? Hope it's not some kind of hideous monster...

204635.text: (takes Yothaya by the hand) Don't be afraid. Let's check it out together.

204636.text: Slow down... slow down... Beach creatures incoming!

204637.text: Island Today: sunny to cloudy, same temperature as yesterday.$B$People who need to go outside to work can wait until it gets cloudy.

204638.text: We brought more supplies, as promised.

204639.text: We all think that if you can keep bringing us supplies, we can see about getting you a place to stay.

204641.text: We can keep bringing you supplies.

204642.text: That way we can gather intel more easily.

204643.text: And one more thing, just now another two girls came and pestered us to let them in, claiming they know you guys.

204644.text: Amid the rustle of leaves, two girls emerge from the bushes nearby.

204645.text: Adventuring is more fun with $heroine$ around. It's boring when it's just me and Yothaya.

204646.text: I... I followed Shuffle here... out of curiosity...

204648.text: Because I'm a big fan of $heroine$, of course.

204649.text: I heard this island is beautiful with lots of cute little animals...

204651.text: They step into the village, chatting and bantering. The villagers here, cut off from the outside world, somehow manage to stay self-sufficient. All their eyes fall on the new arrivals.

204652.text: It feels weird being stared at by so many people.

204653.text: They may have allowed us in, but all this gawking makes me feel unwelcome...

204654.text: Hi, are you the outsiders seeking accommodation in the village?

204655.text: Yes. You look different from the other villagers.

204656.text: Well, that's because I'm an outsider just like you. Probably the first outsider here too, haha.

204657.text: Sounds like you have an interesting story to tell.

204658.text: At first, the villagers were not used to my presence. They were pretty nervous at seeing me just like they are right now at seeing you, so don't worry.

204659.text: We're looking for information about the Sea Elf.

204660.text: No rush there. Play with me for a bit! In my hometown, there's this fun game called Watermelon Smashing. No one in this village has ever beat me. Lame. If you can beat me, I will tell you everything I know.

204662.text: It's a competition to smash as many watermelons as you can. You've got to do better than the villagers. Don't let me down!

204664.text: Woo! What a game! You won.

204665.text: Now can you tell me what you know about the Sea Elf?

204666.text: This Sea Elf you've been asking about, I hear she only shows up by the seaside at night. The villagers there might have seen her.

204667.text: You must be the ones bringing us supplies. Here's the deal. I don't know where the tale of the Sea Elf first began, but I did see her recently by the seaside.

204668.text: Yes, I saw it too. But since the Sea Elf appeared, beach creatures have been growing in numbers, attacking any humans passing by. Some people even saw a giant monster rising from the sea.

204669.text: In the past, we could freely gather supplies in this area. But that's impossible now with all those vicious creatures running amok. I can't thank you enough for what you're doing for us.

204670.text: Those vicious creatures, and even that giant monster, might be connected to the Sea Elf somehow... Yikes, I shudder to think about it.

204671.text: A little overwhelmed, huh? Haha, everyone gets excited at the mention of the monsters. But it's true, things are not looking good for this village. Hey, guys, guys, calm down! Don't worry, we will make short work of those monsters!

204672.text: Looks like $heroine$ is going to need my help again, hehe...

204673.text: Good. We need to head out to gather supplies anyway. Now that it's decided, let's go!

204674.text: Will we see the Sea Elf tonight...? I'm so excited.

204675.text: According to the villagers, she doesn't show up every day.

204676.text: Ah, I remembered. Shuffle and I also saw a strange figure by the seaside not long ago. Was that the Sea Elf you guys are looking for?

204677.text: That's true. But I'm more interested in the sea monsters than the Sea Elf. That said, I'm most interested in $heroine$!

204679.text: Hey, look over there. Isn't that the suspicious figure you guys were talking about?

204680.text: Far in the distance by the seaside, there is the figure of a girl, barely visible. She seems to be running away from something in panic.

204681.text: Is that the Sea Elf in legend? Looks like she's in trouble.

204682.text: Oh no. She's surrounded by those creatures. We gotta help her!

204694.text: Why the obsession with the god?

204696.text: This is a heavy subject. It's okay if you don't want to talk about it.

204697.text: Ugh, this place is nothing like you described!

204698.text: But it IS beautiful during the day, isn't it?

204699.text: You didn't tell me there would be horrible creatures at night!

204700.text: Are you afraid of those creatures even when I'm with you?

204701.text: Quite a scene you made back there!

204702.text: That wasn't my plan. You guys were too stubborn to listen to reason.

204703.text: And so you decided to wreak some havoc in our village...?

204704.text: I didn't have a choice. When words fail, force is the only option.

204705.text: Luckily everything worked out in the end, but I do hope that won't happen again.

204706.text: What is a cute girl like you doing out here on the beach alone?

204707.text: Since I was a kid, I loved walking on the beach, feeling the sea breeze, and collecting all kinds of conches.

204708.text: But it's not safe to be out here alone! Especially with those sea monsters on the loose.

204709.text: (smiles) Don't worry about me. Mom said she would keep me out of harm's way.

204711.text: Island Today: light rain to sunny, temperature dropped a little.$B$The air is fresh and healthy.

204712.text: It's raining. Let's rest a bit more. After that fierce battle yesterday, we need all recuperation we can get.

204713.text: Never thought I'd see the Sea Elf in the flesh.

204715.text: Let's go talk to her, see what she has to say.

204716.text: The girl walks over from the door, anxiously. Everyone's eyes fall on her.

204717.text: Thank you guys for coming to my rescue yesterday. Sorry to disappoint you, but I'm not this Sea Elf you've been looking for.

204718.text: You're NOT? Then what were you doing on the beach last night?

204719.text: I like conches, so I went out alone to the beach to collect them. And I like to feel the evening sea breeze on my face.

204720.text: (rubs bleary eyes) Huh? What are you guys doing huddled up like that? I think I was woken by the sound of conversation...

204722.text: (ponders for a moment) I went to the beach a lot, so I saw the Sea Elf quite a few times. I can give you some clues about her that might be useful to you.

204723.text: So you've come into contact with the Sea Elf?

204724.text: I saw her, yes... but every time I tried to approach her, she ran away.

204725.text: I wouldn't call that a "useful clue."

204726.text: Sorry, that's all I can tell you about her. Oh, and she showed up whenever the sea got choppy.

204727.text: Are you suggesting there's a connection between the Sea Elf and sea monsters?

204728.text: Sorry, I can't say for sure...

204729.text: So whenever sea monsters appear, there's a chance the Sea Elf appears too...? I see. Let's go back to the beach tonight and check it out.

204730.text: Will we see sea monsters? Hehe, can't wait to find out.

204731.text: Are we going to the beach again? But there are horrible monsters there...

204732.text: Don't worry, I'll protect you. Let's get prepared before it gets dark.

204733.text: The beach is strangely quiet tonight. Though it's already dusk, there are no signs of the usual beach creatures.

204734.text: Tonight we're going to see the real Sea Elf.

204735.text: You know what they say. The more you hope for something, the more you're likely to jinx it by talking about it.

204738.text: You two seem close. Anyway, I'm really hoping to see the Sea Elf tonight. Been curious about her.

204739.text: Look over there, is that the Sea Elf you're talking about?

204740.text: As soon as Yothaya says that, the others stop their chat and look in the direction she is pointing. They see a figure wandering on the beach, stopping once in a while to look around. She seems to be searching for something, just as that villager described.

204741.text: My prayers to the god have been answered!

204743.text: The Sea Elf stands there and notices someone coming at her.

204745.text: As soon as the Witch and her companions approach the Sea Elf, she quickly jumps into the sea, sending up huge waves that threaten to swallow her whole.

204746.text: Oh, she's shaking all over... A crazy and powerful aura has shrouded the sea surface.

204747.text: Are those the sea monsters the villagers talked about?

204748.text: They're going to get the Sea Elf!

204750.text: Island Today: cloudy to rainy early, clearing late, with moderate temperature and humid air.$B$Rainbows might appear after the rain.

204753.text: I woke up earlier than usual this morning 'cause I was still excited from the intense battle last night!

204755.text: After the battle last night, the Sea Elf talked to me...! And she thanked me. I mean, me, a nobody! And she even asked to meet me at the same spot today.

204756.text: I didn't hear her say those things, 'cause I was scared and busy assisting you guys from a distance.

204757.text: What are you waiting for, then? Let's go meet up with her!

204758.text: After getting ready, they return to the beach they went to last night. The Sea Elf is waiting there.

204761.text: Never thought I could ever talk to people face-to-face like this. Anyway, thank you for saving me.

204762.text: I've always wanted to see a deity in the flesh. Can't believe it's happening.

204763.text: Um, but I'm not a deity... I don't know why you people call me "Sea Elf," but I have a name, Symbriette.

204764.text: (mouth open in surprise) You're not a deity...?

204765.text: I come here a lot 'cause something dear to me fell to the Seabed. Uh... so I pray every day by the seaside, hoping the sea will return it to me, but my prayer has never been answered...

204766.text: Perhaps the Sea Elf is just a legend. Still, it's incredible that you can spend so much time on the beach without being harmed.

204767.text: May I ask you to please help me out one more time? I can't do it by myself. And after last night, I started to think that if we pull together, we might be able to defeat the monster. In return for your help, I will share with you the precious stuff I lost in the Seabed...!

204768.text: The monsters are making life hard for the villager. I'll help you.

204769.text: I'm not in it for any precious stuff.

204770.text: Any threatening monster must be eliminated.

204771.text: Sounds great. It pissed me off that we didn't defeat the monster last night. Next time we must win.

204773.text: (shakes Tama) We're happy to help. Don't want to leave a job half-done. But Tama has entered a trance. Hello...!? Looks like she's still not out of it.

204774.text: Sounds like quite a party. Count me in!

204775.text: They animatedly discuss how to deal with the sea monster and score a beautiful win.

204776.text: The horizon slowly turns orange-red. The rain has stopped, and a rainbow silently hangs above the setting sun.

204777.text: As the sun sinks in the west and the rainbow fades, a bright moon rises to the cloudless sky against a canvas full of stars, casting its radiance on the undulating surface of the sea.

204780.text: Hehe, told you this was a good idea.

204781.text: But... I'm still a little scared of being out here at night...

204782.text: Scared of what? If you're talking about monsters, I'll handle them.

204783.text: Island Today: sunny, temperature slightly higher than yesterday.$B$Nice weather for outdoor activities.

204784.text: I've got you some food. Hope you guys will like it.

204785.text: Anything else you need? We can help.

204786.text: Be careful. That monster might get stronger when provoked.

204787.text: After getting prepared, the Witch and her companions come to where the sea monster is supposed to be. According to Symbriette, few monsters show up in the daytime probably because they are averse to direct sunlight.

204788.text: The monster must be at the Seabed right now, 'cause it's pretty calm out here.

204789.text: What was that you took out of your pocket?

204790.text: You mean this? A gift from one of the villagers. Check this out. I just have to toss it like this, and...

204791.text: With a loud splash, the calm surface of the sea is shattered by a violent ripple, out of which a behemoth pokes its head.

204793.text: Pretty cool, huh? A villager taught me this trick. He'd thank me if he saw this.

204797.text: Phew... I knew we could defeat the monster.

204798.text: Let's take a break in the village.

204799.text: When I get back, I'm gonna tell everyone about this adventure. What happened these past few days is enough for me to brag about for a year! Whoa, what's with all the hustle and bustle?

204800.text: As soon as the Witch and her companions enter the village, they are greeted by an unexpected sight of joy and festivity: villagers running around, lanterns and bonfires everywhere. It's as if they are celebrating a holiday.

204801.text: We're thrilled to hear you defeated that monster, so we're throwing a banquet to celebrate!

204802.text: Thanks to you, we can live in peace again.

204803.text: You guys are back. Come try the dessert I just made!

204805.text: Reminds me of those festival rituals in my hometown where the Princess dances for the god.

204806.text: So many stalls! Laden with sweets and... mmmm... toys—

204807.text: Finish the food in your mouth before speaking.

204808.text: Mmmm... I want to buy that toy!

204809.text: This tastes nice. I'll have another one, please.

204811.text: Looks like our effort is appreciated

204813.text: The celebration lasts until midnight. Some people are reluctant to call it a night, but eventually exhaustion kicks in.

204814.text: No one knows if anything extraordinary exists on this island, but one thing is for sure: everyone has had an unforgettable experience here.

204815.text: Legend says that if you find a transparent bottle filled with white sand, you will receive a precious gift from the Sea Elf.

204816.text: At dusk, Symbriette walks in circles on the beach, stopping once in a while.

204817.text: (thinks out loud) I remember this bedtime story Mom told me about the Sea Elf, though Mom is no longer around...

204818.text: I thought it was just a legend, but I actually found it on the beach.

204819.text: And then... not long after I picked it up, I somehow dropped it in the sea...

204820.text: (sighs faintly, tears streaming down face) I really hope to find it again...

204821.text: The sea monsters have been defeated. The precious item lost in the Seabed is finally back in Symbriette's hands.

204822.text: It's a small transparent bottle filled with fine white sand mixed with silver-like stones. It glitters in the sunlight.

204825.text: Let me see. Hmm... this thing inside the bottle looks exactly the same as the coral I picked up on the beach earlier.

204827.text: Well, some things are precious because of their sentimental value.

204828.text: (says in a low voice, face red, head lowered) Thank you...

204831.text: As soon as that's said, the two are all fired up and ready to go.

204832.text: I want to see a deity with my own eyes, so yes, I really want to go.

204833.text: Me too. I hear the island is a nice resort. I want to see the sights there.

204834.text: Be sure to bring sunscreen—it's an island holiday essential.

204835.text: While we have fun, let's not forget the purpose of this trip.

204837.text: Have you seen monsters like these before?

204838.text: They're from the beach. Looks like we came to the right place.

204839.text: Without being cooked? Hard to imagine what that's like...

204840.text: Take a fresh octopus, slice it up, sprinkle it with sauce, and there you have it—a dish with a unique taste.

204841.text: Sounds delicious. Since we're already here on this island, why don't you try making that dish for me? Don't worry about the ingredients—I will get you the freshest octopus for you.

204842.text: I don't know what kind of seafood is available here... and I'm a bad cook, not sure if I can do it... Alright, alright, stop looking at me like that. I will try when I get the chance.

204845.text: Just like this, and voila! Split in two. C'mon, let's tuck in!

204846.text: Tastes so sweet. Hmm... I want more!

204847.text: I don't remember my past, but I can feel its pull on me.

204848.text: Back in my hometown, people worshipped the god with all their hearts. That must have influenced me.

204849.text: Your hometown? I rarely hear you mention it.

204850.text: It's a... beautiful place, but I can't go back to it. The god brought retribution on us. All of my friends and family were...

204851.text: I was the only one who survived, but I was getting weaker. Then a Miko told me that I should follow the god, and I will be answered.

204852.text: So that's why you're so obsessed with the god. I hope you'll get your answers...

204853.text: No, I'm not afraid when you're here.

204854.text: But what if you leave me behind, wah...

204855.text: There, there, don't worry, I will never do that.

204856.text: Hehe, look on the bright side. You guys benefited too.

204857.text: Plus, I feel safe with you and other villagers around.

204858.text: And... you don't look evil so I believe you can keep your promises. If you agree to keep providing us with supplies, we can let you move in today.

204859.text: Usually it was between sundown and moonrise, and I saw this lonely figure wandering on the beach as though searching for something.

204860.text: There's no evidence yet, but we all believe there's a connection between these occurrences.

204861.text: You defeated those fierce creatures. You must be very good fighters. Could you please help us clean out the monsters nearby?

204862.text: Collect the supplies we need from around here and bring them to us. We'll trade for them.

204888.text: The Forest of Elves used to be the peaceful abode of the High Elves, but with the rising of the Floating Isles of Cassiel, concord has fallen to discord. Drowned by the direct sunlight, the trees abort their growth. Monsters began flying up from the ground to invade the forest. The downfall of the Forest of Elves seems almost a certainty...

204889.text: Seeing all this, Flora realized that the mere power of the Elves alone will never bring salvation. They must require the help of that which they despise most—Humans. They need manpower to provide magic and funds for building facilities that reduce the sunlight flooding in. Only then could tranquility be restored to the Forest of Elves.

204890.text: If this goes on, the trees will slowly wither up, and everyone will...

204893.text: Fantasy City—Seize the final chance to become the most dazzling girl of the year!$B$The winner will receive Mana, Quartz, aaaaand, a generous amount of prize money from the Sanctuary.

204894.text: This must be the idol thing that's been all the craze in the Upper Domain.

204896.text: Kind of a job in Human society, or so I've heard. They sing onstage and perform various dances. Young people love them for some reason.

204897.text: So if I win this idol contest, I can become an idol?

204898.text: And if I become an idol, I'll get the money and magic needed to save the Forest of Elves...

204899.text: Huh? Flora, are you serious about becoming an idol?

204900.text: But aren't you kinda bad with people, just like me?

204901.text: This is for the sake of saving the Forest of Elves. There's no better way...

204902.text: Mother has always protected this land, while I stood there powerless. Now, it's my chance to help everyone...

204903.text: ...Well. I guess I also need to overcome my people problem. If it's okay, I'd like to join this idol contest with you.

204904.text: It says here, though, that you need four people in total for an idol unit, with one person being the leader.

204905.text: Should we ask Mayahuel to join? I'm not sure if she will, though...

204906.text: We might have to ask Mineer, hmm...

204907.text: Oh! Look, $heroine$? We got our solution for the contest right here!

204909.text: Whaaat? Don't you wanna taste the sweet limelight onstage? Aw, at this rate, we can't even get a unit of three together...

204910.text: Limelight? Sounds like a lot of fun! My mother told me not to go off too far, but this seems like a once-in-a-lifetime thing...

204911.text: Okay! I've decided! I'll join your team. I'll become a world-famous idol!

204914.text: Don't worry, Flora. You can count on $heroine$! Let's work hard for the sake of the Forest of Elves!

204916.text: There's a strange air about the place. Are there monsters lurking around...?

204917.text: Look, there's quite a crowd there...

204920.text: Yes, you! Stop hiding behind the Witch! What are you afraid of? How can you be an idol when you're such a scaredy-cat?

204921.text: Nghn... I knew it, a coward like me can never become an idol... But if I can't become one, the forest will perish...

204922.text: Stop dilly-dallying! Wanna be an idol? You gotta change yourself! I'm Dorin, the manager of Fantasy City, and I'll be managing the daily routine of all the wannabe-idols for the coming two weeks. You wanna be the last idol standing, or nah?

204924.text: Jeez, is that all you've got? This won't do... If you want to dazzle like diamonds, prepare for a Dorin-styled training! Whaddya say?! Aye?

204927.text: Alright, then I'll explain to you what you'll be doing.

204928.text: While you're here, you must train for unit coordination every day. Outside of this mandatory training though, you get to choose other courses to focus on in your free time. You can take different courses for self-improvement, or complete my commissions for rewards to help you become your ideal self.

204929.text: But remember, you can't be the queen of the stage with just a pretty face. You gotta have the stamina for it too!

204930.text: We've summoned magical creatures in this city. Fight them to get in shape! Build up your endurance so you can put up a good show on the stage. Any more questions?

204931.text: What kind of training will we have each day?

204935.text: Y'all must join in a mandatory training session every day. Other than that, though, you can choose different courses to take, or maybe even take a day off for some recreational teambuilding!

204936.text: However, you only have so much time—two weeks to be exact! So you'll have to find a way to improve yourself efficiently within the limited time.

204937.text: Fret not, the commissions are simple and straightforward. Complete them and I'll reward you. But, don't lose sight of the big picture and forget about training! After all, the more you sweat, the further you get!

204938.text: The idol contest will last for 14 days, and on the 7th day, there will be a mid-point showcase. Each team will have to first defeat a mysterious monster to qualify for the showcase. The judges will evaluate your onstage performance, and those with lower ratings will be eliminated.

204939.text: On the very last day, all the remaining participants will take to the Dazzling stage. Shine and sparkle! The tens of thousands of people in the audience will decide the final winner! If you want to become starlight—become the most dazzling girl, give 'em your best on the stage!

204940.text: Okay then. The mandatory training is going to begin. Hurry over now!

204941.text: Today's physical training. These are several magical creatures we have summoned. Defeat them to advance to the next stage of the practice sessions.

204942.text: Huh? We have to fight? I...

204943.text: You heard her. We gotta fight 'em to get to the next training. Don't worry, $heroine$ and I will protect you.

204944.text: That's it? I was just getting started!

204945.text: I'm so tired... Please, no more combat...

204947.text: This little warm-up is tiring you out? You are a real pampered lady! Alright then, let's take a break for five minutes. You will be choosing your training course next.

204949.text: Yesterday's training was just the prelude. But hey, looks like everyone's getting used to the rhythm. Today's schedule is gonna be packed, so get ready! We're going to teach you how to be the center of attention today.

204951.text: As an idol, you have to dominate the stage and catch eyes. If you feel like you can't handle it, then you should leave now!

204953.text: Someone like me, being the center of attention...

204954.text: To overcome your fear of strangers, Flora, you'll have to get used to being the center of attention.

204955.text: You'll learn to love it. It'll feel like you have this… gravity, drawing everyone in…

204956.text: But people will all be staring at me? I, I just can't... Just thinking about it makes me shiver...

204957.text: Same here, but we must overcome this weakness of ours if we want to become idols.

204958.text: It's not that bad, though, right? A girl who catches the eye of the crowd must be really extraordinary—and I wanna be that girl!

204959.text: You, over there! No chit-chatting while I'm talking!

204961.text: Tsk. And y'all want to be idols? Where are your manners?

204962.text: We admire how composed you are, Miss Dorin. You present yourself so confidently in front of so many people. We'd like to learn to be like you on the final stage.

204963.text: How glib-tongued you are. But you won't be gettin' any special treatment even if you get on my good side.

204964.text: (Clears throat) Ahem... Next, you're gonna get some stage-feel! Magical creatures will gather around and stare at you. Wanna be a stellar senorita? Then get used to this feeling. Alright, let the training... begin!

204966.text: Are these magic puppets? They look a little...

204967.text: I don't like this feeling either. Kinda gives me the heebie-jeebies... They keep staring at us! Ack...

204968.text: Ah, the magic puppets are surrounding us...

204969.text: Flora, wait for me... Ugh, these evil puppets! Don't come any closer...!

204971.text: Oh, the puppets are not working...

204972.text: Hey, you broke the training puppets! I pulled an all-nighter yesterday to make these! DISQUALIFIED! All of you!

204974.text: How could this be... No... My brethren in the forest are still counting on me...

204975.text: Please don't blame them. They were freaked out because the puppets are just finely crafted, so true to life. It must take someone with great magical finesse to achieve such realism.

204977.text: They are not merely puppets but the works of art. Their lifelike behaviors are what made Flora and the others panic.

204978.text: Haha! Impressive! You have a good eye! Finally, someone that understands the beauty of these puppets! They are the fruits of a long and arduous research of an entire night!

204979.text: (Clears throat) Ahem... Very well. Since you've recognized your faults, I will forgive you. Alright then, let's get ready for the next training.

204980.text: Oi, why's it so rowdy over there? Hey, why are you all gathered over there?!

204982.text: Is that Ardisia over there? Wow, she's singing in front of so many people...

204983.text: What can we do? We have fallen behind...

204984.text: Today, we got these prepared for you! Ta-da!

204986.text: Awesome! I've never seen so many fancy outfits even back home!
