206160.text: You picked this gift for me? I just learned how to make chocolate, and this is what I made. Please take it.

206161.text: Viola... is happy... This is... for you...

206162.text: I've always wanted to have this... Here's the best chocolate I have ever made. Take it. I may be a hunter, but I do know how to make good chocolate.

206163.text: You must be a considerate person, capable of figuring out what a woman older than you would like! I want you to have this—a taste of maturity.

206164.text: Thank you for the gift. I made this myself. You can have it if you want.

206165.text: You actually got me a gift, you silly. Actually... I got you a little something too. Open it!

206166.text: You knew what I liked because you've been watching me, right? I'm so glad! 'Cause I've been watching you too. Here's a little token of my appreciation.

206167.text: An amazing gift... Actually, where I come from we have this gift-giving tradition too. That's why I've also got a little something for you. Hope you'll like it.

206168.text: I love this gift a lot. I must give you something in return.

206169.text: Is this a gift for the holiday? Am I supposed to be happy? I see. Human emotions are so complex. Here, take this.

206170.text: Are you trying to please me? I do like this. I got you a little something too. Take it.

206171.text: Your tribute is commendable. I shall share with you this blessing of darkness.

206172.text: Is this for me? Thank you! Here's the chocolate I prepared for you. Try it!

206173.text: I accept your gift with pleasure. And here's a token of appreciation from the Elves.

206174.text: This is for me? Haha, I got you a little something too. Let's open it!

206175.text: Is this a reward for my hard work? Oh, it's a holiday gift... It was a bit of a hassle, but I got you a gift too.

206176.text: Such a precious gift. Thank you. I'd like you to have this—I made it myself.

206177.text: Oh, this is for me...? Thank you... I got you a little something too—it took me a while to make it. Give it a try.

206178.text: Oh!!! This is for me? Ta-da, I also prepared something for you. Let's hang out more!

206179.text: This is for me? Fantastic! Mom said this is an occasion to give chocolates to the one you like. So... here you go.

206180.text: A gift for us? Thank you! Inn and Lou have also prepared a gift for you!

206181.text: What a coincidence. I've prepared a gift for you too. Exchanging gifts is such a fun tradition.

206182.text: Thank you. I appreciate it. This is what I bought at the market. I want you to have it.

206183.text: Thank you! It makes my day every time I get a gift. Now let me make yours!

206184.text: Didn't know anyone would care this much about me... Thank you. This is something I made. I'd like you to have it if you don't mind.

206185.text: Ah... this is... such an amazing gift! Actually... I got you a little something too. Here you go.

206186.text: This is... for me? That's so thoughtful of you. What should I give you in return? Let me see... Ah! I made this yesterday. It's yours now.

206187.text: This... This is for me? Can I open it? I got you a little something too. If you like it, I can cook it for you every day.

206188.text: Didn't know you'd give a gift to someone like me. Thank you. And, uh... would you like to try the chocolate I made?

206189.text: Finally someone who knows my preferences. Thank you. I appreciate it. I want you to have this—something I made earlier.

206190.text: Can't remember the last time I got something this good. You must have gone to a lot of trouble. How do I know? 'Cause I got you a gift too.

206191.text: You picked this just for me? You could actually sense my wavelength... Well, I've also prepared some chocolate that suits your wavelength. I'd like you to have it.

206192.text: Merci! Thank you! This is what I prepared for you. Try it.

206193.text: I'm surprised you figured out my preferences. Hmm... seems like a reward is in order!

206194.text: This is for me? What a pleasant surprise. Thank you. Here's some chocolate made in the royal kitchen. Try it.

206195.text: Oh, you're so thoughtful. I'll take it. And in return, I want you to have this.

206196.text: You sure know my preferences. You haven't given this to anyone else, have you? Hehe, here's some chocolate I made—something I've always wanted you to try.

206197.text: I heard you had a gift for me. I've been looking forward to this moment since yesterday! I got you a little something too. You must be curious about what it is. Here you go. Take it.

206198.text: You sure I can have this? But it looks so expensive... I only prepared some homemade chocolate. I want you to have it if you don't mind...

206199.text: So humans mark their festivals by exchanging gifts. I've heard about it before. To return the favor, I'd like to give you this chocolate.

206200.text: If you want to give me a gift, just do it already! I got you a little something too. Here you go.

206201.text: I'm surprised that you, a human, understand our preferences. Haha, tell me, what do you want in return? Oh? Just chocolate? Here, I got this in town the other day. It's delicious.

206202.text: Ah, you... you picked this just for me? Thank you, I will cherish it... Here's some chocolate I made. Hope you'll like it.

206203.text: Just as I was thinking about how the clinic has been in a festive mood lately, I received your gift. I got you a little something too. It may be a little bitter, but I think you'll find it to your taste.

206204.text: I haven't told you this, but I've prepared a gift for you too. I've been waiting for this moment for ages...

206205.text: Hehe, you're so cute. Didn't know you cared so much about me. Here's something I made in an experiment. I'll let you be the first one to try it.

206206.text: Receiving gifts always makes me happy, especially from you. Here's the chocolate I bought just for you. Try it.

206272.text: Welcome, welcome! Our Valentine's Day Limited Edition Chocolates are on sale right now! Don't miss them!

206273.text: Thanks for the purchase! Here are your items.

206274.text: I chose this outfit especially for this occasion, hehe! I wonder if $heroine$ has prepared a pretty bouquet for me? I can't wait!

206276.text: I fell in love with this outfit at first sight... Will $heroine$ think I look good in this... and bring me a bouquet to match?

206277.text: What a lovely bouquet... Mm... smells amazing! Thanks for preparing this, sweet $heroine$!

206278.text: Cynetia takes the Witch and Matveiffe on a tour of her hometown. The three make their first stop at the bustling Commercial Street.

206279.text: It's Valentine's Day and romance is in the air. However, some of the hardworking townies don't seem to be in much of a romantic mood.

206280.text: The streets are filled with loud arguing and bickering at such a wonderful holiday. The three feel confused and enter a shop.

206281.text: After checking into the hotel, the trio decides to taste the chocolates first. Satisfied but still hungry, they set off to a restaurant.

206282.text: The Witch wakes up in the morning, still bewildered. Perhaps the townspeople could enlighten her about the situation.

206283.text: After some asking around, the Witch learns from some friendly townspeople that the doctor at the town clinic may have an answer.

206284.text: Still befuddled, the Witch sets off to the clinic again in hopes that Dr. Amorai would have an explanation.

206285.text: Having noticed something off with her assistant, Sally, Dr. Amorai decides to help the Witch so they head to the town park for investigation.

206286.text: The Witch stealthily follows the man to a restaurant, only to run into Cynetia and Matveiffe, who no longer want anything to do with her.

206287.text: The crowded restaurant descends into chaos. The Witch has tried many ways but the man named Simo insists that he's innocent.

206288.text: Now that they've gotten to the bottom of the situation, the Witch and Amorai, armed with the cures, decide to do something for those affected.

206289.text: This place got a new look thanks to Erina. Really appreciate it~

206290.text: It's no bother, master. My wish has never changed, that is, stay by your side and keep you company.

206293.text: You don't know firecrackers? They go boom. It's a lot of fun!

206295.text:
Hahaha, don't worry. If you hang out with me, you will get good luck as well.
Come on, let's go play firecrackers!

206296.text: There's always so much fun to be had and food to be eaten during humans' Spring Festival. Meow!

206297.text: Erina has prepared a lot of food...

206298.text:
Really? Then she must have also prepared my favorite chocolate cakes. This is wonderful. Meow!
Aw, I'm hungry just thinking about it. Gotta go eat.

206299.text: Well, people don't usually eat chocolate cakes during the Spring Festival...

206300.text: Beast Nian? Never heard of it.

206301.text: You don't have monsters like that by the River of the Underworld?

206302.text: Of course not. Lady Acheronte does a perfect job of running that place. All monsters showing there will be eliminated.

206303.text: We don't have occasions like this, either. But it's nice to relax and enjoy a festival once in a while.

206304.text: Festive rummage sale! Come and take a look!

206306.text: Oh, it's you. It's the Spring Festival, come buy yourself some new clothes. Got pretty clothes in all kinds of styles for sale.

206308.text: So what? People need new clothes for the Spring Festival, so I sell them. It's quick money.

206309.text: Come in and take a browse. My workshop is the best you can find in Chilora. Apart from selling clothes, I also craft items. Hey, you there. Need anything crafted? I can craft you anything from weapons to kitchenware!

206310.text: In Forest of Elves, we also celebrate some festivals but none of them are as fun as the human's Spring Festival.

206311.text: Do you have any special customs?

206312.text: No, nothing special... We also have red envelopes, though, often prepared by Lady Mayahuel and distributed to everyone.

206313.text: Do you make wishes on some occasions?

206314.text: Sure. My biggest wish is to spend more time around Lady Flora.

206336.text: Ribbit. Good to see you again.

206337.text: Garditis is leading the Alliance of the Rebellions to conquer the checkpoint leading to the Upper Domain. They need our help.

206338.text: We can't afford any more delays. Come on, let's go.

206340.text: Is this the Upper Domain? I've never been here before.

206341.text: Now that we're here, let's take a look around.

206343.text: Bad idea. We don't want the Upper Domain sorcerers to know we are here...

206344.text: It's fine. You will be protecting me, won't you?

206345.text: I... um, of course. I will not let those Upper Domain snobs get the best of me again.

206350.text: Together with the Alliance of the Rebellions...

206351.text: What? The Lower Domain is planning to overthrow the Upper Domain?

206353.text: It's not going to end well, although the intention is to protect more people...

206356.text: The Lower Domain residents have no magic. They stand no chance against the nobles.

206357.text: Please, stay out of this strife.

206358.text: Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got business to attend to. See you around.

206360.text: Friend, we have entered the Upper Domain. Our next move is to push into the Sanctuary and ask the Protector to lower the Floating Isles.

206362.text: That sounds like a tall order.

206363.text: Yeah, I know. It won't be a walk in the park.

206364.text: The Upper Domain sorcerers regard us as rebels. A battle will be unavoidable.

206365.text: And a fierce one, too. But we're ready for it.

206366.text: Friend, if not for you, we wouldn't have united, and we wouldn't dare to even think about killing monsters.

206367.text: Friend, will you continue to stand at our side?

206369.text: What do you need me to do?

206370.text: To enter the Sanctuary, we must lift the seal blocking the passage. I was a guard of the Sanctuary once. I know how to do it.

206371.text: The seal is controlled by four Magic Devices scattered around the Upper Domain. Deactivate them all and the passage to the Sanctuary will open.

206372.text: We, the Alliance of the Rebellions, will split up and head to where the devices are. Will you help us?

206374.text: Yes. Nemesi was off to find the Magic Devices in the Magic Incubators.

206375.text: But don't worry. I won't go far. I'll be back in the village soon.

206376.text: This place looks completely different from the Lower Domain. I'm gonna note down everything I see and tell the kids in the village when I get back.

206379.text: Thank you for your concern, but I will be fine.

206380.text: The kids in the village are waiting for me to tell stories of how you defeat monsters. Gotta go. Bye.

206381.text: Ribbit. Have you seen Garditis? He's racking his brain trying to destroy the four Magic Devices.

206383.text: He wants to get into the Sanctuary.

206384.text: Rebelling against authority is never easy. Now that I've made up my mind to help them, I will see it through to the end.

206385.text: Destroy the Magic Devices, huh? In that case, I gotta hit the road.

206386.text: Farewell. May the light shine upon your path.

206387.text: However, as I was dealing with the mess left by my coworkers, the enchanted chocolates got mixed up with the normal ones by accident.

206388.text: Here is the recipe for lifting that enchantment, please help me make the cures and bring those affected back to normal.

206389.text: Your heroic deeds of that night have been imprinted on my mind and I hope there will not be a day of my life when you are not by my side. Would you like to hold my hand and get me through the darkness?

206390.text: Thank you for the Valentine's Day gift and for taking care of me all this time. Here's a little something to show my appreciation. Hope you'll like it. Let's look forward to the year ahead.

206391.text:
The chocolates I got last time weren't sweet enough. A bit more sugar would have been nice. Anyway, I got you something in return. Please take it!
(⊙o⊙) Oh!! So, you will give me chocolates again next time?

206392.text: Thank you for the Valentine's Day gift and for always being there for me. Here's a little token of my appreciation. This year, I mean, next year... and years to come, we will continue to stay together (´・ω・`)

206393.text: Today is a special day, so I've prepared something to celebrate. Come join me if you're free. I'll be waiting in the Hall of Origin.

206394.text: I truly cherish the Valentine's Day gift you got me. I prepared something for you too—a proud work of mine. Well, don't get too impressed. Just open it!

206395.text: The sword brought you to my side. And your gift, I love it. Akasha never lets a favor go unreturned, so I offer you this.

206396.text: The Valentine's Day gift pleases me profoundly. So, as a member of a big-hearted ancient clan, I only saw fit to prepare a surprise for you in return. Hoho, you are welcome.

206397.text: The world spurns me and calls me the evil incarnation. Only you are always there to satisfy my desires. Heh heh, I really appreciate the gift. My only hope is that you will separate yourself from the mob and join me in savoring this source of happiness.

206398.text: I really appreciate the gift you sent before. You must have given it a lot of thought. Well, this is my first time giving anyone a gift. Not sure if you will like it, but I hope you will.

206399.text: I love the Valentine's Day gift you got me. I really appreciate it and will always cherish it. I'm starting to realize that for me, the best gift ever is the time we spend together. White Day is coming. I can't wait to see you.

206400.text: I really like the Valentine's Day gift. Should I thank you for that? I'm sorry, I'm not familiar with human emotion, but I got you a little something in return. I should give it to you in person, right...?

206401.text: I once ate the chocolates my mother made me. Never expected that the person I like would make me chocolates too... Come to think of it, we've been together all this time. White Day is on its way, so I got you a gift and I want to give it to you in person.

206402.text: The Valentine's Day gift you got me is amazing. Mom told me that a gift from someone you like must be returned in kind. White Day is almost here, so I got you a little something too. Hope you'll like it.

206403.text: That gift is a token of your thought, and it pleases me as much as it does the Living God. So I'd like to offer you this in return.

206404.text: Never thought I'd receive such a precious gift from you, and it makes me happy like never before. White Day is around the corner. I've prepared some dishes that I'm good with. Be sure to drop by and try them.

206405.text: This is the first gift I got after leaving Fairyland. To show my appreciation, I'd like to take you to my hometown on White Day. I'm sure folks there will like you. Be sure to come by!

206406.text: The chocolates you got me last time were amazing. So tender and sweet, with nut fillings to boot. No one knows my preferences like you do! I make the best cakes in the Sanctuary, and I'd like you to try them. I'll be waiting for you in the Sanctuary. Please do drop by(⊙o⊙)

206407.text: It's been a while since I got a gift I like. Preparing this gift must have been a lot of work, huh? White Day is coming. I'll be waiting for you by Elf Lakeside. This will be my first time celebrating a festival with a human. I'm excited about it!

206408.text: You went out of your way to get me a gift for Valentine's Day. Looks like our wavelengths are synching up. Sorry that came out weird. I just want to invite you to spend White Day with me. And I got you a gift too. Hope you'll like it.

206409.text: Love makes people strong. If we could... uh, never mind, just thought of the gift you got me—you must have done a lot of work to prepare it, right? Merci! I had been agonizing over what I should give you in return... afraid that you might not like what I got you. That's why I didn't have the courage to give you this until now. Anyway, hope you'll like it. Bon appétit!

206410.text: It was the first gift I got from a human, such a precious one. I tried and made some food. Want to try it? I'm sure that... you will get the message in it this time!

206411.text: Thank you for the gift. I loved it. Its soft taste made my troubles go away. What should I give you in return...? Exchanging gifts has become a thing lately. You never know what you're gonna get before you open the gift. So, when you receive my package, wait until White Day to open it.

206412.text: Are you sure it was a good idea to give me a Valentine's Day gift? I'm a wanderer with no past. I will only bring you misfortune... Lately I've been pondering the question of how to return the favor, and I still can't figure out the answer. Here's a little something I got you for the upcoming White Day. Hope you will like it. As for the answer to that question, maybe I will find it some day in the future. That is, if we have a future...

206413.text: Can't believe I just got a gift. The last time I did was centuries ago. I'm never one to turn down an act of admiration, and yours is truly appreciated. I got you a little something in return. Hope you will like it.

206414.text: I'm aware that people exchange gifts on White Day. You want a gift too? Since you asked so nicely, I guess I could get you something... Hmm, busy as I am, I found time to get you this gift. Go ahead and take it!

206415.text: This is the first gift I got from a human, meow... You humans know me so well. I guess it's time I learn more about your kind too. So, what do you want in return? I'm going to get you a gift!

206416.text:
After becoming a celebrity, I received gifts from my fans from time to time, but none of them made me as happy as the handmade gift from you (´・ω・`)
    Here's a little something I got you. Hope you'll like it.
    ⁄(⁄ ⁄•⁄ω⁄•⁄ ⁄)⁄

206417.text: Hehe, you really are the best experimental subject. I hope you will continue to stay healthy this year and fulfill your duty as an experimental subject. To that end, I got you a special gift. Take it.

206418.text: Thank you for the gift. Celebrating Valentine's Day with you in Lunia felt like a dream to me. Here's a little thank-you gift from me. Hope you'll like it.

206419.text: First you spent a holiday with me, then you got me a gift. I'm so glad! White Day is coming, so I got you a little something. Hope you will find it to your liking.

206420.text: Your gift made my day! Let's go hunting together. It will be fun! Haha, White Day is almost here. I'll be waiting for you in the forest. Do come by!

206422.text: Thanks for your gift. Now I'm heading to the lab. Why don't you come with me?

206423.text: Do you like my gift? I can also perform a pillow fight for you! It will be fun, what do you say? Hehe, come by often and let's hang out. And be sure to bring me some sweet chocolate!

206424.text: I learned a new tune from Mayahuel to celebrate this special day, and I'd like to invite you to see my performance in Elf Lakeside. Also, if you'd like to learn it too, I could teach you(´・ω・`)

206425.text: Lately I've been losing sleep over thinking about you—how you read picture books for me, how you tell me stories about the outside world. You'll come see me again, right? Next time it's my turn to read you a bedtime story♪

206426.text: I got this for you... A return gift for Valentine's Day? I didn't make this just for you, silly... I did it because I like it, and I've done a lot of practice... Anyway, go ahead and try it.

206427.text:
You want a gift from me? But I've never done this before. To me, giving a gift is even harder than swinging a sword...
But rest assured, Akasha appreciates your gift and will prepare something for you in return. Be sure to drop by.

206428.text: You are unlike the rest of your kind. I have taken a liking to you, hoho. Pray tell, what gift do you desire from me? A legendary treasure, a lost spell, or domination of this land? Hoho, come find me when you make up your mind♪♪

206429.text: You are special to me, so I'd like to share my joy with you. Surviving in this world, I am only left with two options, embracing my end amid joy or descending from joy to ecstasy. But as for you, there's only one choice, that is, stay with me forever, right?

206430.text: I'd like you to have this. You know, for this special day. Ever since I received your gift, I've been looking forward to this moment. I made this myself. Next time we meet, I'd like to hear how you like it.

206431.text: Thank you for the gift. I cherish every single moment we spend together. I wish I could be there for you every second of your life. That way we would be happy forever.

206432.text: I don't claim to understand human emotions, but I suppose this is what the so-called "happiness" looks like... In return for your kindness, I shall dance with you next time.

206433.text:
My mother once told me that White Day is meant to be spent with the person you like. So I prepared a gift for you. Be sure to come by.
Come to think of it, we've been together since we can remember... Let's hope our future will be as brilliant as our past.

206434.text: People either fear or flatter me. But not you, you are different. White Day is upon us. Come back to me. I will dance for you and you alone. May the god bless our future together.

206435.text: Uh... Do you enjoy the food I made for you yesterday? If you do, can I... still make you something different on next year's White Day?

206436.text:
We had so many desserts yesterday. I feel like that food tastes way better when you're around♪♪
I just got my hands on a new recipe for a delicious cake. As soon as I finish making it, you'll be the first to try.

206437.text: It's so good to have you around. If I fall into slumber one day like Dana did... Uh, even if just I fall asleep, I want you to be the first person I see when I wake up.

206438.text: I'm not sure why, but our wavelengths have been overlapping and crisscrossing... You're curious about that too? Then spend more time with me. Maybe we can solve this mystery together.

206439.text:
I've been thinking a lot about you lately. Before fate settles the score, allow me this brief moment of joy...
I had been worried that you wouldn't like my gift, and I was so happy when I saw the smile on your face when you opened it.
I cherish every day I spend with you... a lot. Perhaps our story has already begun, like the gear of fate...

206440.text: People address me respectfully as "Saintess." And after centuries of guarding this world, I thought nothing would surprise me anymore. But today I was surprised by my own joy at receiving your gift. I will be waiting for you at the Glacial Castle atop the mountain. And to repay your kindness, just tell me your wish and I will do my best to make it come true.

206441.text:
Thank you for keeping me company all this time. Hope I can count on your continued support for my future shows—and not just as a fan ♪
 ⁄(⁄ ⁄•⁄ω⁄•⁄ ⁄)⁄

206442.text:
It's great that we can stay so close. An experimental subject like you is hard to come by.
Take my gift. Then again, today is not the only occasion where we can kick back and enjoy our intimacy, 'cause you know, there will be countless more experiments awaiting us, hehe.

206443.text: Another amazing year spent together! I hope that this time next year, when the season changes, I will deliver to you a carefully prepared gift along with my heart.

206444.text:
In the past year, your companionship gave me the courage to make a change.
You want to go out with me for a walk? In the past, my first reaction would have been, "I don't want to scare people." But now with you by my side, I know that one day I will reintegrate into human society.
I will have my gift ready and wait for you to take me home. I will wait no matter how long it takes.

206445.text:
The trip to the forest yesterday, you enjoyed it too, right? Today is a special day, so I got you a gift. Haha, go ahead and take it.
My birthday will be next month. I wonder what gift I'll get from you. Anyway, just don't forget. We'll have loads of fun together!

206447.text: You don't look like a resident from around here, and you're not one of those Lower Domain savages either. So what's your deal?

206450.text: This is Pandle Village of the Upper Domain.

206451.text: I heard the Lower Domain has started a rebellion and invaded the Upper Domain. The lockdown is to protect our village. We've got people out on patrol day and night under the Chief's orders.

206452.text: If you're done here, leave! We don't welcome outsiders.

206453.text: You're nothing like us, but you don't look like one of those commoners either. And you have a magical aura about you.

206454.text: Are you from the Forest of Elves? What's your business here?

206455.text: I want to enter the Sanctuary...

206456.text: I want to see the Protector...

206457.text: What? You want to see the great Protector?

206458.text: Don't be ridiculous, ignorant one. If you know what's good for you, leave the Upper Domain now. The great Protector is an all-knowing deity. She will never grant an audience to a nobody like you!

206460.text: What's with that look? You don't believe me?

206461.text: The Floating Isles, Cassiel, are a wonder created by the great Protector.

206462.text: When monsters went rampant, it was the great Protector who saved us. She lifted the continent off the ground, away from the monsters. She taught us magic so we could use it to dispel the monsters that flew onto the isles. We're forever in her debt.

206463.text: Ignorant one, pledge your faith to the great Protector so that your soul will be redeemed.

206465.text: Those who provoke the great Protector will be banished to the ground under the isles...? That's horrible...

206467.text: Banished to the ground under the isles?

206468.text: Haha, so you overheard me. But that was a secret only I am supposed to know, understand?

206469.text: Well, I suppose there's no harm in telling you, but keep it to yourself, okay?

206470.text: You see, my son is a Magical Guard, and I heard this from him. There's a mob down in the Lower Domain plotting a rebellion against the great Protector.

206471.text: Undoubtedly they will be punished, supposedly by being banished to the ground unfathomably far below the isles.

206472.text: Shh... That's supposed to be a secret, so keep it to yourself.

206473.text: Lord Garditis, I heard you got intel on the Magic Devices?

206474.text: Yes, they're being kept in the four Magic Incubators built in the Upper Domain.

206475.text: That's useful intel, but it's only a start. The Protector seems to have dispatched Elite Magical Guards to the Incubators.

206476.text: So it won't be easy to fight our way in. That's why we could use your infiltration skills.

206477.text: You want me to secretly get to the Magic Devices...?

206479.text: Hello again, friend. We're trying to get into the Magic Incubators and find the Magic Devices.

206480.text: Once all four of them are destroyed, I can enter the Sanctuary and try to persuade the Protector.

206481.text: Even though the Protector and I go way back, I'm not sure if I can convince her.

206482.text: The truth is, no one knows why the Floating Isles are up there in the first place. If we can figure that out, we should be able to find a way to get the isles back on the land.

206483.text: Friend, I have a favor to ask. Do you remember that magic ring you acquired a while back?

206485.text: That's one of the three magic items which I heard are being sought after by the Protector's underlings.

206486.text: These magic items were crafted by the Protector, and are said to supply the energy that keeps the isles afloat. Can you look into it?

206488.text: The destination is the Sanctuary this time...?

206492.text: You must be a rebel from the Lower Domain, aren't you?

206493.text: The Protector was right. The rebels will stop at nothing to invade the Sanctuary.

206494.text: But that's not gonna happen on my watch! Accept your punishment!

206495.text: You saved me again... Thank you... The Magic Device's over there.

206496.text: Looks like the other Magic Incubators are also heavily guarded like this one.

206497.text: I should go meet up with Lord Garditis. You stay safe. Don't act rashly.

206501.text: How embarrassing. Can't believe I fell asleep.

206502.text: Looks like this body is still not used to prolonged activity...

206503.text: Gotta go. The Magic Incubator is not far from here. There's no time to waste.

206504.text: Ribbit! It's you. Ugh, I feel so ashamed for not noticing the trap.

206505.text: I'm getting you out of there.

206507.text: The trap is coming loose. Keep it up. Almost there!

206508.text: Finally out of the trap. Thank you.

206509.text: I was in such a hurry to find the Magic Devices that I blundered my way into a trap.

206510.text: I feel so ashamed of myself. As a knight, I'm supposed to help others. But instead, I became the one needing help...

206511.text: Oh, no guards around here. It appears whoever laid these traps is pretty confident about their work.

206513.text: Fantastic. That's one Magic Device down, thanks to you.

206514.text: Three more to go. Let's not dawdle. The people of the Lower Domain are suffering as we speak.

206515.text: I, Phrygia the Chevalier of Irminsul, have vowed to help those suffering masses.

206516.text: I'm off to find the other Magic Devices. Farewell.

206517.text: How come I've never seen this kind of device before? It was the Protector...

206518.text: But what's the point of this? That guy tricked me again...

206520.text: I failed all my missions down in the Lower Domain. I feel so ashamed I can't face the Magical Guards.

206521.text: Pull yourself together, sir. I've gathered some of the materials you requested. The only thing missing now is flint.

206522.text: These are dangerous items. Prone to explosions...

206523.text: As for the remaining items, I will retrieve them myself. Remember, the flint can be found in the warehouse in the Wendic Plains.

206524.text: Sir, why do you need those dangerous items anyway?

206525.text: I can't go back like this. This rebellion is my chance to make amends. I just have to blow up the bridge connecting the two domains. That'll cut off the invading rebels' supplies, without which they won't survive long.

206526.text: This is my only shot at redeeming my failure. I have to move fast if I'm to be welcome back into the Magical Guards.

206527.text: They seem to be planning something sinister.

206529.text: Hey, why are you still in the Upper Domain?

206530.text: I knew it. I knew you'd get involved in this war...

206531.text: I want to enter the Sanctuary.

206532.text: I want to see the Protector.

206534.text: Tell her that you want to stop the Floating Isles from going up.

206535.text: Absolutely not. I don't approve of this!

206538.text: The land is crawling with deadly monsters! Worse, some of them have evolved wings. If the Floating Isles stop going up, pretty soon they'll become a monster nest.

206539.text: You want to see the world destroyed?

206542.text: We can't let them destroy this world. The war will be over soon. The rebellion of the Lower Domain is doomed to fail.

206543.text: Do not meddle in the affairs of Cassiel. You don't belong to this world. Leave.

206545.text: Meow, we meet again. I see you've already made your way to the Upper Domain, huh?

206546.text: Tell it you defeated the monster.

206547.text: Wow, you defeated that big fella. Impressive. But to really fix the chaos plaguing this world, you need to tackle the problem at its root.

206548.text: Do I need to find the Protector?

206549.text: Do I need to enter the Sanctuary?

206550.text: You mean the Protector of Cassiel...? Well, she's a stubborn one, and she's a lot tougher than those monsters.

206551.text: Tell it about the magic items.

206552.text: Interesting. Enormous isles are kept afloat by tiny items.

206553.text: If those items can make the isles go up in the air, perhaps they can also bring them back on earth.

206554.text: The Protector here may... come off as more approachable than Cersivey, but she's the ruler of this world after all. So be careful. Don't let appearances fool you.

206556.text: Strange. I remember the flint was kept somewhere in this warehouse. Why can't I find it...? Maybe I should look around some more.

206557.text: Can't find the flint...? Well, it's a precious material after all. Someone on the force might have taken it.

206558.text: The flint is a necessary material to cast explosion magic. They probably have taken it to deal with the rebels invading the Upper Domain. Without the flint, I can't use my magic to blow up the bridge.

206559.text: Don't worry. I remember there being another flint kept in the warehouse in the Lofier Plains. Let's go look.

206560.text: We meet again. What a coincidence.

206561.text: I was just talking with Phrygia the Chevalier about you. You helped shut down two Magic Devices.

206562.text: Phrygia was a little embarrassed about being caught in the trap. I've cautioned the other allies, telling them to be careful when dealing with the canny nobles in the Upper Domain.

206563.text: The magic items might be able to lower the Floating Isles.

206564.text: What? That's an interesting theory, haha.

206565.text: All I know is those items were made by the Protector. Just like you said, if they can keep Cassiel up in the air, maybe they also can bring it back down.

206566.text: I should look further into this...

206567.text: Oh, and the third Magic Incubator is right up ahead. Also heavily guarded, it seems. But that's not gonna deter us.

206568.text: Brave rebels, come join me in this fight.

206571.text: Is that the last of the guards...? Ha... Ha... Such heavy security.

206574.text: Ugh... it's you people. I was being careless...

206582.text: Sorry to trouble you with this. I got jumped by Sanctuary Executors just now.

206585.text: Don't worry. I'll patch you up to stop the bleeding. Tuonel will be here in just a minute.

206586.text: Are they the ones who attacked you?

206587.text: The nerve of you attacking Lord Garditis! You are too much of a threat to be left alive.

206592.text: It's no use begging for mercy. You're assassins. You should have been prepared for this moment when you drew your blade.

206594.text: If I let them go, they will come back for you. We can't let that happen!

206595.text: Nemesi, if you kill them, you're no different from those Upper Domain people.

206597.text: These girls, you used to be just like them. Loved by none, and used as a killing machine. It's not their fault that they've become like this—it's the people who control them.

206598.text: But... I'm different from them. I met you, and they...

206599.text: If they weren't controlled by anyone, they could have been like other kids, growing up in a world full of sunshine. And isn't it our mission to build a world like that?

206600.text: But... they will continue to attack you...

206601.text: Do you remember the first time we met? You glared at me and robbed me of my bread at knifepoint, and then you...

206602.text: Ugh... that's all in the past now... Just... let it go...

206603.text: Okay. I get your point. I'll do as you say.

206604.text: Here are some bandages for your wounds. Take them.

206606.text: Friend, Nemesi will be protecting me from here on out. You go ahead and get to the last Magic Incubator.

206607.text: Members of the Alliance of the Rebellions are already gathering. We must open the passage to the Sanctuary now.

206610.text: So this is the one who's been sabotaging our plan?

206612.text: Hold on. We're no match for her in combat.

206613.text: So you're the one who's been meddling with our affairs, huh?

206616.text: I hate to admit it, but you did save me before.

206617.text: Looks like this plan's a bust. But I'm not done yet. The Protector has saved the world. Anyone acting against her shall be punished. I will see to it.

206618.text: I may not be much of a fighter, but I will not hesitate to fight for the Protector, even if it costs my life.

206620.text: You two useless pieces of trash! You let all three magic items get taken from right under your nose!

206623.text: But there wasn't much we could do. We were knocked out by an explosion. By the time we awoke, the magic items were already gone.

206624.text: They're important items! They're what the Protector uses to keep these isles afloat!

206625.text: I'll see to your punishment later. Right now, you have a chance to redeem your failure.

206626.text: So buck up and do your best!

206631.text: I'm Datheios, the Balance Enforcer. I'm here under Protector Camilyne's orders to protect the boundary of the Sanctuary.

206633.text: I know you've been helping people in distress and rallying the Lower Domain residents against monsters. As a law enforcer, my duty obliges me to do the same: battle evil and help the weak.

206634.text: But ultimately my loyalty is to the Protector. She has saved the world and saved us... I can't disobey her...

206636.text: You and I have chosen different paths, and we each regard our choice as the righteous one.

206637.text: Datheios, do you think the Lower Domain people deserve their suffering?

206638.text: Say no more. I too asked myself that question once. But now, justice means only one thing to me—protect Lady Camilyne. And I have no doubt about that.

206639.text: Garditis, if you want to prove your point, then come defeat me with your friends!

206641.text: I, too, once doubted the morality of what I do, but then she changed me. Without her, we never could have defeated that giant monster. We would still be on the run, and nothing would have changed.

206642.text: And now with that big monster taken care of, and with us united, we're seeing hope again. If we return to land now and pull together, I'm confident we will defeat the remaining monsters.

206643.text: Garditis, I admire your ambition. Maybe you will change the world after all...

206644.text: This is one of the three magic items the Protector lost, which can be used to control these floating isles. All the three magic items went missing in the explosion caused by a monster invasion before. I found this one in the Lower Domain. I was going to return it to the Protector...

206645.text: Now I give it to you.

206646.text: The passage to the Sanctuary is open. The Protector is in there. We gotta hurry.

206648.text: Please don't blame the Protector. Everything she did, she did it to protect this world and to help more people survive...

206652.text: Unlike those Upper Domain nobles, the Protector only wants to save Cassiel.

206653.text: Keeping the isles going up in the air consumes enormous magic power. Not to mention she also has to deal with those constantly evolving monsters...

206654.text: As the isles go up, food yields decrease along with other resources. To ensure survival, some of the Lower Domain residents had to be banished to the ground under the isles... Cruel, yes, but necessary.

206655.text: Just like I guessed, those earthquakes were engineered. I know the Protector did it out of desperation, but it doesn't sit right with me...

206656.text: Camilyne made a tough decision to help more people survive... I hope you can understand.

206657.text: Garditis, go to the Sanctuary and talk to the Protector. If you really want to change the world, convince her.

206659.text: Huh? Are you from Elf Lakeside...? How can I help you?

206662.text: Mayahuel taught me this tune. It's a little hard. I've only learned part of it. I wish I could hear her play it again.

206663.text: If you want to hear me play more, come back when I have learned the rest of the tune from Mayahuel.

206665.text: This is no place for you. Leave.

206666.text: The Forest of Elves has recently been invaded by monsters. It's not safe here.

206669.text: How did you know my name?

206672.text: I see. So Flora wants to learn the rest of the tune, huh? Well, I've only heard it several times myself...

206673.text: Oh, never mind. I will find a way to teach her.

206674.text: Judging by your aura... you're not human. Even so, I suggest you take a detour and avoid the monsters up ahead.

206676.text: What? You killed that giant monster?

206677.text: I find that hard to believe... So, you're headed to the Sanctuary to persuade the Protector?

206678.text: Persuade her to join the Alliance of the Rebellions.

206679.text: Persuade her to join the fight against the monsters.

206680.text: Collaborate with humans? We elves don't fear monsters. In the thousands of years we've lived here, we never cared to mingle with humans, let alone...

206681.text: Never mind. That's not your fault. It's that man's.

206682.text: The elves are a noble race and have no reason to tolerate those filthy monsters. The Protector was born in the Forest of Elves, too, though she chose a different life from the rest of us—she left the forest and became the ruler of the Sanctuary.

206683.text: We agreed to be lifted in the air along with the Floating Isles and join the defense against the monsters that got up here. But as the isles go up, the trees in the Forest of Elves, the source of our magic, begin to suffer.

206684.text: We don't like humans, but stopping the isles from going up is in our interest, too. That said, being a noble race, we loathe the idea of working with humans. Unless that bastard begs us on his knees.

206687.text: That bastard is the leader of your alliance. Unless he comes begging in tears by the lake, we... no, no matter how hard he pleads, we will never forgive him!

206688.text: You're not human. You should stay out of this and leave. May Lady Dana bless you.

206689.text: Odd. Didn't I compose this tune...? Why is someone playing it here?

206690.text: Sorry for interrupting you, pretty lady.

206693.text: That's a beautiful tune you're playing there. Mind telling us who taught you?

206694.text: Mayahuel. Sorry, that name might not mean anything to you... Mayahuel is from the Forest of Elves...

206695.text: Mayahuel? That's impossible. I only taught this tune to her...

206697.text: Sorry, lady, can I ask you another question?

206698.text: Did Mayahuel tell you what this tune means?

206699.text: Mayahuel only told me that this is a tune of missing someone, belonging to Mother. That was a long time ago. Every time I play this, it reminds me of her...

206702.text: Sorry if I scared you, lady. Can you tell me your name?

206707.text: No, I've got to confirm this myself. Lady, can you take me to the Forest of Elves?

206711.text: Stop! Humans are not allowed through here.

206714.text: Flora, what are you doing walking with a human male? Come here.

206716.text: Pah, it's you. The cheek of you coming back here!

206717.text: Who is she, Mayahuel? How come she knows that tune?

206718.text: Just a despicable scumbag. Pay him no mind, Flora.

206719.text: And how many times have I told you not to talk to humans! They're a bunch of ingrates. Why can't you just listen to me?!

206721.text: Enough. Don't ever talk to any humans again. Now come home with me!

206723.text: This kid has nothing to do with you. Now beat it, scumbag!

206724.text: I know I haven't done right by her, but please, let me see her. I...

206725.text: Lady Dana will not see you, unless every tree in this forest dies and every lake dries up. Otherwise, no one will never ever forgive you, you scumbag!

206727.text: Will I never... see her again...?

206729.text: Foolish human. Mayahuel was right. Lady Dana will never forgive you.

206730.text: Lady Dana may be sleeping at the bottom of the lake, in a realm of nothingness, but we can still acutely feel her resentment.

206731.text: Lady Dana will no longer be fooled by your sweet words. Go kneel before her and beg for forgiveness, foolish human.

206732.text: Now is not the time to wallow in emotions. The alliance still needs me. I've got to bring Cassiel back on land. Once that happens, I will see Dana again...

206733.text: Afallen, the seal on the Sanctuary has been lifted. Let me pass.

206735.text: No. The Protector's orders—no one gets in the Sanctuary, not even you, the former guard of the Sanctuary.

206736.text: Step aside, Afallen. I have to see the Protector. That's the only way to bring the Floating Isles back on land and save everyone.

206737.text: No. The Protector's orders are absolute. I can't let you through.

206738.text: Guards, we've got an intruder. Follow the Protector's orders and protect the Sanctuary!

206740.text: Get out of my way, Afallen. Don't make me hurt you.

206742.text: In my effort to save this land, I already lost Dana. I don't want to lose you too...

206743.text: I will convince the Protector to bring the Floating Isles back on land, even if I have to use force.

206744.text: A sweet kid like you, Afallen, shouldn't be bound by the rules of the old world.

206745.text: There's a vast world down below on earth, where you can run and play without care.

206751.text: Shh, listen. That's the sound of the wind.

206752.text: The road... is long and winding...

206754.text: You've come all the way, surely you must have business with me.

206755.text: I'm Akasha, the Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars.

206759.text: Demongod Gordia is coming back to life...?

206760.text: That will spell disaster for the world, for sure, but... it's no longer my concern... I've made up my mind to never draw my sword again.

206763.text: 'Cause once my sword leaves its sheath, people die. The moral weight is simply too much to bear. I'm done with it.

206766.text: I'm just a simple swordswoman. I don't understand much about human emotions.

206767.text: If you want me to join your crusade against Demongod, defeat my sword first. But mind you... I will not hold back.

206768.text: If you want me to draw my sword, better be ready to die.

206771.text: If you want me to draw my sword, better be ready to die.

206773.text: The profoundness of swordsmanship is beyond imagination... I'm barely scratching the surface.

206774.text: Now that you have proved your readiness. I, Akasha, will redraw my sword for you.

206775.text: I will find the Deliverer of the Underworld. Even if Demongod Gordia has revived, he will be stopped by my sword.

206776.text: Meow, we meet again. Ahead of you is the temple where Camilyne, the Protector of Cassiel, dwells.

206777.text: Looks like the chaos of the world is coming to an end. The seal is fading...

206779.text: Camilyne is not someone who can be easily swayed. But... I'm sure you can do it. Go, fix the chaos in Cassiel.

206780.text: Standing by and watching again? At this rate...

206781.text: This time might be different. Look, there's hesitation written all over your face, which I didn't see last time.

206782.text: So all that talk about not letting that woman hurt the master—it's all just lip service...

206785.text: Are you the leader of the rebels, Garditis?

206786.text: First you resigned your post at the Sanctuary to elope with Dana, and now you want to betray me again?

206787.text: Protector, please stop the Floating Isles from going up and bring them back on land.

206788.text: There's nothing but monsters down there. The moment the isles touch the ground, we're dead.

206789.text: We can eliminate those monsters if we pull together. You see, the one occupying the Lower Domain has already been killed. As long as we...

206790.text: My power is fading. If we go back to land, I will never be able to get the isles back up in the air. Even right now, I can hardly defeat all the monsters. Even if I can, it will cost countless lives...

206791.text: What about those people you banished to the ground under the isles? They're innocent...

206792.text: Garditis, I love this world deeply. I, too, wanted to save everyone, but that's impossible.

206793.text: One thing my enemies have taught me is that to save the many, the few have to be sacrificed. It's simply not possible to save everyone.

206794.text: Protector, if the isles keep going up, resources will keep getting scarce, until the world withers and dies.

206795.text: But if we bring down the isles and let us be defeated by the monsters, this world will be doomed. As the Protector, I can't let that happen. I must protect the people on this land.

206796.text: You over there, do you agree?

206797.text: The first time I laid my eyes on you, I was reminded of Ereshkigal. The resemblance was simply striking...

206798.text: She was a close friend of mine. But then in the War of Protectors, we had to seal her away to defend our faith.

206799.text: Only when crisis befell my own world did I start to understand her ideal...

206800.text: This world will eventually return to order. You brought chaos to the world. Without you, Garditis would not have invaded the Sanctuary, and the Lower Domain people would not have wanted us to return to land...

206801.text: She didn't bring chaos. She brought hope. Because of her, we now stand united in the conviction that we will prevail over the monsters on land. Instead of waiting for the world to end, we take matters into our own hands and strive to change fate.

206802.text: Then we have nothing more to talk about. You're a sower of chaos, just like Ereshkigal. You will bring disaster upon this world.

206803.text: I, Camilyne, the Protector of Cassiel, order you, sower of chaos, to go back to where you came from!

206805.text: Thank you for bringing over my magic items. I can feel my power surging within me...

206806.text: God, grant me the power to protect my people and the future of this world!

206808.text: The power to change fate...? I used to laugh at that idea, but now I'm trying to believe in it...?

206809.text: See that magic circle over there? I poured my soul and power into it to keep the isles going up.

206812.text: Put them in the magic circle.

206813.text: Place the magic items in the magic circle.

206814.text: I injected my soul into the magic circle so that it could keep the isles going up. Now that my power has been depleted, I can no longer use it to lower the isles.

206816.text: Yes, we need someone else who's willing to give up soul and power...

206817.text: That someone is right in front of you.

206819.text: I betrayed you and deserve retribution... Isn't that what you always say?

206820.text: Lord Garditis, how could you... Let me do it instead. The alliance needs you!

206821.text: As soon as the Floating Isles return to land, we will start fighting the monsters. If we are to prevail, the two domains must unite as one. The Upper Domain people only take orders from their Protector, which makes her the key to forming a united front.

206822.text: Don't be sad on my account, Nemesi. You must assist the Protector and help build a new world full of hope.

206823.text: That way I can be reunited with Dana... Sorry, Dana, for leaving you alone in the realm of nothingness. I...

206824.text: Ah, the soul of bard, please grant me strength!

206825.text: Grant this humble bard the power to forge the future!

206826.text: The isles are going down and will land soon. The hard part has just begun.

206827.text: Datheios, go tell everyone to get ready to fight the monsters.

206828.text: Yes, Protector. We will always follow your lead.

206829.text: Young witch, you changed the world and rekindled our hope. Please accept my gratitude.

206830.text: It seems you have other tasks to attend to. Let's part ways here. I'm off to lead my people to fight the monsters.

206831.text: May your path be blessed by the divine.

206833.text: You've absorbed power from the Protectors, and now the seal is weakening. Pretty soon I will rise from the abyss and return to the world.

206834.text: My child, pledge your life to Ereshkigal—me—and fulfill my wish.

206835.text: Defeat those Protectors and fix the chaos in the world. That's your duty.

206836.text: My child, the eternal order will eventually descend upon us...

206837.text: As White Day is approaching, I shall take this opportunity to prepare a surprise for you, as a token of my appreciation for the love of chocolate you gave me on Valentine's Day. Hehe, get hyped for it 'coz there is more than love imparted to it.

206838.text: The chocolate from you washed away my fatigue of a busy day at clinic. White Day is coming up and I will get you a special gift.

206839.text: I was prone to gazing up at the sky alone but now owing you for the Valentine's Day gift, I'd love it if you would join me doing that together under the starry sky.

206840.text: The gift you got me before is much to my liking, and since then I've never ceased to think about how to return your favor. I can't wait to see you, and by then, I hope you could fulfill my wilfull request.

206841.text: White Day around the corner, don't forget to come and see me! It's a date. You're coming and I won't take no for an answer.

206844.text: This Chrono Tower... (Gesticulating at the tower)

206845.text: This is what I've been working on. Glad I can finally show it to you!

206846.text: $heroine$, you are here! I have a surprise for you. Guess what it is?

206847.text: Dorin, you look happy. What's up?

206848.text: I just finished building something. A great magical device! How impressive is that?

206849.text: $heroine$, aren't you curious about what it is?

206853.text: That's true, but it sounds like you're brushing me off.

206854.text: Fine, I'll just go ahead and tell you. It's a replica of Chrono Tower.

206855.text: An exact copy of the real thing, down to every detail!

206856.text: Impressive work, Dorin. It's quite a feat.

206857.text: Well, it incorporates all the knowledge I've ever learned. Oh, and it does more than it looks.

206858.text: This is the entrance. Beyond it lies the surprise I prepared for you. Go inside to find it. Wish you good luck!

206861.text: This place looks just like Chrono Tower.

206864.text: Master, please collect the shards to piece together the Irminsul Mirror.

206865.text: Shards? I've already collected them all.

206868.text: Erina was acting out of character... And she wasn't listening to me.

206869.text: This place looks exactly the same as Chrono Tower, but something feels off.

206871.text: Did I just hear... breathing? Who's hiding over there?

206874.text: Phrygia, what are you doing here?

206875.text: Ribbit... Someone's talking? (awakened by the sound, rubs eyes)

206876.text: Ribbit! $heroine$, you are here already! Guess I'm still not used to this body...

206877.text: Didn't expect to see you here either.

206878.text: Ribbit! Let me be your guide. Watch out for the traps on the ground and monsters lurking nearby.

206879.text: As a chevalier, I will protect you.

206881.text: There's a sound coming from the bend ahead.

206882.text: Ribbit! It could be monsters. Be careful!

206884.text: W-Who are you two? What are you doing here?

206886.text: I remember you're looking for these shards... Here, take them!

206888.text: If you'll excuse me... I need to head down to the long-unattended lower floors and do some cleaning.

206889.text: Ribbit? $heroine$, I didn't know you were a big shot.

206891.text: One minute there, and she was gone. Acting all mysterious.

206892.text: And this shard... it looks more like a cookie.

206895.text: (It doesn't hurt to take a bite)

206897.text: Y-You didn't eat it all, did you...?

206900.text: Hey... why did you attack me for no reason...?

206902.text: Yes, that's me. So you attacked me just 'cause I'm Eddine?

206903.text: I guess so... 'Cause in my memory every time we met, you roughed me up good.

206904.text: I would never do such a thing.

206905.text: It was a knee-jerk reaction... I'm sorry.

206906.text: Looks like she's not a monster after all. Ribbit!

206907.text: The monsters here lunge at any living creature in sight like a cat sees a ball of yarn!

206909.text: But if we were to face off in a real fight, I would be no match for you.

206910.text: So thank you for going easy on me.

206911.text: Well, I always prefer reason over violence.

206912.text: Thank you. You're so much better than those clowns who can't be reasoned with. They just attack me on sight.

206914.text: Maybe you'll run into them later. They're unique and hard to miss.

206918.text: Dejase, why must you fight me on this?! I can protect you if you let me lead the way!

206919.text: Protect me how? By using your fire magic to roast monsters?

206920.text: No, I should be the one at the front. That way I can deploy my alchemy ahead of time. It will serve as a powerful defense as well as a stern warning.

206921.text: Come on, have some faith in me. I'm not as weak as you think!

206922.text: I will not hold you back...

206923.text: Ugh... We could have avoided a lot of trouble if you had listened to me.

206924.text: We can't fall here. If we are to save our "savior," we must find the special magic in the tower.

206925.text: Fine, have it your way. You take the lead. But don't fall easily.

206926.text: Speaking of which, I wonder how the priest is doing. It's so unfair that someone so kind as to take us in should end up bed-bound.

206927.text: Don't dwell on that. Let's focus on finding the special magic.

206928.text: Not sure if the legend's true. But that's our only clue. It's worth a try.

206929.text: Uh, the legend says the magic is right here in this tower, but we're clueless as to how to locate it...

206930.text: Ribbit! Eddine, why are you following us?

206931.text: ...Just headed in the same direction, that's all.

206932.text: But we haven't said anything about where we're going.

206933.text: Uh... well, I don't know where I'm going either.

206934.text: I was dreaming, then I woke up and here I am.

206935.text: And... you attacked me right after I woke up.

206937.text: Eddine seems to be telling the truth.

206938.text: Hmm.... to be honest, we're trying to find a way out of here.

206939.text: Ribbit! It's such an honor to travel with $heroine$.

206940.text: I'm also trying to find the exit. I don't belong here.

206941.text: In that case, let's travel together. As a chevalier, I feel obliged to lead the way. Ribbit!

206943.text: Anemone, don't talk! You're badly hurt.

206944.text: She doesn't look good. Let me check her wounds.

206945.text: Walking forward, Eddine bends over to put her wings over Anemone's body, which soon are shrouded with sparks of light flying off the wings.

206947.text: I feel... warm, and my strength is coming back.

206948.text: What is this magic...? Can you teach me?

206949.text: Sure. Only if you help me find the exit.

206950.text: (takes an ornament off clothes) Take this.

206951.text: If we find any clues about the exit, we'll let you know.

206952.text: Now that we found the healing magic, let's get back.

206953.text: I feel as good as new now! Your healing magic is really impressive.

206954.text: Dejase and Anemone disappear at the end of the corridor. They are well gone.

206955.text: They seem to think this is the magic to cure terminal illnesses?

206957.text: But that's not the case. My magic only works for a brief period of time. It's ineffective against chronic illnesses.

206958.text: Ribbit! Don't worry. Look at the smile on their faces. That's proof enough of the power of your magic.

206959.text: The monster is still nearby. Stay sharp.

206960.text: Finally took care of the monster.

206961.text: Yep, partly thanks to the power of the chevalier!

206962.text: Good thing that one was not very dangerous.

206963.text: What was that on the ground?

206964.text: Looks like some kind of coupon?

206965.text: The kind of coupon never seen before in this tower.

206966.text: What's wrong, $heroine$? What are you doing spacing out like that?

206967.text: (shakes head to snap out of daze) Nothing. Just have this feeling that I've been here before.

206968.text: Have you ever seen a girl around here who carries a big hammer, keen on weapon crafting?

206969.text: Nope. I would remember if I saw a girl like that.

206971.text: This coupon can bring us strength. It seems that we have to defeat the powerful monster to get it.

206973.text: Stay sharp, Master. Graver danger lies ahead.

206974.text: Stay safe. Don't push yourself too hard.

206977.text: Phrygia? You're already on the stairs. Are you in a hurry to get somewhere?

206978.text: Ribbit! What are you talking about, $heroine$? I'm right behind you.

206982.text: Ribbit! Is that a mirror in front of me?

206983.text: Am I looking at another me...? Ribbit!

206986.text: Ribbit! It's you again, $heroine$. What a pleasant surprise.

206987.text: I've been searching all over for a way to lift the curse, but no luck so far.

206988.text: Worse, I saw another me... Ribbit! That's a bad omen...

206989.text: It seems that time and space in this place have fallen into disarray...

206990.text: There are signs of monsters frequenting nearby. As a chevalier, I shall stay on guard for the sake of your safety!

206991.text: Ribbit! That's what a chevalier does!

206992.text: Master, you must have noticed that something's going on.

206993.text: If you're baffled, ask that one yourself.

206995.text: She disappears again without letting me finish

206996.text: I'm used to her disappearing on me like that

206997.text: "That one"? Ribbit! $heroine$, do you know who she was talking about?

206998.text: I have a rough idea who.

207001.text: Phrygia, what do you know about "that one" Erina mentioned?

207002.text: Ribbit! I woke up and found myself in the tower.

207003.text: Keep exploring ahead. See what lies in wait.

207004.text: Ribbit! I get a weird vibe from this other me.

207006.text: Keep exploring ahead. See what lies in wait.

207008.text: Ribbit! Getting close to the top floor.

207009.text: Ribbit! That's one colorful house up ahead.

207010.text: And not just colorful. The shape is peculiar too. And best of all, it's lit.

207011.text: (pushes open the door) That one over there—that must be who we're looking for.

207012.text: $heroine$, took you long enough to find me. How do you like the surprise?

207014.text: I put a lot of work into making this magical device. You must have been bored after spending so long in the tower, huh?

207015.text: All those vicious monsters and strange characters—did you build them too?

207016.text: Everything that strikes you as unique, I built it. But... it was a lot of work and it's not perfect. You know, I never allow my works to be flawed!

207017.text: So I got here as fast as I could when I learned of the problems.

207018.text: I suppose "they" gave you clues, huh?

207019.text: I like your gift, but still, I wish you had given me a heads up...

207020.text: I don't know how I got myself involved in this either...

207021.text: Ribbit! Same here. Perhaps an error occurred on our way to a different world...

207022.text: Did anyone else get in? Looks like there are flaws in these parts. I should note them down and have them fixed soon.

207023.text: I never settle for anything less than perfect!

207026.text: This clown, the final surprise for you, is my proud work.

207027.text: Defeat it and we can get out of here.

207028.text: Come on, guys, give your best shot! It will provide great data for my research.

207029.text: Have you received the gift I got you yesterday? That's a little something to show my appreciation. Hope we can still be together when the next White Day rolls around.

207031.text: During the event, Easter Eggs will drop along with the trophies by clearing stages in Dreamworld.

207032.text: That black cat has also prepared various gifts for you but it takes some work before getting all of them.

207033.text: Have you collected the Easter Eggs you wanted?

207034.text: The rabbit is nearby... I can feel it.

207035.text: Wanna take a bite of those Easter Eggs? They taste magical. Meow.

207036.text: Meow? You didn't bring what I want.

207038.text: You left something behind? I'm tired. I'm going home to sleep. Meow...

207039.text: There's a spring up ahead. Let's go there and rest awhile.

207040.text: Ah, a stranger. Are you here to make wishes, too?

207042.text: You bet! This is our elves' unique Wishing Well. Toss Lucky Copper Coin in it, and your wish will be granted.

207043.text: If you don't have any Lucky Copper Coins, don't worry. You can get them by completing commissions for elves.

207044.text: Come back when you have enough Lucky Copper Coins. I will be here waiting for you.

207045.text: Wanna go feed pigeons together? These little ones are very friendly.

207046.text: I don't mean to pry, but I'm curious to know what wish you made...

207047.text: Nice weather today. Wanna take a walk together?

207048.text: Wishing time is over. If you have any unfulfilled wishes, come back next time!

207050.text: Thanks to you, the people of the Lower Domain are finally united in peace.

207051.text: I hear you're headed to the Upper Domain of Cassiel.

207054.text: As far as I know, lots of powerful sorcerers live up there.

207055.text: And also expect to see some strange structures. Anyway, be extra careful.

207059.text: You did a great job down there. The alliance has foiled the Upper Domain's attack.

207060.text: But we can't let our guard down just yet.

207061.text: The preacher's plan may have failed, but the forbidden power is still there.

207062.text: The Upper Domain of Cassiel remains shrouded in mystery. Be careful.

207064.text: This fish looks nice. Just what my hungry stomach needs. Thank you for the treat.

207066.text: Well then, good luck. I'm off to rest, meow.

207068.text: Afallen, what are you doing here?

207069.text: Oh, it's you. What a pleasant surprise!

207070.text: I got bored being alone and chased a butterfly. Then I got lost.

207071.text: Come on in. I'll get you something to eat.

207072.text: (⊙o⊙)Wow! This is great! If only everyone was like you.

207073.text: Everyone's been too busy to play with me lately...

207074.text: It's okay. If you need company, I'm always here.

207075.text: Really? Fantastic! So, what do we play first...?

207076.text: Oh, right, let's play hide and seek!

207079.text: Long time no see. I've brought you some food I made.

207081.text: Don't mention it. You helped me before. This is the least I can do to show my gratitude.

207082.text: Oh, and here's some medicine I made.

207083.text: I'm not good in combat, but I still want to help in my own way.

207084.text: You may not be good at fights, Tuonel, but that doesn't stop you from being an amazing ally.

207085.text: Mmm... I will keep doing my part.

207086.text: This is what Tuonel referred to as...

207090.text: And also to warn you that those two assassins are still lurking nearby.

207092.text: We're about to enter the Upper Domain. Stay cautious.

207094.text: No problem, I'll be secretly protecting you.

207095.text: Hey, friend, it's been a while.

207097.text: The food I had Tuonel bring to you the other day, do you like it?

207100.text: We're about to enter the Upper Domain. Are you ready?

207103.text: Well then, I'll meet you up there.

207106.text: Ribbit. I'm here to tell you how to get to the Upper Domain.

207107.text: From what I have observed in the last few days, the only thing connecting the two domains is a narrow passage.

207108.text: But it's filled with ambushers from the Upper Domain!

207110.text: Yeah, so we gotta be prepared.

207111.text: As a chevalier, I will be at the front protecting all of you. Ribbit!

207112.text: I'll go get ready. See you up there. Ribbit.

207125.text: Master, you're back. How is everything going?

207127.text: I came across a toy today. Look.

207129.text: You know, master, this was my favorite toy as a kid.

207130.text: When I blew it, all my troubles just went away...

207131.text: The cicadas sing, the windmills spin... Ah! Sorry, master, I got a little carried away reminiscing about my childhood.

207132.text: Master, summer is coming. I may need your help with a few missions, if that's okay.

207133.text: Sure. You can count on my help!

207134.text: You're always so supportive, master. I want you to have this windmill. Consider it a thank-you gift. I hid some magic in there.

207135.text: Can't believe you actually got a little windmill...

207136.text: If you come across more, bring them to me. I would be happy to trade you for them.

207137.text: One breezy morning, Phrygia comes to Chrono Tower bearing a gift.

207138.text: Long time no see. I brought you a gift. Ribbit.

207140.text: I remember the first time we met. Ribbit. It feels like yesterday. Back then, Irminsul was still...

207141.text: You know what, it's a beautiful day, let's talk about something more positive.

207143.text: Hello. You seem in a hurry. What's up?

207144.text: The Music Box of Time is acting strange.

207151.text: I feel... dizzy... What just happened?

207153.text: Phrygia, why are you here? And who's this stranger with you...?

207154.text: Flare? Am I... dreaming or something!?

207155.text: We're back in Irminsul! Oh, home, sweet home...

207157.text: And you are... We haven't met before, have we?

207158.text: Never mind, that's not important. Phrygia, there's something I need your help with. Something important.

207160.text: An unknown Magical Abnormality is suddenly happening all over Irminsul. I'm still looking into it.

207162.text: That's a strange thing to say, but yes. And right now I need you to take care of something.

207163.text: There's a bunch of mutated monsters in the forest up ahead. Can you clean them out?

207164.text: Yeah, sure. I'm a chevalier, that's my job. Let's get over there.

207165.text: May the Protector be with you.

207166.text: The mutated monsters here are a lot more ferocious than the ones we saw before. This is not good...

207167.text: Looks like all monsters in this area have been cleaned out.

207168.text: Flare, how bad is this Magical Abnormality in Irminsul?

207169.text: Pretty bad, worse than I imagined. Norn is in the town up ahead. She can tell you more about it.

207170.text: Right now, to honor the will of the Protector, I'm heading to the sacrificial altar to get the cleansing ritual started.

207171.text: Also, Phrygia, the Protector would like me to give you this.

207173.text: It holds the Protector's power. Might be useful to you.

207174.text: Well then, farewell and good luck.

207175.text: The clock's ticking. We gotta get to the town and learn more about the situation from Norn.

207176.text: This time I will save my homeland, one way or another!

207177.text: Look up ahead, that must be the town Flare was talking about!

207178.text: Looks empty and quiet. Maybe the Magical Abnormality did this...

207179.text: I have a bad feeling about this.

207180.text: Ribbit. Me too. Let's be careful on our way in.

207181.text: Can't believe mutated monsters have already invaded the town!

207182.text: It appears this Magical Abnormality is much worse than the last one... What do we do...?

207184.text: You're right. Hey, look, that's her over there, in the square.

207185.text: Norn, tell us about the Magical Abnormality.

207186.text: Phrygia, as you can see, things are looking pretty grim around here.

207187.text: But fret not, I've located the source of the Abnormality—a cavern deep in the forest.

207188.text: A word of warning though, you can't just...

207189.text: Thanks for the information. I must stop this Abnormality right now!

207190.text: There you are. I'm certain this is where the Abnormality originated.

207191.text: The magic waves here do feel a little strange.

207192.text: So you feel it too... Wait, how come I can feel magic waves...?

207193.text: Now is not the time to think about such things... Come on, let's go in.

207197.text: Didn't you say you were heading to the sacrificial altar? Why are you here?

207199.text: Something happened, and I had to change my plans.

207200.text: Anyway, now is not the time to get into that. Withered Heart is right up ahead.

207202.text: You mean the thing that Norn said had to do with the source of the Abnormality?

207204.text: Destroy Withered Heart and Irminsul will be saved.

207209.text: You have my gratitude, great knight, or should I say, the most loyal Glorious Chevalier of the Protector?

207210.text: As a reward, I will save you for last so you can watch Irminsul fall, hahaha!

207211.text: We came too late. Withered Heart has already been released. The Magical Abnormality is about to strike.

207213.text: I... I wasn't... Oh gosh... What have I done...?

207216.text: The place is collapsing. Let's get out of here now.

207217.text: Sorry, Lady Norn, I couldn't stop Withered Heart.

207218.text: It's not your fault. Where is Phrygia?

207219.text: I saw him running into the woods over there.

207220.text: We couldn't stop the Abnormality, but we can still save Irminsul.

207222.text: Stranger, I sense powerful magic in you.

207223.text: Strangely, Phrygia is radiating powerful magic, too.

207225.text: Lady Norn, are you saying that Phrygia possessing magic is not a good thing?

207226.text: No, it's not a good thing, but not necessarily a bad thing either...

207227.text: Phrygia's magic power could be the key to saving Irminsul.

207228.text: Go, stranger. Phrygia needs your help. And the future of Irminsul depends on you.

207229.text: Phrygia stands facing a big tree, muttering to himself and trembling all over.

207231.text: I didn't do it... It's impossible that I destroyed Irminsul... I-it wasn't me...

207232.text: Phrygia, it wasn't your fault. Withered Heart is the culprit.

207233.text: No... no! Protector, I pray for your forgiveness...

207234.text: Phrygia is not listening to a word I say.

207235.text: A person suddenly runs out of the woods and lands a kick on Phrygia, sending him rolling down the grass before stopping motionless.

207237.text: Even a nobody like you knows who I am. Looks like my reputation does precede me, which is more than can be said of Norn!

207239.text: Hmph, didn't think Phrygia the Glorious Chevalier would become like this.

207240.text: Like some lost kid who couldn't find his parents.

207241.text: What a pathetic joke you are! And here you thought you could save Irminsul? Don't make me laugh!

207242.text: The Protector would never have a coward like you at her side!

207244.text: Yeah, a coward, that's what you are. You should be out there fighting monsters with your sword, not crying here like a baby!

207246.text: I'm not done yet. If the Protector heard your pathetic prayers, she would kick you in the face!

207248.text: No one insults the honor of chevaliers! Not even you, Raphan!

207250.text: Well, well, well, look at you, the glorious chevalier.

207251.text: Pointing your sword at an Ovate, your ally, instead of using it to fight enemies and protect the downtrodden.

207252.text: What happened to your honor as a chevalier? What happened to your oath to the Protector?

207253.text: You are a chevalier, and yet here you are pointing your sword at me...

207254.text: You betrayed your oath... You betrayed me...

207255.text: The Protector to whom I have sworn fealty turns out to be the source of all chaos, corrupted by forbidden powers... And my oath compels me to eliminate her.

207256.text: And you're absolutely right. I should be pointing my sword at the enemy...

207257.text: That guy is a real handful. Can't believe he's actually going there by himself!

207258.text: Alright, let's catch up to him.

207259.text: We're saved! The monsters have finally been chased off.

207262.text: Help me... Help me, please! I don't want to become one of... Ahh!

207263.text: Honorable chevalier, please save this poor man!

207264.text: But... I... I don't know magic.

207265.text: What are you talking about? Look at your wand!

207267.text: Wait... This is... this is magic. I feel magic growing inside me!

207269.text: We gotta do something. He's turning into a monster!

207270.text: Damn it, no more dithering. Gotta tough this one out!

207272.text: Thank you so much, glorious chevalier!

207273.text: Ribbit... That was weird. Since when did I know how to use magic?

207274.text: Maybe that kick I gave you awakened something in you.

207276.text: This magic power you possess is the key to saving Irminsul.

207279.text: So all is not lost. I still have a chance to save Irminsul!

207280.text: Ribbit... I get it. This must be a blessing from the Protector!

207281.text: The Protector didn't abandon me. I must pull myself together.

207282.text: Seriously? Not even a thank you after what I did for you? What an ingrate.

207284.text: Aww, aren't you a cutie. Come here, let me give you a pat on the head.

207286.text: All jokes aside, thank you for getting my head back in the game.

207287.text: That's more like it. Finally sounded like a proper Glorious Chevalier.

207288.text: The people here need my help, so I'll stay.

207289.text: A lot of refugees have gathered in the clearing ahead. Since your wand can suppress mutation, maybe you can help them.

207290.text: You're right. Now is my chance to make things right.

207291.text: Ugh... I want to go out and play so badly... but Lady Norn said I had to stay here to look after you guys...
