208693.text: Pray for your life, sinner, 'cause you will be facing the invincible Miracle!

208694.text: Your Ladyship, I'm coming to help!

208695.text: Crap, those twisted monsters have caught up again!

208696.text: Those monsters are not that strong, but they can be a real pain in the neck.

208697.text: What are you doing? It's dangerous over there!

208699.text: Damn it, I was so close!

208700.text: It appears that even if I had all my power back, I would still be no match for you.

208701.text: Who are you? You don't look like you're from Muntenia.

208702.text: I'm here for the Wacky Candy.

208704.text: I'm the deliverer of the Lethe, charged with keeping the balance between the Lethe and the mortal world.

208705.text: Recently the barrier between the two places came loose, and an evil dragon escaped from the Lethe.

208706.text: I tracked it down here. It should be hiding in this castle.

208707.text: Nonsense. I've never left this castle, and I haven't seen any evil dragon!

208708.text: Wait... There's a strange sound from the doorway...

208709.text: Is it those twisted monsters again?

208710.text: No, I only detect one kind of mood.

208712.text: Delicious candies, I've missed you guys so much, especially when I was cooped up in that hellhole.

208713.text: (grab a handful of candies) I'm loving this place!

208714.text: Look, that's the evil dragon I was talking about.

208716.text: Ugh, I went to so much trouble to prepare those candies for Halloween!

208717.text: Stupid dragon, leave my candies alone!

208719.text: Can't believe you sent the deliverer after me... It's just some candies, geez!

208720.text: This is not good. I gotta run. Hmm, not without my cute little desserts!

208723.text: Don't worry. I can still sense his presence. He must still be hiding somewhere in the castle.

208724.text: In that case, let's split up and search.

208725.text: No need. The deliverer has special means to track down the evil dragon.

208727.text: Looks like some kind of magic circle...

208728.text: I've never seen this kind of magic circle before.

208729.text: It's something unique to the Lethe—

208730.text: Okay, I've located the evil dragon. Follow me.

208732.text: Hah, they would never think to look here!

208733.text: Who would have thought I'd find so many candies and desserts here—

208734.text: You mean he's in there? That's my storeroom, where I keep all my candies and desserts!

208735.text: Then that must be it. This evil dragon is a sick glutton for sweets—

208740.text: This is nothing personal. I'll compensate you when I catch this evil dragon.

208741.text: You're in the presence of deliverer of the Lethe. Evil dragon, your time has come!

208742.text: D-Damn it, how did they find me so soon?

208743.text: I'm not going back to the Lethe with you. That cesspool doesn't have a single candy!

208746.text: The candies are moving on their own!

208748.text: Wait, be careful with my candies. I worked so hard to make them!

208749.text: You think a few candies can stop the deliverer? Quit resisting and...!

208750.text: Ugh, that crafty bastard got away again.

208752.text: What do I do now? I don't have the ingredients to make more candies.

208753.text: I promised the children in the village that I'd have enough candies for them...

208754.text: This is all your fault. You made Nocturna cry!

208755.text: All the preparations for Halloween down the drain...

208756.text: Down the drain... Ah, that gives me an idea...

208758.text: Hey, are you listening to me!?

208759.text: Listen, everyone, this evil dragon is addicted to sweets. Once he ate everything that tasted sweet in a kingdom. That's why we held him in the Lethe.

208761.text: It's not. The people grew discontent with a life without sweets, which eventually led to war.

208762.text: To make things worse, after years of consuming sweets, the dragon evolved a thick coat of syrup that is invulnerable to ordinary magic and weapons, making it very hard to hurt him.

208763.text: What if I could use the syrup to make sweets...

208764.text: So how did you manage to capture him?

208765.text: Once, after a feast, he went to take a bath in a big spring pond.

208766.text: The hot spring water softened the syrup on his scales, weakening his defense. That's how we got him.

208767.text: It's said that afterwards that big spring pond became a famous local attraction.

208768.text: So, if we catch that dragon, Nocturna will have the ingredients she needs to make more candies!

208770.text: What are we waiting for? Let's catch that dragon!

208771.text: I sense the presence of that evil dragon. He's hiding in there.

208772.text: Deserted throne? I haven't been here in a while.

208773.text: Yep. Nocturna built all these on a whim.

208774.text: These ornaments make me feel uncomfortable.

208776.text: Why can't you people just leave me alone!?

208777.text: I'm just hungry for sweets. That's not a crime!

208778.text: Your greed has caused many tragedies. You need to be resealed.

208779.text: No, you can't do that. You have no idea what it is like to go ten thousand years without sweets!

208782.text: Hahaha, your attacks barely leave a scratch!

208783.text: I will fight to my last breath for my beloved sweets!

208784.text: What a dork. Look what's behind you.

208788.text: How come I didn't notice there was a giant hose behind the throne!?

208790.text: Let me go! Let me go!

208791.text: Let's get him out of here.

208792.text: Where are you people taking me!?

208794.text: This is what you get for eating all my precious candies!

208797.text: No, you can't do this to me!

208800.text: Once we throw him in the water, I can read all the books for free, right?

208801.text: Yes, you can read whatever you like.

208808.text: A nice warm bath. This is not too bad...

208810.text: Good riddance to those twisted monsters from the Lethe…

208811.text: Twisted monsters? What are you talking about...?

208812.text: I'm talking about those messed-up creatures that chased me all night last night!

208813.text: Aside from the evil dragon that snuck out, no other monsters have escaped the Lethe.

208814.text: Then what were those things that kept scaring me last night?

208815.text: That'd be me. I made those monsters...

208816.text: I made Her Ladyship a lot of ghost dolls for the coming Halloween.

208817.text: Last night Her Ladyship sent me to get help from the village. I thought I'd bring the dolls with me to scare the kids.

208818.text: But ended up scaring you instead...

208820.text: What about those monsters along the border of my homeland—you made those too?

208821.text: I'm still getting a hang of it. Some dolls wouldn't follow my command and ran off...

208823.text: So it's all a big misunderstanding.

208824.text: Now that the air is cleared and the evil dragon is brought to justice, let's get the Halloween party started!

208825.text: Aw, look at Ella's expression. So cute.

208826.text: Let's all forget what happened last night!

208827.text: You sure it's okay to keep him here?

208828.text: Yes. His power has been curtailed and his scale shield is gone.

208829.text: Holding him in the Lethe will only nurture his grudge. So I'd rather keep him here and make him repay for the damaged candies.

208830.text: Who would have thought the Wacky Candies Erina mentioned were made by Nocturna?

208831.text: Hehe, they were meant as Halloween presents for you guys.

208832.text: I'm glad you all like them.

208833.text: Catherine, that festival outfit looks great on you.

208834.text: Really? It's the same outfit worn by the hero and heroine of my favorite book when they meet.

208835.text: The love they share is so beautiful. Ah! Ahem, never mind!

208836.text: Haha, didn't know a prude like you would be into that kind of book.

208837.text: Ah, you like that book too?

208838.text: I think the supporting female character's love for the hero is just as beautiful—

208840.text: Hey, big lizard, go get me some more delicious candies!

208841.text: Huh...? Hm... I'm a useless dragon now. You should talk to Nocturna instead.

208842.text: No, you said the other day that you've been to a lot of places and eaten a lot of sweets!

208843.text: That was in the past. Besides, just because I ate something doesn't mean I know how to make it.

208844.text: Liar! Just yesterday you said you'd make me all kinds of delicious food!

208845.text: I was joking. Besides, how am I supposed to make food while tied up like this?

208846.text: Just let me bathe in peace, will you? *yawn* I'm sleepy. Gonna catch some Zs.

208847.text: No! I'm not leaving you alone until you get me candy!

208849.text: Have a taste of my steel claw!

208851.text: You damn brat, I'm gonna teach you some manners!

208855.text: That evil dragon is going to eat me!

208858.text: Oh no, the seal is broken. The evil dragon is regaining power...

208859.text: Damn it, now of all times! I thought this was over!

208860.text: Let's calm him down before he wrecks this place.
